dialog.message: Parado ai!
dialog.name: SM33_G71_L01

dialog.message: Eu pensei que você era um puta ciborgue assassino, mas você não consegue pegar nem um garoto de 10 anos! Ha! Pegue-me se puder!
dialog.name: SM33_G71_L02

dialog.message: Deixe o drone pronto, Stark. Cammi está prestes a me fazer usar isso.
dialog.name: SM33_G71_L03

dialog.message: Blackagar, eu sei exatamente o que é ser desapontado por sua familia. Meu proprio filho me prendeu em ambar.
dialog.name: SM23_G42_L01

dialog.message: Deve te encher de ódio saber que seu proprio irmão é a ameaça mais direta a sua família... Depois de mim, claro.
dialog.name: SM23_G42_L02

dialog.message: Pai.
dialog.name: SM24_G01_L01

dialog.message: Filho.
dialog.name: SM24_G01_L02

dialog.message: Você sabe o que está vindo para Midgard. Os mortais precisam de nós.
dialog.name: SM24_G01_L03

dialog.message: Talvez nossa ajuda não seja suficiente.
dialog.name: SM24_G01_L04

dialog.message: O que você está dizendo?
dialog.name: SM24_G01_L05

dialog.message: Que Asgard deve pensar em sua propria segurança.
dialog.name: SM24_G01_L06

dialog.message: Ao custo da destruição de Midgard?
dialog.name: SM24_G01_L07

dialog.message: Minha energia é para Asgard. Meus poderes são para Asgard. E os seus também haverão de ser!
dialog.name: SM24_G01_L08

dialog.message: Pai. Você precisa me ouvir...
dialog.name: SM24_G01_L09

dialog.message: Irmãs, estamos de acordo?
dialog.name: SM30_G66_L01

dialog.message: O submundo será nosso se conseguirmos um caminho a partir da Dimensão Negra.
dialog.name: SM30_G66_L02

dialog.message: Londres será nossa assim que conquistarmos o submundo.
dialog.name: SM30_G66_L03

dialog.message: Então estamos de acordo. Dracula sabe sua parte do plano?
dialog.name: SM30_G66_L04

dialog.message: Ele sabe. Vamos começar.
dialog.name: SM30_G66_L05

dialog.message: Nós não nos veremos novamente até que seja a hora...
dialog.name: SM30_G66_L06

dialog.message: Vamos deixar que Dracula faça seu trabalho. Se ele fizer tudo direito, ele será recompensado como quiser.
dialog.name: SM30_G66_L07

dialog.message: Onde está sua irmã? Pergunto novamente... O que ela poderia estar fazendo enquanto você está fora?
dialog.name: SM30_G40_L01

dialog.message: Com certeza você não é inocente o suficiente para confiar nela.
dialog.name: SM30_G40_L02

dialog.message: Nor am I fool enough that I cannot see through your pitiful diversions.
dialog.name: SM30_G40_L03

dialog.message: If you do not see her in the Dark Dimension, you will see her soon enough here. Either way, to your sorrow.
dialog.name: SM30_G40_L04

dialog.message: The last transmission from Mockingbird originated in this area.
dialog.name: SM01_G06_L01

dialog.message: Viuva negra está nessa missão com você.
dialog.name: SM01_G06_L02

dialog.message: Detectamos terroristas da I.M.A. na vizinhança, e parece que os Maggia estão envolvidos também.
dialog.name: SM01_G06_L03

dialog.message: Como e porquê, nós ainda não sabemos.
dialog.name: SM01_G06_L04

dialog.message: Harpia talvez saiba. Mas nós vamos ter que encontra-la para ter certeza.
dialog.name: SM01_G06_L05

dialog.message: Agente! Temos um grande problema em nossas mãos.
dialog.name: SM34_G01_L01

dialog.message: Os inumanos localizaram um novo membro que estão chamando de "Profiler". Esta pessoa tem a habilidade de sintetizar dados e prever tendências... É efetivamente uma maquina de previsões.
dialog.name: SM34_G01_L02

dialog.message: Maximus o Louco é o porta-voz do "Profiler", e temos a informação da família real que Doutor Destino causará um evento que resultará na extinção dos Inumanos.
dialog.name: SM34_G01_L03

dialog.message: Maximus?! A gente não tem nas regras da S.H.I.E.L.D. algo sobre não dar bola pra quem tem "o Louco" no nome? Especialmente aqueles que mentem para nós e para suas famílias?
dialog.name: SM34_G01_L04

dialog.message: Escute eles.
dialog.name: SM34_G01_L05

dialog.message: As ações do Maximus são realmente difíceis de compreender. Porém temos prova de que diversas previsões do "Profiler" se mostraram verdadeiras em diversos testes. Então decidimos agir desta vez.
dialog.name: SM34_G01_L06

dialog.message: E por agir entenda que ela quis dizer que invadiram Latveria e prenderam o Doutor Destino. E é ai que o problema começa.
dialog.name: SM34_G01_L07

dialog.message: Não existe um problema, estamos apenas nos protegendo. Vocês fariam o mesmo em nosso lugar.
dialog.name: SM34_G01_L08

dialog.message: Ela está certa, Doutor Destino é um terrorista e eles estão impedindo que ele cometa crimes futuros.
dialog.name: SM34_G01_L09

dialog.message: Bem, ele têm sido de grande ajuda na luta contra as incursões.
dialog.name: SM34_G01_L10

dialog.message: Gostando ou não do Doutor Destino, os inumanos violaram a soberania de uma nação. Isso é completamente ilegal. A S.H.I.E.L.D. precisa dar uma resposta para isso.
dialog.name: SM34_G01_L11

dialog.message: Na verdade não. Eles estão agindo em pró de um bem maior. Se nós pudermos prevenir crimes ao invés de investigá-los... Quantas vidas não serão poupadas?
dialog.name: SM34_G01_L12

dialog.message: Não da pra saber, Steve. Uma premonição é uma premonição e só isso... Não é uma garantia.
dialog.name: SM34_G01_L13

dialog.message: É uma chance que eu acho que deveriamos aproveitar.
dialog.name: SM34_G01_L14

dialog.message: Nós deveriamos. Profétas de Asgard já falam sobre o Ragnarok.
dialog.name: SM34_G01_L15

dialog.message: Eu concordo. A integridade da S.H.I.E.L.D. está em prova... E, aparentemente, a integridade do futuro. Se nós conseguirmos agir prevenindo catástofres, nós deveriamos.
dialog.name: SM34_G01_L16

dialog.message: Deveriamos ao custo de causar uma outra catástofre?
dialog.name: SM34_G01_L17

dialog.message: Pense o que poderiamos fazer com esse tipo de conhecimento, Stark. Provavelmente ainda teriamos o Diretor Fury, e você ainda teria uma casa.
dialog.name: SM34_G01_L18

dialog.message: Maria, eu não serei parte nisso.
dialog.name: SM34_G01_L19

dialog.message: Nem eu.
dialog.name: SM34_G01_L20

dialog.message: Eu concordo com o Tony. T'Challa, Daisy e Hank Pym também concordam.
dialog.name: SM34_G01_L21

dialog.message: Vocês estão tomando uma decisão ruim... Vamos começar uma ação agora, para auxiliar a familia real dos inumanos.
dialog.name: SM34_G01_L22

dialog.message: Se vocês vão realmente apoiar as loucuras do Maximus, nós vamos tomar nossas ações.
dialog.name: SM34_G01_L23

dialog.message: Isso não precisa virar uma batalha, Tony. Pense no futuro...
dialog.name: SM34_G01_L24

dialog.message: Vocês é que estão acabando com o futuro... Nós vamos estar de olho.
dialog.name: SM34_G01_L25

dialog.message: Não! Nós somos aqueles que vamos salvar o futuro. O "Profiler" mostra que o Alto Evolucionário é a causa inicial do problema. Nós vamos atrás dele. Quem estiver do nosso lado vá para o Quinjet, partiremos agora!
dialog.name: SM34_G01_L26

dialog.message: Independente do tipo de vitória que vocês imaginam obter hoje, eu ainda controlo o "Profiler"... E apenas eu sei onde ele está!
dialog.name: SM34_G154_L01

dialog.message: O futuro, cada mínima possibilidade dele, é todo meu! Vocês não o terão!
dialog.name: SM34_G154_L02

dialog.message: Me parece que qualquer das possibilidades aqui leva a destruição total. Eu diria que apenas aquele que viu todas as faces de uma joia pode lhe atribuir o real valor. Alguém há de ver as diferentes possibilidades para entender o peso real de uma escolha.
dialog.name: SM34_G133_L01

dialog.message: Me parece que agora você sabe que qualquer dos lados dessa batalha leva a destruição do planeta Terra.
dialog.name: SM34_G133_L02

dialog.message: Eu enviarei você de volta ao começo. Desta vez você tem o conhecimento dos dois lados. Maria e Coulson provavelmente vão te ouvir, mas não posso garantir que os heróis vão...
dialog.name: SM34_G133_L03

dialog.message: Você precisa unir os dois lados, do contrário, tudo acontecerá como você já viu...
dialog.name: SM34_G133_L04

dialog.message: Você está comprando soldados do Maximus para tomar uma Terra das Incursões? Isso não me parece um bom investimento a longo prazo.
dialog.name: S2M10_G141_L01

dialog.message: Apenas se não tiver fim para as incursões. Mas, como você verá, isso não é o caso. Grandes mentes além da sua estão na margém de algo extraordinário.
dialog.name: S2M10_G141_L02

dialog.message: Irei aceitar isso sim, pode deixar... Vou te colocar na lista dos caras malucos com planos de destruição mundial.
dialog.name: S2M10_G141_L03

dialog.message: Você não pode parar o progresso! Incursões abrem portas para novos mundos, e antes que elas sejam destruidas, eu farei bom uso delas.
dialog.name: S2M10_G141_L04

dialog.message: Isso é algo que muitos de nós não chamariam de progresso...
dialog.name: S2M10_G141_L05

dialog.message: Agente! Estamos no meio de uma crise. Diretor Fury assim como varios vingadores simplesmente desapareceram.
dialog.name: SM25_G01_L01

dialog.message: Exceto eu.
dialog.name: SM25_G01_L02

dialog.message: Uma ajuda em boa hora. Vamos precisar de apoio para localizar o resto do time, Gavião.
dialog.name: SM25_G01_L03

dialog.message: Ele deixou uma nota: "Fui caçar. Você consegue parar um trem em movimento? Respostas do time devem estar com o rei baixo. Orgulho está em jogo."
dialog.name: SM25_G01_L04

dialog.message: Isso é claramente uma mensagem codificada. Fury está procurando os outros vingadores e deixou uma dica de onde devemos começar.
dialog.name: SM25_G01_L05

dialog.message: Runaway train...
dialog.name: SM25_G01_L06

dialog.message: E é por isso que conseguimos esse grupo de... bem... Fugitivos. Agente, você provavelmente se lembra de Nico Minoru, ela esteve presente em nossa ultima aventura pelo Murderworld.
dialog.name: SM25_G01_L07

dialog.message: Nós nunca nos chamammos dessa forma. Isso é, tipo, oficial?
dialog.name: SM25_G01_L08

dialog.message: Nico, se importaria em introduzir o resto do time?
dialog.name: SM25_G01_L09

dialog.message: De boa. Esse nerd aqui é Chase Stein e seu dinossauro de estimação. Essa pequenina aqui é Molly Hayes. A princesinha ali é Karolina Dean e aquele ali com partes mecânicas é o Victor Mancha.
dialog.name: SM25_G01_L10

dialog.message: Então vocês precisam da gente? Isso é muito legal! Mas... o que vocês querem que a gente faça? Pera pera pera... O "Rei baixo" que ele menciona é o Rei do Crime, certo?
dialog.name: SM25_G01_L11

dialog.message: Ummm... Sim. Acreditamos que é ele.
dialog.name: SM25_G01_L12

dialog.message: Iremos orquestrar um encontro com o rei do crime... O que acontece depois é com vocês.
dialog.name: SM25_G01_L13

dialog.message: YAAAAAAY!! Uma chance de provar que a gente é bom pros adultos. Vocês não sentem borboletas no estômago?
dialog.name: SM25_G01_L14

dialog.message: Desespero se mostra em sua mente novamente... E dessa vez não por conta do Barão Mordo, e sim por você!
dialog.name: S2M8_G85_L01

dialog.message: By the Vishanti, no!
dialog.name: S2M8_G85_L02

dialog.message: You are an advanced specimen...but not a final version. I envision improvements.
dialog.name: S2M8_G146_L01

dialog.message: I envision forcibly removing you from the mutation business. As of now.
dialog.name: S2M8_G146_L02

dialog.message: Stark. You cannot defeat Hulk with simple force.
dialog.name: SM26_G49_L01

dialog.message: News flash, Carnac the Magnificent. Nobody's had much luck sweet-talking him either.
dialog.name: SM26_G49_L02

dialog.message: Continue your attack. If you can withstand him long enough, I may be able to break the hold Ultron has over him.
dialog.name: SM26_G49_L03

dialog.message: Then fire up your brain waves. Here he comes again.
dialog.name: SM26_G49_L04

dialog.message: We've got to find a better way to take out the Sentry units. They're repairing Ultron too fast.
dialog.name: SM26_G78_L01

dialog.message: Too true, Agente Coulson. I await your tactical shift with interest. Please continue.
dialog.name: SM26_G78_L02

dialog.message: Use smoke signals or someCoisa, Coulson. Looks like our secure communications aren't that secure.
dialog.name: SM26_G78_L03

dialog.message: This world dies. Only M.O.D.O.K. possesses the key for survival and conquest!
dialog.name: SM21_G77_L01

dialog.message: Your terminal failure approaches within two standard deviations of nine point eight zero two seconds. Starting...
dialog.name: SM21_G77_L02

dialog.message: Now.
dialog.name: SM21_G77_L03

dialog.message: Strike harder, Thor. Build your rage, and watch it become fear as you see you cannot wound me.
dialog.name: S2M11_G150_L01

dialog.message: ... Agent.
dialog.name: HR_G84_L01

dialog.message: My mace shall strike where you bid.
dialog.name: HR_G84_L02

dialog.message: Soooooooooooooooo...
dialog.name: HR_G137_L01

dialog.message: I don't know who you are exactly, but Capitã Marvel said I should just follow you around if that's okay?
dialog.name: HR_G137_L02

dialog.message: ...hrrrhhh...
dialog.name: HR_G137_L03

dialog.message: Oh! And this is Lockjaw. He's a giant bizarro teleporting dog.
dialog.name: HR_G137_L04

dialog.message: *PANT PANT PANT*
dialog.name: HR_G137_L05

dialog.message: ...and he likes hugs!
dialog.name: HR_G137_L06

dialog.message: Hurrh!?
dialog.name: HR_G137_L07

dialog.message: Earthling, I will have you be aware that you are still accused of multiple crimes against the Kree Empire.
dialog.name: HR_G162_L01

dialog.message: You will still be punished for those crimes in the future, but for now, you will assist me in prolonging our universe's existence.
dialog.name: HR_G162_L02

dialog.message: So you're the Honorary Guardian everyone is talking about. Well, there is noCoisa 'Honorary' about it, Agent.
dialog.name: HR_G163_L01

dialog.message: As far as I'm concerned, you are a Guardian of the Galaxy, now and forever. Now let's go save the galaxy!
dialog.name: HR_G163_L02

dialog.message: A pleasure to make your acquaintance, Agent. I'd like you to know I will always be fully truthful with you.
dialog.name: HR_G50_L01

dialog.message: That last sentence being the exception.
dialog.name: HR_G50_L02

dialog.message: The halls of Asgard have felt a bit empty as of late, with Midgard being this season's popular vacation destination.
dialog.name: HR_G113_L01

dialog.message: I am looking forward to traveling aboard your little cruise ship and taking in all the sights. I would like to see if it lives up to its reputation.
dialog.name: HR_G113_L02

dialog.message: It is a pleasure to make your acquaintance, Agent. My oathbrother speaks highly of you and your deeds.
dialog.name: HR_G112_L01

dialog.message: If you will have it, I will fight as your comrade in arms. Let us make good on this and all worlds.
dialog.name: HR_G112_L02

dialog.message: You’re officially a vampire hunter, Agent.
dialog.name: HR_G105_L01

dialog.message: Just make sure you keep a stake under your pillow.
dialog.name: HR_G105_L02

dialog.message: Oh man! Being asked to join S.H.I.E.L.D. is even better than joining the FBI. You get cooler gadgets than just the standard issue pistol. Real Double-Oh-Seven stuff.
dialog.name: HR_G117_L01

dialog.message: And Nico’s told me about how you’ve been stickin’ your neck out for us. So from now on, Agent, me and Old Lace got your back!
dialog.name: HR_G117_L02

dialog.message: I don't know much about you, Agent, but you seem pretty cool. I mean, just look at all the amazing heroes you have at your side.
dialog.name: HR_G118_L01

dialog.message: And now you want me to join too? Sign me up!
dialog.name: HR_G118_L02

dialog.message: You ain't gonna regret this, Agent. I know a lotta people wouldn't believe I'd go clean. You did. So, uh, y'know... thanks.
dialog.name: HR_G92_L01

dialog.message: Alright, enough of that crap. Let's get with the heroing already.
dialog.name: HR_G92_L02

dialog.message: Once, Agent, I was shadow. Now, I am the light that banishes the darkness.
dialog.name: HR_G93_L01

dialog.message: This world may be diseased, but fear not! For I... am the cure!
dialog.name: HR_G93_L02

dialog.message: I know what you are thinking, Agent...
dialog.name: HR_G30_L01

dialog.message: Remember that, and we can work together.
dialog.name: HR_G30_L02

dialog.message: Mephisto doesn't own me any more. You helped remind him of that.
dialog.name: HR_G37_L01

dialog.message: Looks like you and me'll be riding together awhile.
dialog.name: HR_G37_L02

dialog.message: Here's how this works: you point, I crush.
dialog.name: HR_G58_L01

dialog.message: Make sure nothin' you give a &$%# about is in the way.
dialog.name: HR_G58_L02

dialog.message: I hope you're ready to do what's necessary to win this fight, soldier.
dialog.name: HR_G57_L01

dialog.message: But if you're not... I am.
dialog.name: HR_G57_L02

dialog.message: Alright, Agent. I'm on the clock and ready to roll.
dialog.name: HR_G147_L01

dialog.message: Just point me in the direction of someone who needs their butt-kicked!
dialog.name: HR_G147_L02

dialog.message: You must think you're pretty cool, Agent. Palling around with all them heroes.
dialog.name: HR_G148_L01

dialog.message: But when push comes to shove, you come to little ol' Electro to bail you out. So what does that make your hero friends? Heheh!
dialog.name: HR_G148_L02

dialog.message: Don't mind that tingle in the back of your mind, Agent.
dialog.name: HR_G42_L01

dialog.message: That's just me watching your back.
dialog.name: HR_G42_L02

dialog.message: These symbiotes aren't like the others, Agent. In fact, I owe them a lot. You see, they were just in pain. Tortured. Alone. ...Like I was.
dialog.name: HR_G109_L01

dialog.message: They thought they needed me to ease their pain, when it was really me that needed them. I could have been another Carnage or Venom, but they kept me from going over the edge.
dialog.name: HR_G109_L02

dialog.message: Now, I have you to thank for freeing us. We have a chance to prove ourselves again. We won't waste it.
dialog.name: HR_G109_L03

dialog.message: This Helicarrier is Heli-cool! Can it go into space? I bet you'd run into all sorts of aliens in space. My friend Karolina says that you'd be surprised at how many aliens visit the Earth these days.
dialog.name: HR_G108_L01

dialog.message: I heard that Thor was an alien, but if he's an alien, where is his spaceship? All Thor has is a hammer and a really cute hat with feathers on it. Maybe that's how he got to Earth, by flying with his cool hat? Are we gonna meet Thor?
dialog.name: HR_G108_L02

dialog.message: Hey, does this mean I get a badge? All agents get a badge, right?
dialog.name: HR_G121_L01

dialog.message: Aw man! Come on! I should totally get a badge. I guess some Coisas never change.
dialog.name: HR_G121_L02

dialog.message: It is good to see the S.H.I.E.L.D. of this reality has some sense in making me the new Director.
dialog.name: HR_G122_L01

dialog.message: What's that!? I'm not the Director. ...I retract my previous statement. You're all idiots.
dialog.name: HR_G122_L02

dialog.message: Hey Agent, I hear you're vying for the best sidekick of the year award.
dialog.name: HR_G133_L01

dialog.message: You know what? You can have it. You can be the one to follow the Hulk around and keep him from smashing up the city too much, while I get to bask in the limelight. I'm okay with this.
dialog.name: HR_G133_L02

dialog.message: Agent, the thought of you and I working together will make our enemies Avalanche and tremble!
dialog.name: HR_G103_L01

dialog.message: ...see what I did there?
dialog.name: HR_G103_L02

dialog.message: Ultron gave me many powers, but the Avengers have given me the ability to choose how I use them.
dialog.name: HR_G52_L01

dialog.message: I choose to stand with you, Agent.
dialog.name: HR_G52_L02

dialog.message: I remember now. I remember being with my family, being... human.
dialog.name: HR_G53_L01

dialog.message: I'll never get back what they took from me, Agent, but perhaps now I can find a new path. Thank you.
dialog.name: HR_G53_L02

dialog.message: Ever hear of the Bloodstones, Agent? You should have.
dialog.name: HR_G138_L01

dialog.message: We are the best at slaying the Coisas that go bump in the night.
dialog.name: HR_G138_L02

dialog.message: Just don't spill my tea, and we'll get along fine.
dialog.name: HR_G138_L03

dialog.message: Looks like I owe you one, Agent. I was getting tired of the Hellfire Club anyway.
dialog.name: HR_G44_L01

dialog.message: Just don't expect me to bunk with Scott.
dialog.name: HR_G44_L02

dialog.message: Let us be clear, Agent. I will work with you so long as our goals coincide.
dialog.name: HR_G45_L01

dialog.message: After that... we shall see.
dialog.name: HR_G45_L02

dialog.message: Hi, Agent. It's great to be a part of your band. This is a crazy gig though, huh?
dialog.name: HR_G129_L01

dialog.message: I've been told we're gonna save the universe. I just hope we survive the show so we can play an encore.
dialog.name: HR_G129_L02

dialog.message: With your help, my thirst has been abated, Agent.
dialog.name: HR_G104_L01

dialog.message: Please allow me to repay you for your generosity.
dialog.name: HR_G104_L02

dialog.message: Come, Agent! Let us declare our allegiance in the sight of our enemies.
dialog.name: HR_G59_L01

dialog.message: Let us see them cower before the might of Thundra!
dialog.name: HR_G59_L02

dialog.message: If my father is collecting Iso-8, we need to collect it faster.
dialog.name: HR_G34_L01

dialog.message: Fortunately, "faster" is my specialty.
dialog.name: HR_G34_L02

dialog.message: ... Logan said you could use some help.
dialog.name: HR_G46_L01

dialog.message: If he trusts you, so do I.
dialog.name: HR_G46_L02

dialog.message: The brass says you could use a little help, Agent.
dialog.name: HR_G87_L01

dialog.message: You take the low road, and I'll take the high road.
dialog.name: HR_G87_L02

dialog.message: You are wise indeed to seek the aid of the mighty Hercules!
dialog.name: HR_G36_L01

dialog.message: Come, let us share the Gift of Battle with these miscreants!
dialog.name: HR_G36_L02

dialog.message: People ask me how I can live like this. The risks, the madness, the constant fighting.
dialog.name: HR_G72_L01

dialog.message: I think we understand each other, Agent. There is no other way to live.
dialog.name: HR_G72_L02

dialog.message: I hope I'm not too late to the party, mon ami. I'm always up for a good fight.
dialog.name: HR_G32_L01

dialog.message: Consider me your Ace in the hole.
dialog.name: HR_G32_L02

dialog.message: This world is a much better place than the one I came from.
dialog.name: HR_G66_L01

dialog.message: I intend to help you keep it that way.
dialog.name: HR_G66_L02

dialog.message: Whoever you need killed, I'll do it. Doesn't matter how dangerous it is.
dialog.name: HR_G65_L01

dialog.message: Remember, I've died once already. It wasn't that bad.
dialog.name: HR_G65_L02

dialog.message: I was once an agent of S.H.I.E.L.D., just like you. It feels good to be back.
dialog.name: HR_G13_L01

dialog.message: I've heard you have a problem with your enemies and Iso-8, Agent.
dialog.name: HR_G54_L01

dialog.message: You'll be happy to know I'm carrying the solution right here.
dialog.name: HR_G54_L02

dialog.message: My brother, Daniel, believes I should reject your offer. Death has made him distrustful.
dialog.name: HR_G75_L01

dialog.message: But the loa tell me someCoisa quite different, Agent. For now, our paths will run together.
dialog.name: HR_G75_L02

dialog.message: The galaxy isn't a nice place, Agent. And it's about to arrive on your doorstep.
dialog.name: HR_G91_L01

dialog.message: Consider my arrival a warning.
dialog.name: HR_G91_L02

dialog.message: You have succeeded in releasing me -- the ultimate avenger.
dialog.name: HR_G164_L01

dialog.message: Agent, with what little power I have left, I will do everyCoisa I can to save our reality.
dialog.name: HR_G164_L02

dialog.message: My brother gave his life building a legacy as the White Tiger, and my family was murdered in cold blood.
dialog.name: HR_G165_L01

dialog.message: I have seen the worst of humanity, Agent, and I have become the monster that even the monsters fear. Don’t worry, I’m not hunting you.
dialog.name: HR_G165_L02

dialog.message: Though it has always been my duty to carry the dead, it has never been my pleasure.
dialog.name: HR_G40_L01

dialog.message: Agent, I pledge to help you defend this realm.
dialog.name: HR_G40_L02

dialog.message: A lot of people underestimate the Savage Land, Agent. That's good. Someone needs to keep the dinosaurs fed.
dialog.name: HR_G94_L01

dialog.message: But you seem to respect the land. For that, you have my friendship, and my spear.
dialog.name: HR_G94_L02

dialog.message: For millennia, my people held themselves apart from the concerns of humanity. But this new, darker era requires a firmer hand.
dialog.name: HR_G100_L01

dialog.message: The Inhumans will stand at your side.
dialog.name: HR_G100_L02

dialog.message: ... You find Thanos, I get first cut.
dialog.name: HR_G95_L01

dialog.message: Otherwise, your call. The rest is just waiting.
dialog.name: HR_G95_L02

dialog.message: You've got a lot of talented people here, Agent. I'm not sure how much I can bring to the table...
dialog.name: HR_G60_L01

dialog.message: But if you want me, I'm in.
dialog.name: HR_G60_L02

dialog.message: Alright, Agent, let's get this show on the road.
dialog.name: HR_G61_L01

dialog.message: ...Oh, and tell Hercules to stop giving me the stink-eye, will ya?
dialog.name: HR_G61_L02

dialog.message: You keep S.H.I.E.L.D. out of my way, Agent, and I'll keep putting bullets in every scumbag that thinks Iso-8 is their newest toy.
dialog.name: HR_G43_L01

dialog.message: Everybody wins.
dialog.name: HR_G43_L02

dialog.message: So you finally got around to inviting me, huh?
dialog.name: HR_G83_L01

dialog.message: Watch out, ladies, Homeme de Gelo's joined the party!
dialog.name: HR_G83_L02

dialog.message: That was a rather bad scrape you just got out of, Agent. Can you tell me how many fingers I am holding up?
dialog.name: HR_G161_L01

dialog.message: Why yes, I am the new recruit, but I am also a Doctor. Stop fidgeting so much. Now, open your mouth and say “Ahhhh.”
dialog.name: HR_G161_L02

dialog.message: The X-Men are with you, Agent.
dialog.name: HR_G04_L01

dialog.message: Iso-8 in the wrong hands is a menace to everyone.
dialog.name: HR_G04_L02

dialog.message: Thanks for the invite. Looks like a fun party.
dialog.name: HR_G27_L01

dialog.message: Don't get too comfortable, Agent Barton.
dialog.name: HR_G27_L02

dialog.message: Wasn't planning to. Ready when you are, Agent.
dialog.name: HR_G27_L03

dialog.message: You can count on the Fantastic Four whenever you need to call us in.
dialog.name: HR_G09_L01

dialog.message: Seems like the armed forces of the U.S.A. ought to have a role in all this.
dialog.name: HR_G25_L01

dialog.message: Maquina de Guerra está pronto e preparado para o combate.
dialog.name: HR_G25_L02

dialog.message: Hey, I been waitin' to get invited to this dance.
dialog.name: HR_G23_L01

dialog.message: It's clobberin' time!
dialog.name: HR_G23_L02

dialog.message: We have to stop the spread of Iso-8.
dialog.name: HR_G17_L01

dialog.message: If you can do that, I'm on board.
dialog.name: HR_G17_L02

dialog.message: Make you a deal. You let me fly the Helicarrier, I'm in.
dialog.name: HR_G15_L01

dialog.message: Kidding. Glad to help any way I can.
dialog.name: HR_G15_L02

dialog.message: Time is not on our side, Agent. We must act before our enemies control Iso-8.
dialog.name: HR_G22_L01

dialog.message: Count on me.
dialog.name: HR_G22_L02

dialog.message: Glad to join up, Agent! I always wanted to be a super spy. I'm good at 'sneaking in' when I'm late for class.
dialog.name: HR_G111_L01

dialog.message: I just hope you don't make me do any flight deck Remote Ops. I got a 'C' in Geography.
dialog.name: HR_G111_L02

dialog.message: Wakanda has no need of S.H.I.E.L.D., but S.H.I.E.L.D. has need of Wakanda.
dialog.name: HR_G28_L01

dialog.message: As long as our goals align, I will fight by your side.
dialog.name: HR_G28_L02

dialog.message: Experience has taught me never to trust a polHomeme de Gelo. Just when you think one's all right, they turn corrupt.
dialog.name: HR_G123_L01

dialog.message: Alright, Agent. I'm going to trust you, but don't go proving me right.
dialog.name: HR_G123_L02

dialog.message: It's good to finally meet you, Agent. The Director speaks highly of you.
dialog.name: HR_G124_L01

dialog.message: Just...pro tip, if anyone asks you if you want a vacation, don't go to Tahiti, okay?
dialog.name: HR_G124_L02

dialog.message: Feels weird to be making an honest living. At least, as honest as it ever gets, eh Agent?
dialog.name: HR_G90_L01

dialog.message: ... oh yeah, and sorry about that shield in the face last time. No hard feelings, right?
dialog.name: HR_G90_L02

dialog.message: Right, I'll need a S.H.I.E.L.D. credit card, company car, munitions budget, munitions vault, females to admire munitions...
dialog.name: HR_G88_L01

dialog.message: Oh, and uh, glad to be aboard, Agent. Can't wait to murder guys with ya.
dialog.name: HR_G88_L02

dialog.message: Agente, você precisa saber que algo é bom apenas olhando para elas.
dialog.name: HR_G125_L01

dialog.message: Por que coisas boas vem em pacotes pequenos! Sacou? Homem Formiga... Pacote Pequeno... Ahh você entendeu!
dialog.name: HR_G125_L02

dialog.message: Agent, you seem confused. Fury was an old comrade of mine. He and I had a little chat after our last encounter.
dialog.name: HR_G145_L01

dialog.message: These Incursions offer a great opportunity for even greater hunts! I shall be your comrade, Agent. Let us hunt together.
dialog.name: HR_G145_L02

dialog.message: Good afternoon, Agent. Ah yesss, this must be quite surprising.
dialog.name: HR_G146_L01

dialog.message: No need to worry. I am fully in control of my animal inssstincts. Well, for now at least. You trussst Spider-Man don't you?
dialog.name: HR_G146_L02

dialog.message: He wants to thank you for everyCoisa you've done for the Inhumans, Agent.
dialog.name: HR_G69_L02

dialog.message: You can count him as an ally, now and in the future.
dialog.name: HR_G69_L03

dialog.message: I don't know what those creatures wanted with me... and thanks to you, I'll never have to find out.
dialog.name: HR_G70_L01

dialog.message: If you'll help me understand this power I have, I'll help you in any way I can, Agent.
dialog.name: HR_G70_L02

dialog.message: This is the man who resurrected the Red Skull! I won't work with a terrorist. None of us will!
dialog.name: HR_G80_L03

dialog.message: Then I will stand alone. When has Doom ever needed the company of fools?
dialog.name: HR_G80_L04

dialog.message: You're about ta get the company of my fist, ya rotten sack of--
dialog.name: HR_G80_L05

dialog.message: Enough! Doom has knowledge of Incursions that we need. The Agent will accompany him at all times to make sure he behaves. End of story.
dialog.name: HR_G80_L06

dialog.message: Dr. Strange and I have been observing Doom's activities for some time now. We believe his desire to work in tandem with S.H.I.E.L.D. to end the Incursion threat is sincere.
dialog.name: HR_G80_L07

dialog.message: Watch him, Agent. Doom needs us for someCoisa, but the second he doesn't, he'll try to destroy us. Use his power, find out what he wants... and be ready.
dialog.name: HR_G80_L08

dialog.message: In other words, you get to babysit the crazy cyber warlock. Have fun!
dialog.name: HR_G80_L09

dialog.message: I object to this. In the strongest possible terms.
dialog.name: HR_G80_L01

dialog.message: As always, Richards, your objections are irrelevant.
dialog.name: HR_G80_L02

dialog.message: Luck seems to have brought us together, Agent... or perhaps it wasn't luck at all.
dialog.name: HR_G76_L01

dialog.message: Don't think about it too hard. You'll get a headache.
dialog.name: HR_G76_L02

dialog.message: Thanks for letting me out of that cell, Agent. Glad to be on the team.
dialog.name: HR_G77_L01

dialog.message: Oh, by the way... If I ever get this bomb out of my head, I'm going to kill ya.
dialog.name: HR_G77_L02

dialog.message: I know I'm not the easiest man to work with, Agent. But I also know I have a lot to contribute to your cause.
dialog.name: HR_G49_L01

dialog.message: If you want me on board, I'm yours.
dialog.name: HR_G49_L02

dialog.message: About time I got in on this action.
dialog.name: HR_G08_L01

dialog.message: Let's giddy up!
dialog.name: HR_G08_L02

dialog.message: If we're going after Magneto, I'm all yours.
dialog.name: HR_G11_L01

dialog.message: And if we're not, I'll still pitch in when you need me.
dialog.name: HR_G11_L02

dialog.message: Family's very important to me, Agent. My father used to say that with great power comes great responsibility.
dialog.name: HR_G132_L01

dialog.message: My father was one of my Earth's greatest heroes. I can only dream of living up to his legend.
dialog.name: HR_G132_L02

dialog.message: What? Never seen an ankle bracelet before? I know. Clashes with the suit doesn't it?
dialog.name: HR_G155_L01

dialog.message: Well, if you guys didn't think I would run the first chance I get, we wouldn't have this fashion crisis. So you're going to take it off right?
dialog.name: HR_G155_L02

dialog.message: No? Well, it was worth a shot. Can't blame a girl for trying.
dialog.name: HR_G155_L03

dialog.message: Whatever our enemies think they're doing with Iso-8, we'll do them one better.
dialog.name: HR_G14_L01

dialog.message: Hey, Agent. Glad to be back on the ol' mudball. Love what you've done with the place...
dialog.name: HR_G99_L01

dialog.message: ... except for that whole dubstep Coisa. Which supervillain thought of that?
dialog.name: HR_G99_L02

dialog.message: Ready for deployment, Agent. Rest assured, I have full control. I'm not the symbiote.
dialog.name: HR_G81_L01

dialog.message: And if you want the symbiote... well, I'd strongly advise you to reconsider. Sir.
dialog.name: HR_G81_L02

dialog.message: Shall we dance together on the battlefield, my dear Agent?
dialog.name: HR_G71_L01

dialog.message: Don't worry, I'll show you the steps. Just try to keep up.
dialog.name: HR_G71_L02

dialog.message: So, I've been "asked" to assist you, Agent.
dialog.name: HR_G134_L01

dialog.message: Let it be known that I do this reluctantly and with deep resentment. With that out of the way, let us proceed.
dialog.name: HR_G134_L02

dialog.message: This Isotope-8 is fascinating, isn't it? I can feel its power resonating with my own.
dialog.name: HR_G29_L01

dialog.message: I will join you, Agent, and we can discover its mysteries together.
dialog.name: HR_G29_L02

dialog.message: Hi there, Agent. Misty said you needed some extra help out there?
dialog.name: HR_G141_L01

dialog.message: How do I know you? Well, news kind of spreads fast in the super hero community, and I'm a total gossip magnet.
dialog.name: HR_G141_L02

dialog.message: Don't worry, they mostly say nice Coisas about you...mostly.
dialog.name: HR_G141_L03

dialog.message: What’s y’r problem? You never seen a walking, talking duck before?
dialog.name: HR_G142_L01

dialog.message: Look, when S.H.I.E.L.D. sent me to ya, I took an unscheduled detour through Fury’s closet. So just leave everyCoisa ta’ me.
dialog.name: HR_G142_L02

dialog.message: And if these gadgets and gizmos don’t do us any good, I happen to know a bit of Quack-Fu! Stick with me kid, I've saved the universe more than a couple of times.
dialog.name: HR_G142_L03

dialog.message: You may not always see me, but I'll always be there, Agent. Count on it.
dialog.name: HR_G47_L01

dialog.message: Pretty sure I've got at least three or four lives left in me, Agent.
dialog.name: HR_G41_L01

dialog.message: I can spare one for a good cause.
dialog.name: HR_G41_L02

dialog.message: You can keep that Avengers card, Agent. I don't need your approval or anyone else's.
dialog.name: HR_G82_L01

dialog.message: Just tell me what needs to be done, and I'll help if I agree.
dialog.name: HR_G82_L02

dialog.message: Listen, Agent. I'm not just some machine-man assassin. I have a life, a daughter.
dialog.name: HR_G119_L01

dialog.message: I want to make this world a better place for her. That's someCoisa worth fighting for.
dialog.name: HR_G119_L02

dialog.message: I am Groot.
dialog.name: HR_G98_L01

dialog.message: He says he's happy to be on the team, Agent, but he could use some soil.
dialog.name: HR_G98_L02

dialog.message: I am Groot!
dialog.name: HR_G98_L03

dialog.message: Hahaha! Oh man. I ain't repeatin' that one.
dialog.name: HR_G98_L04

dialog.message: I believe we may have met before, Agent. I was robbing a jewelry store at the time.
dialog.name: HR_G159_L01

dialog.message: But that's all in the past now. I just want to make the world a better place now.
dialog.name: HR_G159_L02

dialog.message: Asgard wishes it to be known that they support S.H.I.E.L.D.
dialog.name: HR_G19_L01

dialog.message: I will represent the Rainbow Bridge and all the Aesir in this war.
dialog.name: HR_G19_L02

dialog.message: My task is to protect Midgard and its people.
dialog.name: HR_G24_L01

dialog.message: I look forward to fighting with you, Agent.
dialog.name: HR_G24_L02

dialog.message: Ah'm glad to join the team, Agent! I had a bet going with Bobby over who would get the invite first.
dialog.name: HR_G96_L01

dialog.message: So if a young man on fire goes streaking through Brazil's next World Cup match... well, y'all know he held up his end of the bargain.
dialog.name: HR_G96_L02

dialog.message: Anyone who crosses mutants, crosses me.
dialog.name: HR_G97_L01

dialog.message: That includes anyone in S.H.I.E.L.D., Agent. I may be working for you, but I ain't forgotten my people.
dialog.name: HR_G97_L02

dialog.message: Earth. It's small. Isn't it Agent?
dialog.name: HR_G158_L01

dialog.message: Compared to the rest of the galaxy, it's just a spec in infinity. Yet, when it comes down to it, it's the center of the universe.
dialog.name: HR_G158_L02

dialog.message: It sure feels good to be home.
dialog.name: HR_G158_L03

dialog.message: Ah, hello! You don’t look villainous, far from it. I am Knight America, a patriot of the realm.
dialog.name: HR_G160_L01

dialog.message: The flow of reality is convoluted. Our fates are intertwined, it seems.
dialog.name: HR_G160_L02

dialog.message: Let us be true brothers in arms! I would relish the chance to assist you in the future. Hah hah hah!
dialog.name: HR_G160_L03

dialog.message: Agent, it's an honor to meet you. I mean with all the Coisas you've done in the past...
dialog.name: HR_G128_L01

dialog.message: What Coisas? Wait, what year is it again?
dialog.name: HR_G128_L02

dialog.message: I should keep my shocking mouth shut sometimes. Just forget I said anyCoisa. Just happy to be aboard.
dialog.name: HR_G128_L03

dialog.message: Agent, thank you for giving me a second chance! Iron Man said I can take my Blizzard Battlesuit out of cold storage.
dialog.name: HR_G130_L01

dialog.message: If you ever need any backup, you can count on me, Agent... as... long as it’s not someCoisa too terrifying, or life threatening, or some other-worldy abomination with sharp pointy teeth. I might get cold feet.
dialog.name: HR_G130_L02

dialog.message: You don't want Hulk for brains, do you?
dialog.name: HR_G07_L01

dialog.message: That's all right. Hulk doesn't want you for brains, either.
dialog.name: HR_G07_L02

dialog.message: Tis my honor and my pleasure to fight by thy side, Agent.
dialog.name: HR_G85_L01

dialog.message: ... though 'twouldst be an even greater pleasure if thou wouldst introduce me to yon emerald-hued maiden.
dialog.name: HR_G85_L02

dialog.message: Agent, I think you already know what I will and won't do for S.H.I.E.L.D.
dialog.name: HR_G56_L01

dialog.message: So long as you understand that, we can work together.
dialog.name: HR_G56_L02

dialog.message: You are doing excellent work, Agent. I'm proud to be part of it.
dialog.name: HR_G10_L01

dialog.message: I hear you're good at your job, Agent.
dialog.name: HR_G136_L01

dialog.message: I bet I can make you even better.
dialog.name: HR_G136_L02

dialog.message: Power you can't control ain't real power, it's a curse. You can't control this Iso stuff, Sugah.
dialog.name: HR_G31_L01

dialog.message: I'll help, but don't expect me to hold yer hand.
dialog.name: HR_G31_L02

dialog.message: My dad used to tell me that friends make you weak while allies make you stronger.
dialog.name: HR_G152_L01

dialog.message: But he also made his money from reanimating corpses and selling genocidal terminators. I hope I can be your friend as well as your ally Agent.
dialog.name: HR_G152_L02

dialog.message: S.H.I.E.L.D. and I haven't always seen eye to eye, Agent.
dialog.name: HR_G21_L01

dialog.message: If ever there was a time to mend fences, though, this is it. I'm in.
dialog.name: HR_G21_L02

dialog.message: I spent my life sweeping trash off the streets of this city.
dialog.name: HR_G12_L01

dialog.message: Iso-8 just means we got a different kind of trash. Let's get to it.
dialog.name: HR_G12_L02

dialog.message: Hey, I was hoping I wouldn't be the last one asked to dance.
dialog.name: HR_G20_L01

dialog.message: Point me at the bad guys and let's go!
dialog.name: HR_G20_L02

dialog.message: So you want my help with this Iso-8 business?
dialog.name: HR_G39_L01

dialog.message: Hell, it's about time.
dialog.name: HR_G39_L02

dialog.message: I know the rest of the team thinks I'll betray you, Agent. I don't care.
dialog.name: HR_G79_L01

dialog.message: You stand by me, and I'll stand by you.
dialog.name: HR_G79_L02

dialog.message: Wait, you want me to join S.H.I.E.L.D.? For real?
dialog.name: HR_G78_L01

dialog.message: ... Alright, but if you try to make me do any government oppressor-type stuff, you'll regret it.
dialog.name: HR_G78_L02

dialog.message: Do not worry, Agent. The essence I have collected to power the Destroyer will prevent it from disobeying your orders.
dialog.name: HR_G116_L02

dialog.message: It's perfectly safe. Trust me.
dialog.name: HR_G116_L03

dialog.message: The Lord of Stars has informed me that you are capable in the art of the hunt, Agent of S.H.I.E.L.D.
dialog.name: HR_G115_L01

dialog.message: Do not disappoint me.
dialog.name: HR_G115_L02

dialog.message: Shall we dance together on the battlefield?
dialog.name: HR_G68_L01

dialog.message: Don't worry, I'll show you the steps. Just try to keep up.
dialog.name: HR_G68_L02

dialog.message: You've been so good to me, Agent. I suppose I can stay awhile longer.
dialog.name: HR_G64_L01

dialog.message: Just make sure you keep me entertained. I get hungry when I'm bored.
dialog.name: HR_G64_L02

dialog.message: You're either incredibly brave or a glutton for suffering if you want me on your team, Agent.
dialog.name: HR_G63_L01

dialog.message: In the interests of friendship, let's say it's bravery. Count me in.
dialog.name: HR_G63_L02

dialog.message: My furry buddies here say that you're doing a great job, Agent!
dialog.name: HR_G67_L01

dialog.message: ... Seriously, you should be flattered. They're not easy to impress!
dialog.name: HR_G67_L02

dialog.message: I'm not much of a joiner, Agent. But I'll do what's needed.
dialog.name: HR_G01_L01

dialog.message: Excuse me, you must be the Agent of S.H.I.E.L.D. Peter was telling me about.
dialog.name: HR_G156_L01

dialog.message: ...So that's your future? Very interesting. This one would be honored to assist you.
dialog.name: HR_G156_L02

dialog.message: Yes, I'm reading your mind. No, I don't really care how you feel about it.
dialog.name: HR_G157_L01

dialog.message: It's better if you just accept it and move on. ...That's a horrible thought, you should be ashamed of yourself.
dialog.name: HR_G157_L02

dialog.message: It's going to take everyCoisa we've got to meet this threat. But as the Germans say:
dialog.name: HR_G16_L01

dialog.message: Ende gut, alles gut.
dialog.name: HR_G16_L02

dialog.message: Sometimes I am criticized for being too reluctant to fight.
dialog.name: HR_G03_L01

dialog.message: Now will not be one of those times.
dialog.name: HR_G03_L02

dialog.message: I may not be a true angel, but I can see the good in you, Agent.
dialog.name: HR_G62_L01

dialog.message: What wounds we find, we will heal together.
dialog.name: HR_G62_L02

dialog.message: So you're the G-Man that busted me out of Zemo's prison? Guess I should be thanking you.
dialog.name: HR_G149_L01

dialog.message: I'm no good at being a kid, so if you need someone who can hold their own, you can count on me
dialog.name: HR_G149_L02

dialog.message: Those that break the law of Ka-Zar must pay the price!
dialog.name: HR_G101_L01

dialog.message: They will face our wrath together, Man of S.H.I.E.L.D.
dialog.name: HR_G101_L02

dialog.message: The secrets of space and time are mine alone to hold, Agent. All you need to know is that the Incursions threaten the totality of existence.
dialog.name: HR_G102_L01

dialog.message: If you wish to see the future... ANY future... you will join your strength to mine.
dialog.name: HR_G102_L02

dialog.message: So you're the Agent we've been hearing so much about? It's nice to finally meet you.
dialog.name: HR_G150_L01

dialog.message: Are you ready to walk in the shadows?
dialog.name: HR_G150_L02

dialog.message: Don't mind him. Cloak just likes to be intimidating. The type of people we usually deal with...well, maybe you can understand why he seems a little foreboding.
dialog.name: HR_G150_L03

dialog.message: That. Or maybe it's because I can feed off the lifeforce of another. No need to worry, just as long as Dagger is around.
dialog.name: HR_G150_L04

dialog.message: Seriously, Ty. You can be horrible sometimes.
dialog.name: HR_G150_L05

dialog.message: You look nervous, Agent. You're shaking.
dialog.name: HR_G151_L01

dialog.message: Oh wait, that's just me.
dialog.name: HR_G151_L02

dialog.message: "Peacekeeping" with S.H.I.E.L.D. wasn't exactly what I had in mind when I told Nico we should "give peace a chance."
dialog.name: HR_G114_L01

dialog.message: But if Nico trusts you, Agent, then I will too. Besides, if you're having Molly on board, someone has to look after her.
dialog.name: HR_G114_L02

dialog.message: What a bargain right? I mean way better than Wolverine! That guy's a waste of 90CP.
dialog.name: HR_G35_L01

dialog.message: Who needs claws when you have pouches?!
dialog.name: HR_G35_L02

dialog.message: Rejoice, Agent, for Volstagg has seen fit to join thy party!
dialog.name: HR_G86_L01

dialog.message: Show me thy enemies and thy buffet, and forthwith I shall dispatch both with equal vigor!
dialog.name: HR_G86_L02

dialog.message: Iso-8 is a crisis that knows no country or border.
dialog.name: HR_G48_L01

dialog.message: Great Britain stands with S.H.I.E.L.D., Agent.
dialog.name: HR_G48_L02

dialog.message: Oh, uh, hey, listen. I haven't really been at this that long, but...
dialog.name: HR_G131_L01

dialog.message: I'm here to help. You helped rescue me from that Goblin guy, and this isn't over by a longshot.
dialog.name: HR_G131_L02

dialog.message: Just let me know what I can do to help.
dialog.name: HR_G131_L03

dialog.message: I heard from my husband about you, Agent.
dialog.name: HR_G139_L01

dialog.message: Remind me to introduce you to Danielle sometime. I'm always looking for potential babysitters.
dialog.name: HR_G139_L02

dialog.message: Hey Agent! Good to see you! How's the family?
dialog.name: HR_G140_L01

dialog.message: What? Just because I whacked you across the head a few times in the past doesn't mean we can't be friends.
dialog.name: HR_G140_L02

dialog.message: Whether wrought by my hand or yours, chaos is my coin, Agent.
dialog.name: HR_G74_L01

dialog.message: And I foresee great profit from our alliance.
dialog.name: HR_G74_L02

dialog.message: Odin has seen fit to grant you my services so long as you remain a friend of Asgard.
dialog.name: HR_G73_L01

dialog.message: No enemy of thine shall escape my sight.
dialog.name: HR_G73_L02

dialog.message: Always remember this, Agent. Mortals can be gods when they stand up for what they believe in.
dialog.name: HR_G153_L01

dialog.message: Dark times loom on the horizon, but I know we can stand against any threat as long as we stand together.
dialog.name: HR_G153_L02

dialog.message: I will always stand with you, Agent.
dialog.name: HR_G153_L03

dialog.message: Agent, I am here to let you know that I will do whatever is right, wherever and whenever it needs to be done.
dialog.name: HR_G154_L01

dialog.message: I do not care for what anyone may think. Not anymore.
dialog.name: HR_G154_L02

dialog.message: If Cap's on your side, you must be doing someCoisa right, Agent.
dialog.name: HR_G55_L01

dialog.message: Count me in.
dialog.name: HR_G55_L02

dialog.message: You have my sword, Agent.
dialog.name: HR_G51_L01

dialog.message: ... Come on, you knew I was going to say it.
dialog.name: HR_G51_L02

dialog.message: If the world hasn't ended already, I'll pitch in to keep it spinning a little longer.
dialog.name: HR_G26_L01

dialog.message: Glad to be on board, Agent.
dialog.name: HR_G02_L01

dialog.message: My first responsibility is to the people in my neighborhood, Agent.
dialog.name: HR_G05_L01

dialog.message: But if you need me, I'll be there.
dialog.name: HR_G05_L02

dialog.message: There's noCoisa I'd rather do than fight this battle, Agent. Glad you asked.
dialog.name: HR_G18_L01

dialog.message: Our enemies are many. We must be strong in our alliance.
dialog.name: HR_G06_L01

dialog.message: I will contribute what knowledge I can.
dialog.name: HR_G06_L02

dialog.message: Let's get this straight, Agent. I don't need to be watched, not by you, not by S.H.I.E.L.D., and definitely not by Bruce or my father.
dialog.name: HR_G144_L01

dialog.message: I'm not a damsel that needs saving. I'm here because I want to be there fighting with the rest of you. We clear? Good. Let's kick some butt!
dialog.name: HR_G144_L02

dialog.message: Mine is the power to understand weakness, Agent. You are a weakness.
dialog.name: HR_G106_L01

dialog.message: You are the keystone. EveryCoisa will fall apart without your support.
dialog.name: HR_G106_L02

dialog.message: I offer my assistance, so that all we hope to achieve comes to fruition.
dialog.name: HR_G106_L03

dialog.message: Let me guess. Fury told you to keep an eye on me. Smart move. I'd do that too if I were him.
dialog.name: HR_G143_L01

dialog.message: Says a lot about you though. I know enough to know that Fury doesn't trust many people. I'd say he trusts you. Alright, Agent. Where do we go from here?
dialog.name: HR_G143_L02

dialog.message: It only took me 0.37 seconds to come to the decision to offer S.H.I.E.L.D. my expertise.
dialog.name: HR_G107_L01

dialog.message: You took considerably longer to accept. Let's hope for some improvements in the near future.
dialog.name: HR_G107_L02

dialog.message: "But just disease to luxury succeeds, and ev'ry death its own avenger breeds." - Alexander Pope.
dialog.name: HR_G38_L01

dialog.message: The luxury of Isotope-8 has its drawbacks, Agent. Let us work together to overcome them.
dialog.name: HR_G38_L02

dialog.message: Well look at you, Agent. You picked up another Gavião Arqueiro. Did that dummy Clint put you up to this?
dialog.name: HR_G120_L01

dialog.message: No need to worry though, I'm the Gavião Arqueiro with a lot less drama. So in that department, good choice.
dialog.name: HR_G120_L02

dialog.message: I have been told that we will be working together, Agent.
dialog.name: HR_G127_L01

dialog.message: I hope you can be my guide to your world. Perhaps you can tell me what a selfie is?
dialog.name: HR_G127_L02

dialog.message: Oh, hey there, Agent. Sorry, I was just thinking about my world, my friends...my family.
dialog.name: HR_G126_L01

dialog.message: You know, my father once told me there's no way to get a good story, to do a good job, without embedding yourself in the dirt.
dialog.name: HR_G126_L02

dialog.message: It's definitely a mess out there, so... for better or worse... I'm your girl.
dialog.name: HR_G126_L03

dialog.message: Gaining the support of the Inhuman Royal Family is no small feat. There was a time when our law would forbid it.
dialog.name: HR_G110_L01

dialog.message: Trust me, I know... Bending the law of Attlian is much more difficult than bending the elements. I'm glad to be here.
dialog.name: HR_G110_L02

dialog.message: I'll go to hell and back for you, Agent.
dialog.name: HR_G33_L01

dialog.message: It's easy.
dialog.name: HR_G33_L02

dialog.message: Ah, Agent. Delighted to make your acquaintance. I look forward to working with you in the field.
dialog.name: HR_G135_L01

dialog.message: Don't worry. I don't bite...much.
dialog.name: HR_G135_L02

dialog.message: Welcome back to the Smoke. Avalanche has preceded you, and I think he had Beast with him...although the mental image I got wasn't exactly the Beast I knew.
dialog.name: SM16_G40_L01

dialog.message: We'll take all the help we can get, Miss Braddock. AnyCoisa else we should know before we start the operation?
dialog.name: SM16_G40_L02

dialog.message: My brother tangled with Selene recently, if that's helpful. She won't be too far away from any of this.
dialog.name: SM16_G40_L03

dialog.message: I wouldn't be shocked if she's running the London side of whatever operation Sinister and the Brotherhood are organizing.
dialog.name: SM16_G40_L04

dialog.message: Neither would I. But let's get out there and find out. More importantly, let's find Hank McCoy.
dialog.name: SM16_G40_L05

dialog.message: We've tracked Rogue to San Francisco, thanks to Charles Xavieravier's telepathic abilities.
dialog.name: SM16_G23_L01

dialog.message: I have been unable to narrow her location down more specifically than this area of the city. But she is here, and she is alive...
dialog.name: SM16_G23_L02

dialog.message: ...although her psyche is under enormous stress.
dialog.name: SM16_G23_L03

dialog.message: As is to be expected, if either Sugar Man or Senhor Sinistro have captured her.
dialog.name: SM16_G23_L04

dialog.message: Or both. We must be prepared for the worst, which would be a return of Apocalypse. The signs, if you will forgive the loaded language, are quite clear.
dialog.name: SM16_G23_L05

dialog.message: Toad and Living Pharaoh are also in San Francisco. It seems likely that they transported Rogue here. Track them down and you will find Rogue as well.
dialog.name: SM16_G23_L06

dialog.message: Here's what we know. Apocalypse has returned, and he's got four new Horsemen ready to ride.
dialog.name: SM16_G57_L01

dialog.message: Homeme de Gelo has become his Horseman of Death, back here in New York.
dialog.name: SM16_G57_L02

dialog.message: For Apocalypse, this is a test of who's fit to survive in his new mutant world.
dialog.name: SM16_G57_L03

dialog.message: If we don't do someCoisa, a lot of people are going to die.
dialog.name: SM16_G57_L04

dialog.message: We've got another complication. Mobilized mutants have drawn the attention of Sentinels.
dialog.name: SM16_G57_L05

dialog.message: They are deploying throughout the city, going after anyone they see as a threat to order…Mutants and Homo sapiens alike.
dialog.name: SM16_G57_L06

dialog.message: While we get ready to face down the Horseman of Death, we also need to protect this city from the Sentinels. Cap, Angel, Cable: it's going to be on your shoulders.
dialog.name: SM16_G57_L07

dialog.message: Whatever happens, Bobby's never going to be the same. I can tell you that from experience.
dialog.name: SM16_G57_L08

dialog.message: We have a qualified victory, people. Now Homeme de Gelo knows he's got a fight on his hands, and so does Apocalypse.
dialog.name: SM16_G58_L01

dialog.message: My guess is Apocalypse will rally all four Horsemen together if he sees we can handle them individually.
dialog.name: SM16_G58_L02

dialog.message: That's when we'll settle this for good. Either we carry the day, or...
dialog.name: SM16_G58_L03

dialog.message: We'll carry the day, sir. Because there's no other choice.
dialog.name: SM16_G58_L04

dialog.message: Agent, we're sending Wolverine out on a mission to find Beast--or maybe we should call him Pestilence. While Wolverine searches, we've got a Sentinel problem to handle.
dialog.name: SM16_G74_L01

dialog.message: They're landing all over London, reacting to Apocalypse's mutant uprising.
dialog.name: SM16_G74_L02

dialog.message: With typical Sentinel finesse, they're firing on any persons they consider a potential threat.
dialog.name: SM16_G74_L03

dialog.message: We've got lives to save...and a Horseman to unseat.
dialog.name: SM16_G74_L04

dialog.message: Bad situation. I like Hank, but war is hell.
dialog.name: SM16_G74_L05

dialog.message: Agente Coulson. Beast appeared in New York shortly after Wolverine tangled with him here.
dialog.name: SM16_G75_L01

dialog.message: That's where Apocalypse is planning his final showdown...so that's where we need to be.
dialog.name: SM16_G75_L02

dialog.message: We'll be right there with you.
dialog.name: SM16_G75_L03

dialog.message: Much appreciated, Captain Braddock. Excalibur is always a welcome addition to the team.
dialog.name: SM16_G75_L04

dialog.message: The Horseman of War has come to Wakanda.
dialog.name: SM16_G91_L01

dialog.message: That's why we're here, T'Challa.
dialog.name: SM16_G91_L02

dialog.message: It appears that Sentinels have come to seize this Horseman as well, and while Sentinels roam Wakanda, no mutant is safe.
dialog.name: SM16_G91_L03

dialog.message: We'll handle the Sentinels, and we'll handle X-23. Least we can do.
dialog.name: SM16_G91_L04

dialog.message: I'll set up a perimeter and engage Sentinels as I find them. X-23 was never known for patience. She'll strike sooner rather than later.
dialog.name: SM16_G91_L05

dialog.message: Then we will be ready sooner rather than later.
dialog.name: SM16_G91_L06

dialog.message: You have purged Wakanda of this menace. Now Wakanda will come to your aid in the final battle against Apocalypse.
dialog.name: SM16_G92_L01

dialog.message: Thank you, T'Challa. We would have been here even without the quid pro quo.
dialog.name: SM16_G92_L02

dialog.message: And I would have fought with you either way as well. Let us finish this.
dialog.name: SM16_G92_L03

dialog.message: Rogue has not left San Francisco since her transformation.
dialog.name: SM16_G108_L01

dialog.message: Avalanche is here now, too. There's a full-scale assault on Utopia shaping up, complete with Sentinels.
dialog.name: SM16_G108_L02

dialog.message: Apocalypse has chosen this location to demoralize mutants who would oppose him.
dialog.name: SM16_G108_L03

dialog.message: He's not the only one who can send a message.
dialog.name: SM16_G108_L04

dialog.message: Apocalypse is calling all of the Horsemen to New York. We must face them there, and decide this battle.
dialog.name: SM16_G109_L01

dialog.message: To the Quinjets, then. I'm tanned, rested, and ready.
dialog.name: SM16_G109_L02

dialog.message: All hands on deck. Gambit, we'll fly together. We've got a couple of Coisas to sort out along the way.
dialog.name: SM16_G109_L03

dialog.message: No fighting in-flight, gentlemen. Quinjets are expensive, and if you crash, you're going to miss the big finale.
dialog.name: SM16_G109_L04

dialog.message: Back in the Smoke. Agent, we've got an excellent guide here to the habits and vulnerabilities of the vampire. Meet Eric Brooks, better known as Blade.
dialog.name: SM22_G37_L01

dialog.message: He's from London and he's half vampire, so he's going to be an asset to us in several different ways. Blade, thanks for coming in.
dialog.name: SM22_G37_L02

dialog.message: If you're here to kill vampires, you're in the right place.
dialog.name: SM22_G37_L03

dialog.message: Psylocke will be leading Strike Team Lamia here in London. We'll also have Fantomex--and Blade. We don't want to waste his expertise.
dialog.name: SM22_G37_L04

dialog.message: Your primary task is to locate and collect the Darkhold. We know it's in London, and we suspect the Hellfire Club has it. Strange needs it to conduct the ritual that will counter what Dracula and Mephisto have done.
dialog.name: SM22_G37_L05

dialog.message: But along the way, we're going to kill a large number of vampires.
dialog.name: SM22_G37_L06

dialog.message: Ready, Agent? Let's move. Dawn's not going to come if we don't find this book.
dialog.name: SM22_G37_L07

dialog.message: I'll canvas Hellfire Club houses and see if we can't do this the easy way. Sebastian Shaw is a sociopath, but even he might find a permanently nocturnal London full of vampires an inconvenience.
dialog.name: SM22_G37_L08

dialog.message: Okay, we have the book, we pissed off Shaw, Blade got to decapitate a bunch of vampires...everyone happy?
dialog.name: SM22_G38_L01

dialog.message: Good. Let's move.
dialog.name: SM22_G38_L02

dialog.message: Hold on. Sunuvah--
dialog.name: SM22_G38_L03

dialog.message: Captain Britain just destroyed our Quinjet. Now he's coming after us...and he's not alone.
dialog.name: SM22_G38_L04

dialog.message: Spitfire's not one of them, is she?
dialog.name: SM22_G38_L05

dialog.message: Haven't seen her yet, but it's hard to tell.
dialog.name: SM22_G38_L06

dialog.message: I don't think it's going to be as easy to get out of here as we thought.
dialog.name: SM22_G38_L07

dialog.message: I should have known we weren't going to get out of here easy.
dialog.name: SM22_G83_L01

dialog.message: Dracula has shown his hand. He knows we have the book and he doesn't want it to get back to New York.
dialog.name: SM22_G83_L02

dialog.message: So he's pulled a mind-control stunt and we've got Black Knight, Union Jack, and Captain Britain all standing between us and a clean getaway.
dialog.name: SM22_G83_L03

dialog.message: MI-13 is lending us a new Quinjet, but there's a catch: They won't clear us for takeoff until we break whatever spell these three are under.
dialog.name: SM22_G83_L04

dialog.message: The clock's ticking, people.
dialog.name: SM22_G83_L05

dialog.message: All right. We've got the book and our UK pals are out from under Dracula's glamor. Let's get out of here. Has Team Expurgo in New York finished collecting demon parts?
dialog.name: SM22_G84_L01

dialog.message: We'll find out when we get there. Psylocke is on board. Let's go.
dialog.name: SM22_G84_L02

dialog.message: Blade, you fancy a ride to New York? Probably lots of vampires there. Also we think that's where Dracula is headed.
dialog.name: SM22_G84_L03

dialog.message: I brought my passport just in case.
dialog.name: SM22_G84_L04

dialog.message: What, no comment about my correct idiomatic usage of fancy?
dialog.name: SM22_G84_L05

dialog.message: When do we leave?
dialog.name: SM22_G84_L06

dialog.message: Do you see, Strange? The portal's form, glimmering into existence...
dialog.name: SM22_G73_L01

dialog.message: It is not complete yet, Mordo--and by the Vishanti, it shall never be!
dialog.name: SM22_G73_L02

dialog.message: Jack O'Lantern confirmed that Mephisto and the Hood aren't working together.
dialog.name: SM22_G58_L01

dialog.message: In fact what he said was, "Mephisto? I'da steered clear of this whole Coisa if I'd known Mephisto was involved."
dialog.name: SM22_G58_L02

dialog.message: The Hood's going to need himself some new lackeys.
dialog.name: SM22_G58_L03

dialog.message: Or Mephisto's going to make him an offer he can't refuse.
dialog.name: SM22_G58_L04

dialog.message: Either way, we'll need to be on guard for both of them while we start collecting demon parts for Strange. Spider-Man, here's the list.
dialog.name: SM22_G58_L05

dialog.message: What!? Look at--no way I can find all this stuff on my own. I'm only one wall-crawler.
dialog.name: SM22_G58_L06

dialog.message: Then take your pal Morbius. Divvy up the list.
dialog.name: SM22_G58_L07

dialog.message: Who says all the good heroic jobs are taken? Let's hit those mean streets, Morby.
dialog.name: SM22_G58_L08

dialog.message: If I had known I would be forced to suffer your nicknames, I might have made a different choice.
dialog.name: SM22_G58_L09

dialog.message: That's the spirit!
dialog.name: SM22_G58_L10

dialog.message: How'd we do?
dialog.name: SM22_G59_L01

dialog.message: We've got most of what Strange needs. Also, there's no permanent demon superhighway open into the heart of Manhattan.
dialog.name: SM22_G59_L02

dialog.message: So pretty good, right?
dialog.name: SM22_G59_L03

dialog.message: Yeah. Pretty good. But we haven't seen Mephisto yet. When he's done taking out his frustrations on Barão Mordo, he'll have another trick or two up his sleeve.
dialog.name: SM22_G59_L04

dialog.message: Get these demon parts to Strange and we'll figure it out from there. What's the word from London?
dialog.name: SM22_G59_L05

dialog.message: Communications aren't so good with all the occult interference. We'll have to wait until they get back to find out how Coisas went.
dialog.name: SM22_G59_L06

dialog.message: What we can do right here is make sure Strange has what he needs until the book gets here.
dialog.name: SM22_G59_L07

dialog.message: Fight for your friends' souls, Strange. Perhaps you will even win them back. It is of no consequence. There are always others willing to bargain for their fondest desires...
dialog.name: SM22_G138_L01

dialog.message: And there are always others willing to purify this world of the dark taint of your presence, Mephisto. Begone!
dialog.name: SM22_G138_L02

dialog.message: Mephisto has sucker-punched us, Agent.
dialog.name: SM22_G112_L01

dialog.message: While we were focused on Barão Mordo, he tricked Johnny Tempestade and the Scarlet Witch into signing contracts for their souls.
dialog.name: SM22_G112_L02

dialog.message: We're not sure how he did it, but both of them have family vulnerabilities.
dialog.name: SM22_G112_L03

dialog.message: They're both active in the area near Avengers Mansion, leading groups of demons.
dialog.name: SM22_G112_L04

dialog.message: Hold them back from destroying the mansion until we can draw Mephisto out and see how we can break those contracts.
dialog.name: SM22_G112_L05

dialog.message: Defeating Mephisto directly is the only way. I will handle that, but first we must force him to show himself.
dialog.name: SM22_G112_L06

dialog.message: Johnny Tempestade and the Scarlet Witch are free of their debt to Mephisto, thanks to Strange.
dialog.name: SM22_G113_L01

dialog.message: I owe you a debt, Stephen.
dialog.name: SM22_G113_L02

dialog.message: Careful, Wanda. Thinking you owe a debt was what got you into your predicament to begin with.
dialog.name: SM22_G113_L03

dialog.message: Even so. I'm grateful.
dialog.name: SM22_G113_L04

dialog.message: Me too. Mephisto...he played me for a sucker. I feel stupid.
dialog.name: SM22_G113_L05

dialog.message: That is Mephisto's specialty. He has had millennia of practice. Now you are free. We move on.
dialog.name: SM22_G113_L06

dialog.message: And now we return the favor by giving him enough time to get his magical ducks in a row.
dialog.name: SM22_G113_L07

dialog.message: Hold on, Agent. Fury and Stark are on their way back from London. We're heading into the endgame.
dialog.name: SM22_G113_L08

dialog.message: Arcade has taken his Murderworld obsession to a new level. He's domed over areas of New York, cutting off all outside contact.
dialog.name: SM15_G02_L01

dialog.message: Information is scarce, but he's deployed some pioneering nanotechnology. Arcade is now a real combat danger.
dialog.name: SM15_G02_L02

dialog.message: We're reaching out to see who's been captured, but there's a lot we still don't know.
dialog.name: SM15_G02_L03

dialog.message: Murderworld has always been a way for Arcade to play games with other people's lives. Now he's at it again, but the stakes are even higher.
dialog.name: SM15_G02_L04

dialog.message: We've got to get our people out of there, but first we need to find a way in.
dialog.name: SM15_G02_L05

dialog.message: You want to see what I've done here, Fury? It's a masterpiece! I've even brought in one of your agents to take part in the proceedings.
dialog.name: SM15_G02_L06

dialog.message: You need another pawn to play with, Arcade?
dialog.name: SM15_G02_L07

dialog.message: Oh no, I have more pawns than I could ever play with. But I do want you to know what you're dealing with, Director.
dialog.name: SM15_G02_L08

dialog.message: This is a Murderworld like no other! With I myself playing a starring role... but of course some Coisas never change. The lucky guests of Murderworld must kill or be killed!
dialog.name: SM15_G02_L09

dialog.message: Our first contestant is ready! Hulk, I welcome you to Murderworld! Your standard resistance method of tearing everyCoisa to pieces won't work here, I'm afraid.
dialog.name: SM15_G02_L10

dialog.message: The nano-enabled structure of this facility means it can repair and reconfigure itself faster than you can tear your way out.
dialog.name: SM15_G02_L11

dialog.message: Why have I invited you here? Fascinating question.
dialog.name: SM15_G02_L12

dialog.message: I didn't ask.
dialog.name: SM15_G02_L13

dialog.message: But you were thinking it, weren't you? Of course you were.
dialog.name: SM15_G02_L14

dialog.message: Was wondering what's the smallest pieces I could tear you into.
dialog.name: SM15_G02_L15

dialog.message: Agent, you'll be seeing Hulk later. First, you should see if you can't find your way to Daredevil and Gavião Arqueiro. They may know their way around a circus, but they have never been prepared for a game like this.
dialog.name: SM15_G02_L16

dialog.message: I've been doing a little experimenting with some new toys. You'll have many chances to admire my handiwork.
dialog.name: SM15_G02_L17

dialog.message: Are you ready? Splendid! Let us begin! The objective is to find your way out! Easy, right? Oh wait. Did I forget to mention the only way out is by killing each other? Otherwise it wouldn't be Murderworld, now, would it?
dialog.name: SM15_G02_L18

dialog.message: Since you crusader types are so fond of groups, there are two teams: heroes and villains! For added spice, I am spotlighting villains who recently chose the path of reformation. Betrayal! There's no better way to incite murder.
dialog.name: SM15_G02_L19

dialog.message: The team has started to make progress breaking through Arcade's encryption. We cannot yet reach him directly to put an end to this madness while his nanotech screening remains intact...
dialog.name: SM15_G03_L01

dialog.message: Agente Coulson adds, and I quote, "But when he communicates outside its boundaries, we're starting to pick up some of those exchanges."
dialog.name: SM15_G03_L02

dialog.message: Those exchanges are providing insight as to the abominations awaiting you in the next area of Murderworld.
dialog.name: SM15_G03_L03

dialog.message: It appears Arcade has gathered his mutant captives all in one place. I will communicate with you telepathically as long as that is possible.
dialog.name: SM15_G03_L04

dialog.message: Agent. Don't look around. God, has no one ever spoken to you telepathically before? This isn't amateur hour.
dialog.name: SM15_G34_L01

dialog.message: I've learned quite a bit more about Arcade's little playground. Here's the short version.
dialog.name: SM15_G34_L02

dialog.message: Emma...
dialog.name: SM15_G34_L03

dialog.message: Yes, Charles. It is a bit embarrassing to be part of someCoisa as vulgar as Murderworld. But as you already seem to know, Arcade has tapped some new wellsprings of power.
dialog.name: SM15_G34_L04

dialog.message: So we have observed. What else can you tell us from the inside?
dialog.name: SM15_G34_L05

dialog.message: He's trying to buy his way into the so-called elite of villains, and he thinks the best way to do that is to make his dog-and-pony show as good as it can be.
dialog.name: SM15_G34_L06

dialog.message: Why am I here? I'm so glad you thought to ask.
dialog.name: SM15_G34_L07

dialog.message: It was I who asked, Agent.
dialog.name: SM15_G34_L08

dialog.message: Come and find me. Arcade undoubtedly will ensure I'm able to show you more in person.
dialog.name: SM15_G34_L09

dialog.message: Who's our mysterious compatriot, Charles? Stop being coy.
dialog.name: SM15_G35_L01

dialog.message: Nico Minoru. Arcade has opened a passage from this section of his Murderworld to the next...and Nico Minoru is there.
dialog.name: SM15_G35_L02

dialog.message: And she is wounded. I'm not sure how much of her magical power will be available to her.
dialog.name: SM15_G35_L03

dialog.message: We can't afford to carry anyone, Charles.
dialog.name: SM15_G35_L04

dialog.message: That is precisely how Arcade wishes us all to think. Do not give him the satisfaction.
dialog.name: SM15_G35_L05

dialog.message: I'm keeping this little "Sister" in our next little gallery! Will the esteemed guest Agent of S.H.I.E.L.D. please follow the lighted signs?
dialog.name: SM15_G35_L06

dialog.message: Yes, Agent. Arcade is counting on you to get the word out. You will be as safe as anyone can be in Murderworld.
dialog.name: SM15_G35_L07

dialog.message: See if you can locate Nico Minoru and discover who else Arcade has imprisoned...
dialog.name: SM15_G35_L08

dialog.message: Nico Minoru is somewhere within this portion of Murderworld, Agent. We do not at this point know who else Arcade has trapped.
dialog.name: SM15_G59_L01

dialog.message: Whatever gauntlet she is to run, you will run it with her...and that is where Director Fury's plan takes over.
dialog.name: SM15_G59_L02

dialog.message: Agent. Why don't you rendezvous with our goth-y guest and we will undertake the third act of the program. She is to play a starring role!
dialog.name: SM15_G59_L03

dialog.message: The first two have gone very well, but all rests on the big finale, no?
dialog.name: SM15_G59_L04

dialog.message: Agent, is he leading you to--
dialog.name: SM15_G59_L05

dialog.message: Aaaaaand that's enough telepathic communication with your dear friend Dr. Xavier.
dialog.name: SM15_G59_L06

dialog.message: A S.H.I.E.L.D. agent? How'd you make it this long without getting chowdered?
dialog.name: SM15_G59_L07

dialog.message: Also, you got anyCoisa to drink? Lemonade maybe?
dialog.name: SM15_G59_L08

dialog.message: It's been said of me that I don't take Coisas seriously enough. But I mean it when I say thanks, umm… What's your name? Agent ...?
dialog.name: SM15_G60_L01

dialog.message: I might have gotten out of there on my own, but having you around didn't hurt.
dialog.name: SM15_G60_L02

dialog.message: We've got crews going through Murderworld to make sure no one's been left behind. After that, we're going to get these neighborhoods back to normal as quickly as possible.
dialog.name: SM15_G60_L03

dialog.message: And leave poor old Arcade homeless?
dialog.name: SM15_G60_L04

dialog.message: Damn right. He can make the subway rats fight gladiator matches. Murderworld is done.
dialog.name: SM15_G60_L05

dialog.message: I think some of the... ahem... recently reformed members of our team have some fences to mend.
dialog.name: SM15_G60_L06

dialog.message: I am only now purging the nanos from my system using my own nanoheal arrays. Arcade targeted us and affected our behavior using his new technology.
dialog.name: SM15_G60_L07

dialog.message: Ah, the old nanotech-made-me-do-it defense. I've heard that one before.
dialog.name: SM15_G60_L08

dialog.message: She's not kidding. We ran all kinds of scans on her, Creed, even Magneto. All of them lousy with Arcade's little bugs.
dialog.name: SM15_G60_L09

dialog.message: Yeah, well, this is precedent. Next time I freak out and try to kill a bunch of my friends, I'm going to blame evil nanotech. Or the Jean Grey (Fênix) Force. You've been warned.
dialog.name: SM15_G60_L10

dialog.message: Everyone's back on the same side now? Hank, you're sure none of Arcade's nanos are still operational?
dialog.name: SM15_G60_L11

dialog.message: I'm going to triple-check everyone.
dialog.name: SM15_G60_L12

dialog.message: Quadruple.
dialog.name: SM15_G60_L13

dialog.message: Like I said, I'm going to quadruple-check everyone.
dialog.name: SM15_G60_L14

dialog.message: Arcade has taken his Murderworld obsession to a new level. He's domed over areas of New York, cutting off all outside contact.
dialog.name: SM15_G86_L01

dialog.message: Information is scarce, but he's deployed some pioneering nanotechnology. Arcade is now a real combat danger.
dialog.name: SM15_G86_L02

dialog.message: We're reaching out to see who's been captured, but there's a lot we still don't know.
dialog.name: SM15_G86_L03

dialog.message: Murderworld has always been a way for Arcade to play games with other people's lives. Now he's at it again, but the stakes are even higher.
dialog.name: SM15_G86_L04

dialog.message: We've got to get our people out of there, but first we need to find a way in.
dialog.name: SM15_G86_L05

dialog.message: You want to see what I've done here, Fury? It's a masterpiece! I've even brought in one of your agents to take part in the proceedings.
dialog.name: SM15_G86_L06

dialog.message: You need another pawn to play with, Arcade?
dialog.name: SM15_G86_L07

dialog.message: Oh no, I have more pawns than I could ever play with. But I do want you to know what you're dealing with, Director.
dialog.name: SM15_G86_L08

dialog.message: This is a Murderworld like no other! With I myself playing a starring role... but of course some Coisas never change. The lucky guests of Murderworld must kill or be killed!
dialog.name: SM15_G86_L09

dialog.message: And speaking of our guests...Welcome, my current and former villainous colleagues and rivals! This...is...Murderworld!
dialog.name: SM15_G86_L10

dialog.message: Wherein those of you who have reformed will un-reform if you wish to survive, because you know the only way to get out of Murderworld is to kill your way out!
dialog.name: SM15_G86_L11

dialog.message: I know how hard it must be for you to function without S.H.I.E.L.D. dictating your every move, so I have included an Agent to hold your leashes. Try not to kill your custodian Agent until the end!
dialog.name: SM15_G86_L12

dialog.message: First, O intrepid S.H.I.E.L.D. agent, I would like you to observe these lovers' quarrels.
dialog.name: SM15_G86_L13

dialog.message: If Murderworld can contain the scorn and fury of jilted romance, it can contain anyCoisa. Am I right? I'm right.
dialog.name: SM15_G86_L14

dialog.message: Enjoy the first act of this play. See if you can't find Elektra inside. Tell her I sent you.
dialog.name: SM15_G86_L15

dialog.message: I built this Murderworld as a proof-of-concept. Concept proved, I'd say. But let us see how Coisas progress before I commit to a full-scale version.
dialog.name: SM15_G87_L01

dialog.message: Agent, please accompany me to the next district of Murderworld. It is thematically quite different. I do love arranging Coisas by groups.
dialog.name: SM15_G87_L02

dialog.message: It seems Arcade has even greater plans. Go, Agent. Your firsthand experience will be invaluable.
dialog.name: SM15_G87_L03

dialog.message: Karima...oh, Karima...awake, o Sentinel.
dialog.name: SM15_G115_L01

dialog.message: There are mutants to hunt.
dialog.name: SM15_G115_L02

dialog.message: That is no longer my function.
dialog.name: SM15_G115_L03

dialog.message: Now it is. If you do not hunt the mutants in Murderworld, you will be destroyed...
dialog.name: SM15_G115_L04

dialog.message: ...and how many lives will thereby be lost, that you might have saved in the outside world?
dialog.name: SM15_G115_L05
