dialog.name: MD1_G02_L01

dialog.message: Ms. Douglas, you also have my apologies. We could never have located all those shards without you.
dialog.name: MD1_G02_L02

dialog.message: And they say chivalry is dead. I hope this shows that I am capable of resisting what is left of the Black Vortex's compulsion. Now, I grow tired of this place and have a need to stretch my legs.
dialog.name: MD1_G02_L03

dialog.message: So, would that mean you are inclined to assist us. We could use all the help we can get.
dialog.name: MD1_G02_L04

dialog.message: Yes, Agente Coulson. I will assist you.
dialog.name: MD1_G02_L05

dialog.message: Shattering the Black Vortex scattered the remains across the city, and it may come as little surprise that several of these shards have gone missing.
dialog.name: MD1_G01_L01

dialog.message: Great work there. “Smashing” success.
dialog.name: MD1_G01_L02

dialog.message: Oh, I’m sorry. How were we supposed to know that it’d explode into a million tiny-little pieces?
dialog.name: MD1_G01_L03

dialog.message: Quick show of hands. Have you ever destroyed a cosmic space-mirror before? Didn’t think so.
dialog.name: MD1_G01_L04

dialog.message: I’d like to remind you that this could have been easily avoided if you had trusted and allowed S.H.I.E.L.D. to secure the Black Vortex in the first place.
dialog.name: MD1_G01_L05

dialog.message: Agent, we need you to lead a team and recover these Black Vortex shards before they fall into the wrong hands.
dialog.name: MD1_G01_L06

dialog.message: I believe I can be of assistance in this matter. I still share a connection with what remains of the Black Vortex. I can use this connection to pinpoint their locations.
dialog.name: MD1_G01_L07

dialog.message: I am sorry, Ms. Douglas, but we can't allow you in the field with your condition.
dialog.name: MD1_G01_L08

dialog.message: My condition? You mean the residual compulsion to protect what remains of the Black Vortex?
dialog.name: MD1_G01_L09

dialog.message: You may be right, of course. I am sure that someone with my mental training could never resist the remaining compulsion.
dialog.name: MD1_G01_L10

dialog.message: If you are so inclined to aimlessly search for cosmically powered shards that may result at the very least in the annihilation of humanity, then be my guest.
dialog.name: MD1_G01_L11

dialog.message: ...Of course, any valuable intel you can provide will be put to good use.
dialog.name: MD1_G01_L12

dialog.message: Excellent choice. Now, if you'll excuse me, I need to concentrate.
dialog.name: MD1_G01_L13

dialog.message: Agent, any new information from Moondragon will be passed along, but for now, get out there and grab those shards!
dialog.name: MD1_G01_L14

dialog.message: Agent, if we're going to keep Morbius from flying off the handle and trying to eat our field agents, we need to get his hunger under control.
dialog.name: SM22_G35_L01

dialog.message: That means finding a serum that can substitute for blood in his metabolism.
dialog.name: SM22_G35_L02

dialog.message: We've got tech teams working on it, but they're going to need materials. It'll be up to you to coordinate that operation.
dialog.name: SM22_G35_L03

dialog.message: Is it done? Give it to me. Ahhhhh...
dialog.name: SM22_G36_L01

dialog.message: Yes. Yes. It will do.
dialog.name: SM22_G36_L02

dialog.message: It will do? That's gratitude for you.
dialog.name: SM22_G36_L03

dialog.message: Morbius. If we can keep you supplied with this serum, can we trust you to control yourself in the field?
dialog.name: SM22_G36_L04

dialog.message: Yes. I'm yours. It's been a long time since I knew what control was like. For that I am grateful.
dialog.name: SM22_G36_L05

dialog.message: You know, Sugah. I think it’s time I try out a new look. This uniform’s torn up and feelin’ old ta me. I could go for somethin’ new. SomeCoisa more modern.
dialog.name: CT10_G01_L01

dialog.message: I’ve had my eye on a little green number, but the hardest part is findin’ just the right gloves to go with it.
dialog.name: CT10_G01_L02

dialog.message: Oh, Ah’m not just talking one or two pairs, I go through gloves like you wouldn’t believe. Try punching diamond hard skin with gloves on and see how long they last.
dialog.name: CT10_G01_L03

dialog.message: If you could track down a whole bunch of sturdy, green gloves for me, I’d really appreciate it. So what do you say?
dialog.name: CT10_G01_L04

dialog.message: Attention. All mutants are hereby notified:
dialog.name: SM19_G27_L01

dialog.message: Mutants who surrender will be examined. Mutants who resist will be eliminated. All Sentinels are now under my control.
dialog.name: SM19_G27_L02

dialog.message: Team, I'm going to go out on a limb here and suggest that we just found out who's controlling the Sentinels.
dialog.name: SM19_G27_L03

dialog.message: Figures. He's part Sentinel himself.
dialog.name: SM19_G27_L04

dialog.message: Geez, these guys have one-track minds. Not flexible programming at all. But they are consistent.
dialog.name: SM19_G27_L05

dialog.message: What's his angle? Pure mutant-hating, or is there some other ulterior motive?
dialog.name: SM19_G27_L06

dialog.message: Does it matter? We can shrink his head later. Right now, let's save lives.
dialog.name: SM19_G27_L07

dialog.message: Stegron, Sauron, the Lagarto, and Senhor Sinistro...you'd think we have enough targets. But our real problem is the High Evolutionary.
dialog.name: SM21_G25_L01

dialog.message: He's the one working his genetic hoodoo on some of the local fauna. That's the source of the conflict.
dialog.name: SM21_G25_L02

dialog.message: Forcing evolution forward in a controlled environment. This would be interesting if he wasn't so dangerous.
dialog.name: SM21_G25_L03

dialog.message: Maybe the most interesting Coisa about ol' Herbert Wyndham is he got started on his whole evolution kick courtesy of...anyone? Bueller?
dialog.name: SM21_G25_L04

dialog.message: Well, that would be Senhor Sinistro, wouldn't it?
dialog.name: SM21_G25_L05

dialog.message: You are correct! Which makes it mighty interesting that we came down here chasing Sinister and now we're seeing the High Evolutionary.
dialog.name: SM21_G25_L06

dialog.message: Let's put those pieces together.
dialog.name: SM21_G25_L07

dialog.message: Hey, Agent! Happy Anniversary!
dialog.name: AQ4_G01_L01

dialog.message: I was below deck when I overheard Coulson mention that you've been running about, saving the world for four years now. Not bad for a rookie.
dialog.name: AQ4_G01_L02

dialog.message: So I says to Coulson, "Coulson, we ought to celebrate! What's a duck gotta do to order a pizza around here? And maybe we should get the Agent a shiny trophy or commemorative collectors plate or someCoisa."
dialog.name: AQ4_G01_L03

dialog.message: So Coulson says, "Okay Howard, you want to do a little someCoisa for the Agent, then file an acquisition request with the quartermaster."
dialog.name: AQ4_G01_L04

dialog.message: So I says, "Where's the quartermaster?" And Coulson points and says, "Down that hallway. Help yourself."
dialog.name: AQ4_G01_L05

dialog.message: "Help Yourself," he says! Agent, That's like writing us a blank check! Forget the victory cups and the kitschy dinnerware. We're gonna celebrate in style!
dialog.name: AQ4_G01_L06

dialog.message: I've taken the liberty to put in some pretty hefty orders, all while using the magic words, "But Coulson said..."
dialog.name: AQ4_G01_L07

dialog.message: Listen, I'll collect the delivery. And each day, 'While we celebrate your anniversary', visit me and I'll give you a cut of the loot, err... supplies. I may be a duck, but I'm no Scrooge.
dialog.name: AQ4_G01_L08

dialog.message: You get the goods, along with an official S.H.I.E.L.D., 'Thank you for your service,' and I get to save up for a tropic vacation! It's win-win!
dialog.name: AQ4_G01_L09

dialog.message: Seriously though, thank you for your four years of service, Agent. We're gonna be rich!
dialog.name: AQ4_G01_L10

dialog.message: There's a lot more where that came from. See ya tomorrow.
dialog.name: AQ4_G01_L11

dialog.message: Congrats on the four year anniversary, Agent! This is the last of your cut of the loot.
dialog.name: AQ4_G02_L01

dialog.message: Try to stay alive so we can do this again next year.
dialog.name: AQ4_G02_L02

dialog.message: Now if you'll excuse me, I'm gonna catch the next Remote Ops Jet to Cancún for a little R&R.
dialog.name: AQ4_G02_L03

dialog.message: This situation has taken an unexpected turn. I can't have the Avengers on my trail while I'm trying to recapture Betty Ross.
dialog.name: SM32_G22_L01

dialog.message: So. It is time to amend the plan by accelerating one particular element.
dialog.name: SM32_G22_L02

dialog.message: zzzktzz--this is where I come in.
dialog.name: SM32_G22_L03

dialog.message: It's very simple, Zzzax. I want you to destroy Coisas. Particularly I want you to destroy the Hulk.
dialog.name: SM32_G22_L04

dialog.message: Yeszzztk. And all who are like him.
dialog.name: SM32_G22_L05

dialog.message: Perfect. Go now. Leave no one alive.
dialog.name: SM32_G22_L06

dialog.message: I will abzzzt--absorb their minds. For more power. Kzzkt--
dialog.name: SM32_G22_L07

dialog.message: I need your help collecting and understanding Iso-8. What are these Conduits? Show me one.
dialog.name: CT8_G01_L01

dialog.message: I believe the serum used by the Green Goblin on test subjects has trace amounts of nectar from an incredibly rare plant from the Savage Land. I can't and won’t tolerate his interference. Wherever he is now, can you send him a message from me?
dialog.name: CT8_G02_L01

dialog.message: What's going to happen if he ever gets to the Savage Land? We need to stop him at all costs.
dialog.name: CT8_G05_L01

dialog.message: Where chaos goes, Venom follows. Now he's here on Earth, and we have to do someCoisa about it.
dialog.name: CT8_G04_L01

dialog.message: I would hate to see what the White Gorillas can do to a pristine land if left unchecked. Please help T'challa clean up Wakanda.
dialog.name: CT8_G06_L01

dialog.message: The Savage Land has enough problems without having to worry about possible threats from Wakanda. Thank you.
dialog.name: CT8_G09_L01

dialog.message: If you take out Man-Ape, maybe the White Gorillas will lose their nerve.
dialog.name: CT8_G08_L01

dialog.message: I don't know about you, but I quite enjoyed that.
dialog.name: CT8_G11_L01

dialog.message: We'll need to communicate effectively in the field if we're going to keep working together, Agent. I know S.H.I.E.L.D. has a combat simulator. Let's run through a training session and make sure we're compatible teammates.
dialog.name: CT8_G10_L01

dialog.message: Just as I suspected, I've been finding similar devices in the jungle. Iso-8 must have fallen in the Savage Land, too.
dialog.name: CT8_G16_L01

dialog.message: This looks like it came off one of the Test Subjects you've been dealing with. I can't be sure but I have a sinking feeling about these conduits and the Savage Lands.
dialog.name: CT8_G15_L01

dialog.message: If you're ever fighting in the Savage Land, you'll want me around. I know it better than anyone.
dialog.name: CT8_G13_L01

dialog.message: That last fight together went fairly well. Let's try it again, and I'll show you what I can do.
dialog.name: CT8_G12_L01

dialog.message: Now you have a dependable spear, but that's just the beginning. The spear is a better weapon when you add a little someCoisa to the tip.
dialog.name: CT8_G19_L01

dialog.message: You need to be prepared for tech failures to survive in the Savage Land. Let me show you how to build a practical spear.
dialog.name: CT8_G18_L01

dialog.message: We have three different poison samples. Can you get me access to SHIELD's labs and help me synthesize more?
dialog.name: CT8_G28_L01

dialog.message: Glad you saw Coisas my way, Agent. It’s good to know there are still some people I can count on. In fact, it kind of made me remember the good old days. Excuse me, I have some old friends I need to speak to.
dialog.name: CT9_G02_L01

dialog.message: I need to talk to you, Agent… I have become aware of those attempting to resurrect the Elder Gods. Are you familiar with them?
dialog.name: CT9_G01_L01

dialog.message: They are beings of incredible power whose only desire is to see our world, our reality, crushed for eternity. Fortunately, they were locked away in Limbo. At least, temporarily.
dialog.name: CT9_G01_L02

dialog.message: You see, I was abducted to Limbo as a little girl by an evil sorcerer named Belasco, a servant of the Elder Gods and former ruler of Limbo.
dialog.name: CT9_G01_L03

dialog.message: He fashioned a mystical medallion to contain the pieces of my soul, a “pure” soul, he was seeking to corrupt in order to release his masters from their imprisonment.
dialog.name: CT9_G01_L04

dialog.message: Eventually, I was able to destroy both Belasco and the Elder Gods, restoring what was left of my soul, but at the price of manipulating my friends in order to do so. Which is why I must come to you.
dialog.name: CT9_G01_L05

dialog.message: Whoever is trying to resurrect them, they are trying to use a series of medallions similar to the one I once owned. I believe they are trying to corrupt a large number of souls rather than focus on one “pure” soul.
dialog.name: CT9_G01_L06

dialog.message: I would appreciate your aid in retrieving these medallions and preventing these beings from ever returning.
dialog.name: CT9_G01_L07

dialog.message: Or, you could let the world end. Your choice after all. No pressure.
dialog.name: CT9_G01_L08

dialog.message: Used correctly, this spear is more reliable and deadly than any gun.
dialog.name: CT8_G30_L01

dialog.message: Now let me show you how to upgrade that spear into a weapon worthy of the Savage Lands.
dialog.name: CT8_G29_L01

dialog.message: Careful with that. It's dangerous.
dialog.name: CT8_G23_L01

dialog.message: Agent, I've heard you've faced the Viper before. Can you track her down to get us a sample of her custom poison?
dialog.name: CT8_G22_L01

dialog.message: Are you getting sleepy? Our enemies will be, now that you can put this on the tip of your spear.
dialog.name: CT8_G21_L01

dialog.message: The Hand are experts at creating poisons that cause drowsiness and torpor. Fight their ninjas and gather some samples.
dialog.name: CT8_G20_L01

dialog.message: Good. This stuff is horrible...but very useful in the right circumstances.
dialog.name: CT8_G25_L01

dialog.message: We can collect another toxin from Demons. Seek them out and gather it.
dialog.name: CT8_G24_L01

dialog.message: There is a new Simulator Challenge available for Rocket Raccoon. Complete the Challenges to unlock the Guardian Rocket Raccoon uniform!
dialog.name: SIM_G41_L01
dialog.title: S.H.I.E.L.D. SIMULATOR

dialog.message: Rebecca welcome aboard, I hope you’ll find S.H.I.E.L.D. friendlier than HYDRA.
dialog.name: DL1_G02_L01

dialog.message: You can call me Death Locket, everyone else does. I didn’t ask for this, but thanks to you mister Stark I'm back to normal. Mostly normal anyway.
dialog.name: DL1_G02_L02

dialog.message: Right, saving people is what we superheroes do.
dialog.name: DL1_G02_L03

dialog.message: After all that's happened I’d like to save people too. How can I help?
dialog.name: DL1_G02_L04

dialog.message: Incoming coded distress signal. JIT analysis shows it’s the same wave length that we used to patch into Death Locket.
dialog.name: DL1_G01_L01

dialog.message: Confirmed, that’s Rebecca Ryker.
dialog.name: DL1_G01_L02

dialog.message: Good work Tony, the patch you uploaded to break Rebecca free from Baron Zemo’s control worked. It looks like she’s ready to come in.
dialog.name: DL1_G01_L03

dialog.message: See I told you it would work!
dialog.name: DL1_G01_L04

dialog.message: I almost hate that you’re right.
dialog.name: DL1_G01_L05

dialog.message: You can’t rush miracles, even chocolate covered ones take time.
dialog.name: DL1_G01_L06

dialog.message: Save it. We need to get Rebecca back to safety before someone else picks up her signal. Then we can discuss Tony’s dubious 80’s references.
dialog.name: DL1_G01_L07

dialog.message: Alright Agent, Death Locket wants to join up. So we need to run some tests and diagnostics. Stark?
dialog.name: DL1_G03_L01

dialog.message: I built a program back in highschool, which runs a reverse Turing test, but it requires some “classic” tech. I called them VK machines.
dialog.name: DL1_G03_L02

dialog.message: Agent, I know they’re old but head out and find some of these VK machines and we’ll prep a few simulator tests for Death Locket to run through.
dialog.name: DL1_G03_L03

dialog.message: I thought being a superhero meant I wouldn’t have to take tests anymore…
dialog.name: DL1_G03_L04

dialog.message: Good work, you passed with flying colors.
dialog.name: DL1_G04_L01

dialog.message: Never under estimate 80’s era technology.
dialog.name: DL1_G04_L02

dialog.message: Thanks for helping me Agent.
dialog.name: DL1_G04_L03

dialog.message: We're looking at a prank gone bad here, Agent. Someone created counterfeit S.H.I.E.L.D. ID cards as a joke, but the joke has gotten out of hand.
dialog.name: CT3_G01_L01

dialog.message: Just how far out of hand? HYDRA has come into possession of some of the cards. Now the gag has turned into a terrorist threat.
dialog.name: CT3_G01_L02

dialog.message: HYDRA elements are using the pirated cards to infiltrate S.H.I.E.L.D. facilities. We need you to run checks on four installations while we recode the ID card encryption using new biometric interpreters from UL.
dialog.name: CT3_G01_L03

dialog.message: We're sending you a list of the four installations along with the pirated codes. Apprehend anyone who has one of the stolen cards and clear the facilities.
dialog.name: CT3_G01_L04

dialog.message: That's one down. Good work. Now we can question this HYDRA agent and see what he knows about other infiltrations.
dialog.name: CT3_G02_L01

dialog.message: Move on to the next facility, but be ready for some resistance. HYDRA will know we're onto them now, once their spy doesn't report back in.
dialog.name: CT3_G02_L02

dialog.message: Two down, two to go. Our encryption team is in the process of purging the compromised cards and reissuing ID cards. Everyone's going to have new biometric readings taken with this UL protocol.
dialog.name: CT3_G03_L01

dialog.message: We can't finish the process until we've identified all of the HYDRA assets using pirated cards, though. So let's get moving on these next two facilities.
dialog.name: CT3_G03_L02

dialog.message: Meanwhile, we're suspending all high-security activities and research. All labs and weapons facilities are locked down.
dialog.name: CT3_G03_L03

dialog.message: S.H.I.E.L.D essentially has one arm tied behind its back until we identify and capture all of the HYDRA spies.
dialog.name: CT3_G03_L04

dialog.message: All S.H.I.E.L.D. installations are on lockdown, Agent. HYDRA has mounted a cyber-attack from within our security systems.
dialog.name: CT3_G04_L01

dialog.message: Nobody goes in or out of any S.H.I.E.L.D. building until we've captured all of the HYDRA infiltrators and locked in new biometric procedures.
dialog.name: CT3_G04_L02

dialog.message: Let's get moving. This is only going to get worse. Whoever thought this was just a joke isn't making me laugh.
dialog.name: CT3_G04_L03

dialog.message: All right, Agent. We've got the ID card system encryption retooled with new biometrics and there's one S.H.I.E.L.D. tech heading to The Raft… and not on payroll.
dialog.name: CT3_G06_L01

dialog.message: That's good work. And maybe we're all a little clearer on why counterfeiting proprietary tech is a bad idea... even if it's just meant as a joke.
dialog.name: CT3_G06_L02

dialog.message: That was dangerous and time-consuming. Let's hope everyone at S.H.I.E.L.D. learned a lesson so we can focus on fighting super-powered villains.
dialog.name: CT3_G06_L03

dialog.message: All S.H.I.E.L.D. facilities are cleared and all of the pirated cards are accounted for. HYDRA is locked out again.
dialog.name: CT3_G05_L01

dialog.message: We've got to redo all of our system security now. Big waste of time when we could be out there saving the world. But at least we'll have excellent new biometric readers.
dialog.name: CT3_G05_L02

dialog.message: The last step is going to be finding out who counterfeited the cards in the first place. Here's the tracking information for the first pirated card. Find out who has it.
dialog.name: CT3_G05_L03

dialog.message: You will not keep me from Thane. No force in the universe keeps me from what I want.
dialog.name: SM13_G19_L01

dialog.message: Who is this Thane, anyway?
dialog.name: SM13_G19_L02

dialog.message: Nobody's saying. Thanos and the Black Order seem convinced he's in New York, though.
dialog.name: SM13_G19_L03

dialog.message: Let's find him before they do. All we have to do is keep an eye out for a male human between the ages of fifteen and twenty-four. No problem!
dialog.name: SM13_G19_L04

dialog.message: Thanos is going more or less wherever he wants. I mean, who's going to stop him?
dialog.name: SM13_G18_L01

dialog.message: Besides us.
dialog.name: SM13_G18_L02

dialog.message: Right, but that's what I mean. We don't have to, because he's staying in New York. Whatever he wants, it's here.
dialog.name: SM13_G18_L03

dialog.message: So let's get after him and see if we can find out what it is. Then we can take it away from him and make him cry.
dialog.name: SM13_G18_L04

dialog.message: Complete this quest to unlock the Agent versus Agent challenges of PvP and earn a Bonus Hero to join your Team!
dialog.name: CH01_G09_L01

dialog.message: You have meant well, Agent, but now you see that this was not the correct course of action.
dialog.name: SM34_G132_L01

dialog.message: You must remember what you have learned here. I will send you back to the point in time when your initial choice was made.
dialog.name: SM34_G132_L02

dialog.message: There you will have a chance to choose again. May your actions be wise. The existence of the future depends on it.
dialog.name: SM34_G132_L03

dialog.message: Dracula!
dialog.name: SM30_G19_L01

dialog.message: Spitfire and Union Jack are on his trail.
dialog.name: SM30_G19_L02

dialog.message: Is he just having seasonal hunger or is there a bigger game afoot? I mean, is this related to our three witches doing their Coisa?
dialog.name: SM30_G19_L03

dialog.message: I think Dracula and a fresh army of bloodthirsty vampires is enough to worry about. Hit him, people. Try to keep him in one place long enough to finish him off.
dialog.name: SM30_G19_L04

dialog.message: One of our deployed field agents recovered a piece of highly modular cybernetic technology, which appears to be the handiwork of the High Evolutionary.
dialog.name: SM21_G87_L01

dialog.message: If you collect more, I’m sure we can talk Mr. Stark into making someCoisa useful with it.
dialog.name: SM21_G87_L02

dialog.message: Some demonic faction has been trying for a while to bring Blackheart into their wars. Looks like they've succeeded.
dialog.name: SM11_G23_L01

dialog.message: Whose side will he be on?
dialog.name: SM11_G23_L02

dialog.message: His own. And I wouldn't be surprised if he's gunning for Mephisto. That's why Barão Mordo was pitching in. I bet that accounts for the Hood helping, too.
dialog.name: SM11_G23_L03

dialog.message: Keep Blackheart on the run, Agent. Sooner or later we'll pin him down.
dialog.name: SM11_G23_L04

dialog.message: Dammit. We didn't stop Barão Mordo after all.
dialog.name: SM11_G22_L01

dialog.message: Blackheart is using portals to appear all over the city. We're going to have a hard time running him down. Hellstrom can't do it while he's trying to close the other portals and hold back the demons.
dialog.name: SM11_G22_L02

dialog.message: I had a bad feeling about this when Blackheart's bones disappeared...
dialog.name: SM11_G22_L03

dialog.message: Sure you did, Daimon. Maybe if you'd finished the job quicker the bones wouldn't have had a chance to disappear.
dialog.name: SM11_G22_L04

dialog.message: And maybe if I stuck this trident in your eyes you wouldn't be looking over my shoulder all the time, you soul-sucking--
dialog.name: SM11_G22_L05

dialog.message: Shut up, both of you. While you're sitting around bickering, Strange and I are shutting portals down. Mind helping out?
dialog.name: SM11_G22_L06

dialog.message: If he's appearing in several places at once, maybe Mordo was conducting the ritual in more than one place at the same time.
dialog.name: SM11_G22_L07

dialog.message: Ghost Rider's right. How about we stop running our mouths and start hunting?
dialog.name: SM11_G22_L08

dialog.message: The S.H.I.E.L.D. Simulator is now online and available for use.
dialog.name: ALERT_G31_L01
dialog.title: S.H.I.E.L.D. SIMULATOR

dialog.message: Using advanced technology, the Simulator creates a variety of challenges, designed to train and prepare for the field.
dialog.name: ALERT_G31_L02
dialog.title: S.H.I.E.L.D. SIMULATOR

dialog.message: Press the Simulator button to enter.
dialog.name: ALERT_G31_L03
dialog.title: S.H.I.E.L.D. SIMULATOR

dialog.message: This is a weird one, Agent. The Brotherhood of Evil Mutants has planted their Mutant Growth Hormone/Iso-8 serum in pirated knockoff skin products.
dialog.name: CT2_G01_L01

dialog.message: People who use them are turning into Test Subjects, and running amok the way Test Subjects do.
dialog.name: CT2_G01_L02

dialog.message: Odds are that Sugar Man is helping Mystique with this. Only he would be twisted enough to put mutagens in beauty products.
dialog.name: CT2_G01_L03

dialog.message: So far it's only happening in Lower Manhattan, but if we don't get on top of the problem it's going to spread, and fast.
dialog.name: CT2_G01_L04

dialog.message: Intel teams are trying to track the supply chain, but first Coisas first. We need you to organize field teams to capture the Test Subjects for treatment.
dialog.name: CT2_G01_L05

dialog.message: Field teams are capturing Test Subjects as they appear. You're doing terrific work organizing that, Agent.
dialog.name: CT2_G02_L01

dialog.message: Now it's time for some intel. Some of the contaminate product is appearing in local stores, but much of it is moving through street vendors.
dialog.name: CT2_G02_L02

dialog.message: Interview vendors. Tell them we'll give them reduced sentences if they tell us where they're getting the product.
dialog.name: CT2_G02_L03

dialog.message: We know the location of the lab where the serum is being created. While we round up Test Subjects, we need to hit the lab.
dialog.name: CT2_G03_L01

dialog.message: That's your next objective, Agent. Capture any Brotherhood members and shut down the lab.
dialog.name: CT2_G03_L02

dialog.message: Make sure you recover all the stocks from those street vendors, too. Not all of them care whether pirated skin cream turns their customers into monsters.
dialog.name: CT2_G03_L03

dialog.message: The lab is out of commission, and records here are telling us where the Brotherhood is making the counterfeit products.
dialog.name: CT2_G04_L01

dialog.message: There are still new groups of Test Subjects popping up here and there. Get that problem under control.
dialog.name: CT2_G04_L02

dialog.message: Once that's done, we're going to hit the factory. Meanwhile we're also getting the word out about how to recognize the counterfeit products and distinguish them from the real Coisa. Not many people understand how dangerous this stuff can be.
dialog.name: CT2_G04_L03

dialog.message: All Test Subjects are in custody at S.H.I.E.L.D. medical facilities. With the help of the UL team, we're doing everyCoisa we can to return them to their original state.
dialog.name: CT2_G06_L01

dialog.message: Good Coisa we've had so much experience trying to reverse the effects of this serum. Who would have thought we'd be glad that we've spent the last year reversing involuntary mutations?
dialog.name: CT2_G06_L02

dialog.message: Even so, the Test Subjects did a lot of damage. The Brotherhood exploited people's willingness to use counterfeit products to save a buck.
dialog.name: CT2_G06_L03

dialog.message: Maybe now people will know better. If it isn't real, you can't trust it. And it could be very harmful to your health and your community.
dialog.name: CT2_G06_L04

dialog.message: We've done all the cleanup we can. Time to take the fight to the source: Sugar Man.
dialog.name: CT2_G05_L01

dialog.message: The X-Men are doing public service announcements alerting consumers not to use any of the counterfeit lotions.
dialog.name: CT2_G05_L02

dialog.message: We've also got the word out to retailers to recall all of the tainted product.
dialog.name: CT2_G05_L03

dialog.message: We have an emergency, Agent. Squirrel Girl has gone missing.
dialog.name: SG1_G01_L01

dialog.message: … that’s an emergency? Seriously?
dialog.name: SG1_G01_L02

dialog.message: Stark, the first time you met Squirrel Girl, she rescued you from Dr. Doom. She fought him by herself. And won.
dialog.name: SG1_G01_L03

dialog.message: You know, I’d managed to convince myself that was a bad dream.
dialog.name: SG1_G01_L04

dialog.message: S.H.I.E.L.D. has been keeping tabs on her ever since. Doreen Green is far more powerful than she looks. It would be a disaster if she fell into the wrong hands.
dialog.name: SG1_G01_L05

dialog.message: She was last seen near St. Patrick’s Cathedral, just prior to the Incursion. Let’s move.
dialog.name: SG1_G01_L06

dialog.message: Complete all quests to unlock the ability to purchase Squirrel Girl! LIMITED TIME ONLY!
dialog.name: SG1_G01_L07

dialog.message: Sir, we have a lead on Squirrel Girl. Sugar Man wants to extract her genetic profile, and is offering a reward to anyone who will bring her to him alive.
dialog.name: SG1_G02_L01

dialog.message: I don’t even want to know what “extracting a genetic profile” involves. Raid his lab and see if there’s a trail.
dialog.name: SG1_G02_L02

dialog.message: Sugar Man’s disappeared, and there’s no sign of Squirrel Girl. How about we make her come to us, instead of vice-versa?
dialog.name: SG1_G03_L01

dialog.message: If we gather enough nuts together in one place, we’ll attract every squirrel in the area. Where they go, she’ll go.
dialog.name: SG1_G03_L02

dialog.message: … Remind me again why you’re considered a genius.
dialog.name: SG1_G03_L03

dialog.message: Have you got any better ideas?
dialog.name: SG1_G03_L04

dialog.message: Thor’s flown in another load of acorns for the pile. I’m thinking we should charge admission: "Come see the amazing Nut Pyramid!"
dialog.name: SG1_G04_L01

dialog.message: This isn’t the silliest Coisa S.H.I.E.L.D.’s ever done... but it’s close.
dialog.name: SG1_G04_L02

dialog.message: Well, I think it’s great!
dialog.name: SG1_G04_L03

dialog.message: Gah! When did you get here?!
dialog.name: SG1_G04_L04

dialog.message: Are you guys busy? Squirrels have been disappearing all over the city! I could use your help finding them.
dialog.name: SG1_G04_L05

dialog.message: Let me get this straight. You want us to drop what we’re doing and help you rescue squirrels? You are completely -
dialog.name: SG1_G04_L06

dialog.message: Remember Dr. Doom.
dialog.name: SG1_G04_L07

dialog.message: … right. You are completely right, we should help.
dialog.name: SG1_G04_L08

dialog.message: Thanks guys! Alright, follow me!
dialog.name: SG1_G04_L09

dialog.message: Doreen, do you have any idea where we’re going?
dialog.name: SG1_G05_L01

dialog.message: Nope! I just wanted to kick Dragoness’s butt. I’m sure we’ll find the squirrels if we keep looking around, though!
dialog.name: SG1_G05_L02

dialog.message: Stark. I hear you have a rodent problem.
dialog.name: SG1_G05_L03

dialog.message: Please tell me you have a solution.
dialog.name: SG1_G05_L04

dialog.message: I can adapt my insect comms rig to work with small mammals. It should allow for long-range communication with squirrels. I’m not surprised you didn’t think of it.
dialog.name: SG1_G05_L05

dialog.message: Hank, normally I’d love to get into one of our usual slap-fights, but anyCoisa that brings this “mission” to a close faster is worth seeing that smug smile of yours.
dialog.name: SG1_G05_L06

dialog.message: You’re welcome. Give me a few hours to throw it together.
dialog.name: SG1_G05_L07

dialog.message: Uh huh... Uh huh. Really? Wow. Go on.
dialog.name: SG1_G06_L01

dialog.message: Do you think the Squirrely-Talkie’s working, or is she just faking it?
dialog.name: SG1_G06_L02

dialog.message: Of course it’s working. Why wouldn’t it -
dialog.name: SG1_G06_L03

dialog.message: Shhh!
dialog.name: SG1_G06_L04

dialog.message: Sorry.
dialog.name: SG1_G06_L05

dialog.message: … uh huh. Of course we will! Okay, bye!
dialog.name: SG1_G06_L06

dialog.message: The squirrels say they’ve fled the city because A.I.M.’s set up some big machine underneath Central Park. It’s driving all the animals crazy. We have to take it out!
dialog.name: SG1_G06_L07

dialog.message: We did it! Oh my gosh, you guys are the best! How can I ever thank you?
dialog.name: SG1_G07_L01

dialog.message: Have you ever considered joining the Avengers? You’d be a valuable asset to the team.
dialog.name: SG1_G07_L02

dialog.message: Wait, what?
dialog.name: SG1_G07_L03

dialog.message: Hmm... let me talk it over with Tippy-Toe. Does the Helicarrier cafeteria handle special diets? She’s strictly macadamia-only.
dialog.name: SG1_G07_L04

dialog.message: Agent, if you are going to take on Loki, you'll need a wardrobe upgrade.
dialog.name: CH01_G63_L01

dialog.message: Equipping new uniforms allows S.H.I.E.L.D Agents to gain a class type.
dialog.name: CH01_G63_L02

dialog.message: The Agent will gain the strengths and weaknesses of that Class.
dialog.name: CH01_G63_L03

dialog.message: Blaster > Bruiser > Scrapper > Infiltrator > Tactician > Blaster
dialog.name: CH01_G63_L04

dialog.message: Get an Infiltrator uniform, and a Tactician like Loki won't stand a chance.
dialog.name: CH01_G63_L05

dialog.message: It's too early to celebrate, people. We've still got a giant, green loose end to tie up.
dialog.name: CT11_G01_L01

dialog.message: As soon as we're back in New York, we need to find Banner and bring him down. Mr. Stark, it looks like you're finally ready.
dialog.name: CT11_G01_L02

dialog.message: Seriously? The paint's barely dry on this Coisa, and you want me to get pounded on by the Hulk? Anyone hear about beta-testing?
dialog.name: CT11_G01_L03

dialog.message: Guess we're doing it live. Iron Man, Smash! ...I've always wanted to say that.
dialog.name: CT11_G01_L04

dialog.message: There is a new Simulator Challenge available for Hulk. Complete the Challenges to unlock the Avengers: Age of Ultron Hulk uniform!
dialog.name: SIM55_G01_L01
dialog.title: S.H.I.E.L.D. SIMULATOR

dialog.message: Murderworld is Arcade's territory. He rules unbridled.
dialog.name: SM15_G25_L01

dialog.message: I fear now that he has manipulated the underlying nanostructure to make himself more powerful. The old days when Arcade was just a sadistic voyeur...those days are over.
dialog.name: SM15_G25_L02

dialog.message: Be ever vigilant. You will see him again.
dialog.name: SM15_G25_L03

dialog.message: I've decided to take a more active role in the Murder parts of Murderworld! For too long I've allowed others to have all the fun...
dialog.name: SM15_G24_L01

dialog.message: Logan, we've got a vigilante on the streets operating outside S.H.I.E.L.D.'s command-and-control structures.
dialog.name: MK1_G01_L01

dialog.message: Now's your chance to come clean. We know you don't like people telling you what to do, but it's crucial that we know what our field assets are doing at all times.
dialog.name: MK1_G01_L02

dialog.message: It wasn’t me, bub. And believe me, if it was, I'd tell you.
dialog.name: MK1_G01_L03

dialog.message: Well, early intel shows the vigilante has gone to the trouble of trying to look like you, claws and all. Any ideas?
dialog.name: MK1_G01_L04

dialog.message: Sounds like Mystique.
dialog.name: MK1_G01_L05

dialog.message: We thought it might be Daken, but all of the Dark Avengers are still incarcerated on the Raft.
dialog.name: MK1_G01_L06

dialog.message: Agent, we're putting you on this. Whoever this vigilante is, we need to get him either working with S.H.I.E.L.D. or out of our way.
dialog.name: MK1_G01_L07

dialog.message: We're taking Wolverine at his word that he's not our mystery vigilante. For now.
dialog.name: MK1_G02_L01

dialog.message: So we need to identify this person, and he's doing an excellent job of staying out of surveillance footage.
dialog.name: MK1_G02_L02

dialog.message: That means we're going to crowdsource our raw intel.
dialog.name: MK1_G02_L03

dialog.message: Since everyone in the world is constantly taking pictures of everyCoisa with their phones, it shouldn't be too hard to get images of our vigilante impersonator.
dialog.name: MK1_G02_L04

dialog.message: That is, if we can get to them before they sell the pics to the Daily Bugle. Those guys will publish anyCoisa.
dialog.name: MK1_G02_L05

dialog.message: These sightings started about the same time the Circle of 8 became active. There might be a connection.
dialog.name: MK1_G03_L01

dialog.message: Or maybe-Wolverine was seen talking to Circle of 8 cultists.
dialog.name: MK1_G03_L02

dialog.message: Track some of them down and squeeze a little information out of them.
dialog.name: MK1_G03_L03

dialog.message: The Circle of 8 angle isn't quite panning out. Those guys do noCoisa but spout gibberish.
dialog.name: MK1_G04_L01

dialog.message: Another possibility is we're dealing with a Wolverine from an Incursion.
dialog.name: MK1_G04_L02

dialog.message: If that's the case, he might be near an Incursion site. Locate one and see what you can find.
dialog.name: MK1_G04_L03

dialog.message: A pattern is emerging. We’ve plotted the locations of the sightings and they appear to be following the activities of the Living Pharaoh.
dialog.name: MK1_G05_L01

dialog.message: Find the Pharaoh and intercept him. Perhaps we'll also cross paths with this rogue maybe-Wolverine.
dialog.name: MK1_G05_L02

dialog.message: This doesn't look like someCoisa Logan would use. He's got his own claws. But these are functional. Agent, you can keep them. Put them to good use.
dialog.name: MK1_G07_L01

dialog.message: We've recovered a damaged set of components for some kind of blade technology.
dialog.name: MK1_G06_L01

dialog.message: Let's get them in the lab and see if we can put it back together and get it working.
dialog.name: MK1_G06_L02

dialog.message: The plot thickens. The Dark Avengers might still be under lock and key, but HYDRA's version is out in force again. There's a certain shield being thrown around...
dialog.name: MK1_G08_L01

dialog.message: ...and it isn't mine. We've got a copycat.
dialog.name: MK1_G08_L02

dialog.message: Could be they're working a version of Wolverine into their group? Then they'd be the HYDRA 5. Kind of catchy.
dialog.name: MK1_G08_L03

dialog.message: If that's their plan, let's stop them from getting the band together.
dialog.name: MK1_G08_L04

dialog.message: No sign yet of a HYDRA version of Wolverine, but we can't be sure.
dialog.name: MK1_G09_L01

dialog.message: That's Cap-speak for, "I want to pound on HYDRA goons some more."
dialog.name: MK1_G09_L02

dialog.message: I love ambition, don't get me wrong. Hungry, forceful ambition. The drive to be the best that's ever been. But sometimes it causes problems.
dialog.name: CT4_G01_L01

dialog.message: Like right now. There's a smart kid out there who reverse-engineered a version of my repulsor tech. Why? To win a science fair.
dialog.name: CT4_G01_L02

dialog.message: It's fallen into A.I.M.'s hands. And they're using it to attack S.H.I.E.L.D. assets.
dialog.name: CT4_G01_L03

dialog.message: You've got your work cut out for you, Agent. First, counter the A.I.M. attacks.
dialog.name: CT4_G01_L04

dialog.message: Then we need to track down their base and eliminate it to make sure they no longer have the repulsor tech. That's mine, and we don't need misguided geniuses spreading it around.
dialog.name: CT4_G01_L05

dialog.message: That looks like a hologram generator. A little subtle for HYDRA. I mean, holograms can't really hurt anyone.
dialog.name: MK1_G11_L01

dialog.message: Ahh, but this one can. It creates an actual holobarrier, a kind of hard light that--
dialog.name: MK1_G11_L02

dialog.message: Actually, I'm pretty sure I just heard the gears in Coulson's head grinding to a halt, so let's wait on the diffraction physics lesson. Anyway, it’s yours now, Agent.
dialog.name: MK1_G11_L03

dialog.message: Militant and Hammer left behind some kind of device. It's a little beat up after the fight.
dialog.name: MK1_G10_L01

dialog.message: Give it here. If it has an ON button I can make it work
dialog.name: MK1_G10_L02

dialog.message: I keep a careful inventory of all the thugs I beat the snot out of, and I can tell you those guys aren't mine. It's nice work, though.
dialog.name: MK1_G13_L01

dialog.message: Whoever our vigilante pal is, he's struck again.
dialog.name: MK1_G12_L01

dialog.message: Still targeting HYDRA?
dialog.name: MK1_G12_L02

dialog.message: No, this time it’s just regular street punks -- jacked up, Iso’ed out street punks, but not HYDRA material.
dialog.name: MK1_G12_L03

dialog.message: Who did it this time?
dialog.name: MK1_G12_L04

dialog.message: The Bugle is saying it's our friendly neighborhood web-slinger...but that's what they always say.
dialog.name: MK1_G12_L05

dialog.message: Someone pretending to be Capitão América, Wolverine, and Spider-Man?
dialog.name: MK1_G12_L06

dialog.message: Ambitious, right?
dialog.name: MK1_G12_L07

dialog.message: We need to make contact with the local street thugs and find out for ourselves.
dialog.name: MK1_G12_L08

dialog.message: A.I.M.'s initial attack has been repelled. No S.H.I.E.L.D. base is under direct threat--oh. I spoke too soon.
dialog.name: CT4_G02_L01

dialog.message: Repulsor-powered flying armor...
dialog.name: CT4_G02_L02

dialog.message: An inefficient, power-guzzling A.I.M. knockoff of my old suits, basically. Technocrats, jeez. No imagination of their own.
dialog.name: CT4_G02_L03

dialog.message: ...is attacking the Helicarrier. We need an immediate and decisive response.
dialog.name: CT4_G02_L04

dialog.message: Agreed. The way A.I.M. builds Coisas, it's probably leaking radiation all over the place. Let's get out there, Agent.
dialog.name: CT4_G02_L05

dialog.message: Coisas are getting complicated. Make sure you have adequate backup on call.
dialog.name: MK1_G14_L01

dialog.message: The Helicarrier is no longer under threat. Now we move onto the next phase. We've got intel about an A.I.M. staging base at an abandoned private airport.
dialog.name: CT4_G03_L01

dialog.message: You're going to lead a strike team to take out the A.I.M. assets there and make sure all pirated Stark tech is either recovered or destroyed.
dialog.name: CT4_G03_L02

dialog.message: For the record, my preference is to recover as much as you can. I'm always interested to see inferior versions of my tech so I can gloat a little. Then we can destroy it, before it causes any more harm.
dialog.name: CT4_G03_L03

dialog.message: Pirated stuff is never as good as the original. It breaks, it's not built to code, and it can injure both people who are using it and those around them.
dialog.name: CT4_G03_L04

dialog.message: Here's an idea. If there's new thugs running amok, we probably should be thinking about the Hood, right? He’s, like, king of the thugs.
dialog.name: MK1_G15_L01

dialog.message: I could drop by stately Hood Manor and ask him.
dialog.name: MK1_G15_L02

dialog.message: Go ahead, but he's not really the type to just air out all of his plans so you can marvel at his diabolical brilliance.
dialog.name: MK1_G15_L03

dialog.message: I'll ask nicely. But firmly.
dialog.name: MK1_G15_L04

dialog.message: The airport is no longer a functioning A.I.M. asset. Excellent work, Agent.
dialog.name: CT4_G04_L01

dialog.message: The term surgical strike is overused, but I think we can justifiably apply it in this case.
dialog.name: CT4_G04_L02

dialog.message: There's just one more Coisa to do. At least one of the A.I.M. suits of flying armor has escaped. You'll need a way to track it, using the radiation signature it left behind. Chase it down and render it inoperable.
dialog.name: CT4_G04_L03

dialog.message: Not bad for an amateur. I mean, they're not as good as mine, but they might come in handy for someone without my special gifts.
dialog.name: MK1_G17_L01

dialog.message: You want them, Agent?
dialog.name: MK1_G17_L02

dialog.message: What's this Coisa?
dialog.name: MK1_G16_L01

dialog.message: One more broken gadget. Oh, man, what's that gunk all over it?
dialog.name: MK1_G16_L02

dialog.message: Don't touch it without a hazmat suit.
dialog.name: MK1_G16_L03

dialog.message: Hey, that looks familar. Let me see that.
dialog.name: MK1_G16_L04

dialog.message: We've brought our young inventor in to see what he has to say for himself. Apparently he didn't mean any harm, but stealing tech methods is piracy, just like copying a DVD.
dialog.name: CT4_G06_L01

dialog.message: I'm guessing he understands that now, thanks to the one-eyed stare of our Director, Nick Fury.
dialog.name: CT4_G06_L02

dialog.message: Plus we gave him a tour, just to soften the blow a little. S.H.I.E.L.D. is always looking for talent, as long as we can keep it on the straight and narrow.
dialog.name: CT4_G06_L03

dialog.message: Now I might offer this kid a job. Could make a good engineer someday. Just need to get him before S.H.I.E.L.D. does. As long as he promises to play by the rules from now on.
dialog.name: CT4_G06_L04

dialog.message: Nicely done, Agent. The A.I.M. armor is out of commission and all repulsor tech elements have been recovered.
dialog.name: CT4_G05_L01

dialog.message: Your next stop is South Portland, Maine, where you're going to pick up our budding mad scientist and bring him in.
dialog.name: CT4_G05_L02

dialog.message: We're going to make sure he understands the dangers of what he's doing.
dialog.name: CT4_G05_L03

dialog.message: Okay, I'm tired of playing games with you.
dialog.name: MK1_G18_L01

dialog.message: How many clues do I have to leave before you figure it out?
dialog.name: MK1_G18_L02

dialog.message: Don't give yourself too much credit, ace. We had you pegged from the beginning.
dialog.name: MK1_G18_L03

dialog.message: Tell yourselves that if it makes you feel better. Right now, I've got more important Coisas to do, and I could use a little extra firepower.
dialog.name: MK1_G18_L04

dialog.message: Drop the vigilante routine, stand with us, and we'll provide more firepower and resources than you can handle.
dialog.name: MK1_G18_L05

dialog.message: Boy, Coisas are looking up. Just when we're besieged by an apocalyptic assassin cult and colliding alternate Earths, we ask a bona-fide lunatic to join the team.
dialog.name: MK1_G18_L06

dialog.message: Stark, if I culled every misfit with a grudge out of S.H.I.E.L.D., there wouldn't be much left.
dialog.name: MK1_G18_L07

dialog.message: I’ve been tinkering with the sad little claw, holobarrier and web gadgets we found and because I'm a genius, I have made genius improvements.
dialog.name: MK1_G19_L01

dialog.message: Now there's a way to take all three of these doodads and integrate them into a single armature. Like...
dialog.name: MK1_G19_L02

dialog.message: ...so. Agent, want to give it a try?
dialog.name: MK1_G19_L03

dialog.message: Hey, Agent. We've been watching you for a while.
dialog.name: SIM_G52_L01

dialog.message: Not in a creepy way or anyCoisa.
dialog.name: SIM_G52_L02

dialog.message: We like how you handle yourself out there. Fearless, resourceful...
dialog.name: SIM_G52_L03

dialog.message: I am Groot.
dialog.name: SIM_G52_L04

dialog.message: …and good at improvising, too. We agree that you might have what it takes to be a Guardian.
dialog.name: SIM_G52_L05

dialog.message: Honorary.
dialog.name: SIM_G52_L06

dialog.message: Well, sure, an "honorary" Guardian. I doubt Fury's gonna let you leave the planet anytime soon.
dialog.name: SIM_G52_L07

dialog.message: The good news is that you're practically in already. We just need to get to know each other better. Join us in combat, let us use the Helicarrier facilities, make us some breakfast, whatever. Just the usual stuff.
dialog.name: SIM_G52_L08

dialog.message: At the end, if we all still agree, we'll make it official. What do you say?
dialog.name: SIM_G52_L09

dialog.message: Alrighty. Let's make this official. Here's your shiny, new Guardian Insignia. As long as you're wearing this, you're an honorary Guardian of the Galaxy!
dialog.name: SIM_G53_L01

dialog.message: Or just of Earth, at least.
dialog.name: SIM_G53_L02

dialog.message: There is a new Simulator Challenge available for Drax. Complete the Challenges to unlock the Guardian Drax the Destroyer uniform!
dialog.name: SIM_G46_L01
dialog.title: S.H.I.E.L.D. SIMULATOR

dialog.message: There is a new Simulator Challenge available for Gamora. Complete the Challenges to unlock the Guardian Gamora uniform!
dialog.name: SIM_G31_L01
dialog.title: S.H.I.E.L.D. SIMULATOR

dialog.message: Now that you've researched Field Medicine, you can purchase First Aid Packs from the Store.
dialog.name: CH01_G36_L01

dialog.message: The more research you complete, the more gear and items you'll have available to you in the Store.
dialog.name: CH01_G36_L02

dialog.message: Start another Research project if you haven't already. It's always good to have one in the oven.
dialog.name: CH01_G36_L03

dialog.message: Looks like Ultron is already mass-producing copies of himself. We need to fight back wherever they turn up, whether it's here or in other Agents' patrol areas.
dialog.name: SM08_G30_L01

dialog.message: We're giving this a full-court press, Agent. Get the help of your colleagues and end this.
dialog.name: SM08_G30_L02

dialog.message: Help your friends and earn more Omega Lockboxes by visiting their maps and fighting Ultron! Helping your friends costs no energy or Unstable Iso-8!
dialog.name: SM08_G30_L03

dialog.message: Make sure you and your friends defeat Ultron before time runs out to receive your Omega Lockboxes.
dialog.name: SM08_G30_L04

dialog.message: Collect more Omega Lockboxes to have a chance to win Omega Sentinel as a playable hero!
dialog.name: SM08_G30_L05

dialog.message: We have a confirmed sighting of Ultron! All Agents, Priority Redirect!
dialog.name: SM08_G29_L01

dialog.message: Group Bosses are devastatingly powerful enemies that cannot be defeated in one combat. Luckily you can enlist the help of your friends against them!
dialog.name: SM08_G29_L02

dialog.message: Once the Group Boss is defeated, you will win Omega Lockboxes. Open Omega Lockboxes for a chance to win Omega Sentinel as a playable hero!
dialog.name: SM08_G29_L03

dialog.message: My dispute is not with S.H.I.E.L.D.... at least not at the moment. Whatever grievance you wish to air, save it for another time.
dialog.name: SM31_G24_L01

dialog.message: I caught up to the Kingpin. He's not playing around. He's wrecking whole floors of buildings taking out the Maggia who have sided with the Owl.
dialog.name: SM31_G23_L01

dialog.message: Is he under some kind of influence? Maybe whoever's controlling Boomerang has their hooks in Fisk too.
dialog.name: SM31_G23_L02

dialog.message: He's not talking much. But when he does, it sounds like the same old Fisk. Cultured, courteous...and real, real dangerous.
dialog.name: SM31_G23_L03

dialog.message: Agent, it's summer in New York City, and I've been itching to work on some new tech.
dialog.name: SE16_G01_L01

dialog.message: Remember that old S.H.I.E.L.D.-issued Mech Armor with all the bugs and design flaws?
dialog.name: SE16_G01_L02

dialog.message: Well I went back and looked over the schematics, and let me just say that Coulson really should've asked me for the assist on this one.
dialog.name: SE16_G01_L03

dialog.message: After all, I think I know a Coisa or two about powered armor and the weapon systems that go in 'em.
dialog.name: SE16_G01_L04

dialog.message: Ahem.
dialog.name: SE16_G01_L05

dialog.message: So here's what we're going to do: For two weeks, I'll bankroll this venture out of pocket.
dialog.name: SE16_G01_L06

dialog.message: Come back each day and I'll, 'share the wealth', as we get these bad boys online.
dialog.name: SE16_G01_L07

dialog.message: I think I'll call this, 'Tony Stark's Summer Celebration: 2016'.
dialog.name: SE16_G01_L08

dialog.message: You know how it is... brand it in a way where we can reuse the event name each year, and just update the number.
dialog.name: SE16_G01_L09

dialog.message: Well, what are you waiting for agent? Let's put these resources to good use!
dialog.name: SE16_G01_L10

dialog.message: This is it, Agent. The final day of, 'Tony Stark's Summer Celebration: 2016'.
dialog.name: SE16_G02_L01

dialog.message: Testing these new armors in the field has given me a few ideas for some future upgrades we can make. But we'll have to keep 'em on the backburner till next summer.
dialog.name: SE16_G02_L02

dialog.message: Go ahead and grab what you can. I'll clean up here in the lab, then plan myself a little vacation from our recent 'stay-cation'.
dialog.name: SE16_G02_L03

dialog.message: Thanks to the Cosmic Cube, it seems like the Red Skull is everywhere at the same damn time.
dialog.name: SM10_G30_L01

dialog.message: Sure makes it easy for him to keep an eye on HYDRA...and also to get out of tight spots.
dialog.name: SM10_G30_L02

dialog.message: Nobody ever said capturing reanimated Nazi super-soldiers was going to be easy. Let's get to it.
dialog.name: SM10_G30_L03

dialog.message: Agent, the Red Skull is using the Cosmic Cube to mount surprise attacks!
dialog.name: SM10_G29_L01

dialog.message: I can't stress enough how dire this is, Agent. If the Skull has this level of control over the Cube, he is limited only by his imagination. Literally.
dialog.name: SM10_G29_L02

dialog.message: Don't put anyCoisa past him. If it's devious, cruel, and underhanded, he's thought of it already.
dialog.name: SM10_G29_L03

dialog.message: We've locked down his location...at least for now.
dialog.name: SM10_G29_L04

dialog.message: Hit him before he starts moving again!
dialog.name: SM10_G29_L05

dialog.message: Success! We can now enhance an individual's abilities directly with Iso-8. However, Tony, we need you for the last step.
dialog.name: FUE3_G02_L01

dialog.message: Really? I mean, of course, obviously the technology required to--
dialog.name: FUE3_G02_L02

dialog.message: We need a name for it.
dialog.name: FUE3_G02_L03

dialog.message: ... what? Oh, um... Augmented?
dialog.name: FUE3_G02_L04

dialog.message: Yes! Augmented Iso-8!
dialog.name: FUE3_G02_L05

dialog.message: Brilliant.
dialog.name: FUE3_G02_L06

dialog.message: Perfect. Thank you, Tony.
dialog.name: FUE3_G02_L07

dialog.message: I hate you guys.
dialog.name: FUE3_G02_L08

dialog.message: Empowered Iso-8 is broadly useful, no doubt about that. But perhaps we should be thinking... smaller.
dialog.name: FUE3_G01_L01

dialog.message: Well, smaller is your specialty.
dialog.name: FUE3_G01_L02

dialog.message: No, I mean more refined than Empowered Iso-8, more focused! A targeted Iso-8 infusion, keyed to an individual metahuman's unique powerset, could amplify their strengths far more effectively.
dialog.name: FUE3_G01_L03

dialog.message: Um, okay, but how would you--
dialog.name: FUE3_G01_L04

dialog.message: By creating a superfluid condensate, yes! But the energy requirements--
dialog.name: FUE3_G01_L05

dialog.message: I have the necessary equipment at my lab. Let's go!
dialog.name: FUE3_G01_L06

dialog.message: Uh, yeah, you go do that physics and chemistry stuff, guys. I'll just be over here, engineering... Coisas. Just let me know when you're done.
dialog.name: FUE3_G01_L07

dialog.message: I added some cool lights and glowing bits, this gun is totally badass now. I also re-engineered the firing chamber for higher accuracy and greater damage.
dialog.name: SM01_G136_L01

dialog.message: Take her out for a spin, Agent, and let me know how she feels.
dialog.name: SM01_G136_L02

dialog.message: Agent, that Hellfire Club weapon you found is top-tier tech. S.H.I.E.L.D. can do better though.
dialog.name: SM01_G135_L01

dialog.message: Let's take it into the lab, and see how we can improve it.
dialog.name: SM01_G135_L02

dialog.message: Agent Gear that is marked as "Upgradeable" can be researched to create weapons that are even more powerful.
dialog.name: SM01_G135_L03

dialog.message: Visit research now to upgrade the "Mindbreaker" and acquire the more powerful "Mindkiller."
dialog.name: SM01_G135_L04

dialog.message: To get more: • Wait for your points to refill • Buy points from the Store
dialog.name: ALERT_G03_L01
dialog.title: CHALLENGE POINTS

dialog.message: There is a new Special Operation available, Agent. Play now to unlock Adam Warlock and exclusive new weapons!
dialog.name: ALERT_G20_L01
dialog.title: SPECIAL OPERATIONS

dialog.message: The combat could not be started because the game has been updated. You will not lose any resources to restart.
dialog.name: ALERT_G26_L01
dialog.title: ATTENTION AGENT!

dialog.message: PVP is where S.H.I.E.L.D. agents compete to have the best strike team.
dialog.name: ALERT_G22_L01
dialog.title: Player vs Player

dialog.message: Ladder competitions are broken into Seasons. Each Season is a fresh start, allowing agents to begin on an even playing field.
dialog.name: ALERT_G22_L02
dialog.title: Ladders and Ratings

dialog.message: Rating is a measurement of your success. Rating increases by defeating opponents and decreases after being defeated. This determines your rank on the Ladder.
dialog.name: ALERT_G22_L03
dialog.title: Ladders and Ratings

dialog.message: While a Ladder Season is active, click on the large Tournament Fight button to compete in the Ladder. An opponent will be automatically chosen for you.
dialog.name: ALERT_G22_L04
dialog.title: Ladders and Ratings

dialog.message: The first five Tournament Fights per day provide a bonus to XP awarded.
dialog.name: ALERT_G22_L05
dialog.title: Ladders and Ratings

dialog.message: Use the Practice button to test your team's strength against a variety of opponents. Practice battles don't cost challenge points, but don't affect your Rating or award XP.
dialog.name: ALERT_G22_L06
dialog.title: Ladders and Ratings

dialog.message: The Information tab gives you access to details on rewards, the ladders, and battle reports for the current Season.
dialog.name: ALERT_G22_L07
dialog.title: Ladders and Ratings

dialog.message: The Battle Reports button shows a history of battles that you have initiated or that others have initiated against you.
dialog.name: ALERT_G22_L08
dialog.title: Ladders and Ratings

dialog.message: Agents can increase their performance in PVP by recruiting heroes and equipping their armory.
dialog.name: ALERT_G22_L09
dialog.title: PVP Bonus

dialog.message: Heroes provide a stat bonus depending on the class of the hero. Blasters provide attack, Bruisers defense, and so on.
dialog.name: ALERT_G22_L10
dialog.title: PVP Bonus

dialog.message: The higher level the hero is, the more bonus they provide.
dialog.name: ALERT_G22_L11
dialog.title: PVP Bonus

dialog.message: Items can be placed in the Armory to provide a bonus to offensive or defensive stats.
dialog.name: ALERT_G22_L12
dialog.title: PVP Bonus

dialog.message: The amount an item contributes to offense or defense in PVP is listed on the item description.
dialog.name: ALERT_G22_L13
dialog.title: PVP Bonus

dialog.message: Improve your bonus so you can defeat even the toughest foes.
dialog.name: ALERT_G22_L14
dialog.title: PVP Bonus

dialog.message: Now that you know the basics, get out there and prove who the best S.H.I.E.L.D. agent is.
dialog.name: ALERT_G22_L15
dialog.title: PVP Bonus

dialog.message: Agents can increase their performance in PVP by recruiting heroes and equipping their armory.
dialog.name: ALERT_G23_L01
dialog.title: PVP Bonus

dialog.message: Heroes provide a stat bonus depending on the class of the hero. Blasters provide attack, Bruisers defense, and so on.
dialog.name: ALERT_G23_L02
dialog.title: PVP Bonus

dialog.message: The higher level the hero is, the more bonus they provide.
dialog.name: ALERT_G23_L03
dialog.title: PVP Bonus

dialog.message: Items can be placed in the Armory to provide a bonus to offensive or defensive stats.
dialog.name: ALERT_G23_L04
dialog.title: PVP Bonus

dialog.message: The amount an item contributes to offense or defense in PVP is listed on the item description.
dialog.name: ALERT_G23_L05
dialog.title: PVP Bonus

dialog.message: Improve your bonus so you can defeat even the toughest foes.
dialog.name: ALERT_G23_L06
dialog.title: PVP Bonus

dialog.message: Get more Simulator Points from the Store!
dialog.name: ALERT_G30_L01
dialog.title: Get More Simulator Points!

dialog.message: The S.H.I.E.L.D. Simulator is divided into two areas: Challenges and Villain Archive.
dialog.name: ALERT_G32_L01
dialog.title: S.H.I.E.L.D. SIMULATOR

dialog.message: Challenges provide a variety of unique combat sets designed to test the skills of both Agents and Heroes. Complete all Challenges in a set to earn rewards!
dialog.name: ALERT_G32_L02
dialog.title: S.H.I.E.L.D. SIMULATOR

dialog.message: Using the Simulator to attempt Challenges requires Simulator Points. Simulator Points automatically return over time, and may be purchased in the Store.
dialog.name: ALERT_G32_L03
dialog.title: S.H.I.E.L.D. SIMULATOR

dialog.message: The Villain Archive provides a brief bio for each villain, and creates a fight simulation against that villain. These do not consume Simulator Points.
dialog.name: ALERT_G32_L04
dialog.title: S.H.I.E.L.D. SIMULATOR

dialog.message: Heroic Battles are unique fights showcasing specific heroes and villains.
dialog.name: S2_ALERT_G01_L01
dialog.title: Heroic Battles

dialog.message: Recruit all heroes involved to meet the challenge. Chance to get great rewards!
dialog.name: S2_ALERT_G01_L02
dialog.title: Heroic Battles

dialog.message: During an Incursion, you will need to fight off a strike team from a parallel dimension, intent on destroying our world to save their own.
dialog.name: S2_ALERT_G04_L01
dialog.title: Incursions

dialog.message: Defeat them to keep our reality safe. Chance to get great rewards!
dialog.name: S2_ALERT_G04_L02
dialog.title: Incursions

dialog.message: Complete missions with high scores to gain chapter mastery. Bonus points are awarded for defeating more challenging adversaries.
dialog.name: S2_ALERT_G02_L01
dialog.title: Chapter Mastery

dialog.message: Reaching five stars on all missions in a chapter will grant a golden weapon!
dialog.name: S2_ALERT_G02_L02
dialog.title: Chapter Mastery

dialog.message: Complete all tasks, deploys, heroic battles, incursions, epic bosses, and challenge modes in a chapter to complete it.
dialog.name: S2_ALERT_G03_L01
dialog.title: Chapter Progress

dialog.message: Completing a chapter will grant awesome rewards!
dialog.name: S2_ALERT_G03_L02
dialog.title: Chapter Progress

dialog.message: Boss? SomeCoisa you ought to know.
dialog.name: S2_ALERT_G05_L01

dialog.message: Then you ought to be telling me.
dialog.name: S2_ALERT_G05_L02

dialog.message: We've been observing space-time disruptions all across the surface of the Earth. Not just the typical stuff you might see if a time traveler or interdimensional entity was appearing, but--
dialog.name: S2_ALERT_G05_L03

dialog.message: Coulson, I've got the Hellfire Club, the Brotherhood, HYDRA, the Hand, and God only knows who else breaCoisa down our necks. No time for leisurely nerd briefings.
dialog.name: S2_ALERT_G05_L04

dialog.message: Well, boss, we've got people coming out of these breaches.
dialog.name: S2_ALERT_G05_L05

dialog.message: This is not my shocked face, Coulson.
dialog.name: S2_ALERT_G05_L06

dialog.message: It might be when I tell you that...well, sir, some of the people we're seeing already exist here.
dialog.name: S2_ALERT_G05_L07

dialog.message: Skrulls?
dialog.name: S2_ALERT_G05_L08

dialog.message: We don't think so. Other versions. Different versions. Alternates, duplicates, who knows. Other landscapes, too... We're calling these events Incursions.
dialog.name: S2_ALERT_G05_L09

dialog.message: How the hell...?
dialog.name: S2_ALERT_G05_L10

dialog.message: That's what we're trying to find out, sir.
dialog.name: S2_ALERT_G05_L11

dialog.message: The Incursion Battle could not load, please try again later.
dialog.name: S2_ALERT_G06_L01
dialog.title: REALITY DESTABILIZED

dialog.message: You don't have enough Silver and/or S.H.I.E.L.D. Points
dialog.name: ALERT_G08_L01
dialog.title: HOLD ON, AGENT

dialog.message: There is a new PVP Season available, Agent. Play now to unlock Phyla-Vell and other exclusive rewards!
dialog.name: ALERT_G25_L01
dialog.title: Phyla-Vell Tournament Intro

dialog.message: You don't have enough Command Points to purchase this premium mission
dialog.name: ALERT_G10_L01
dialog.title: Command Points

dialog.message: The Command Points you recovered can be used to acquire a new hero. Gavião Arqueiro is ready to recruit.
dialog.name: CH01_G15_L01

dialog.message: Use your available Command Points to recruit Gavião Arqueiro now.
dialog.name: CH01_G15_L02

dialog.message: Hey, fellow directors. I have a new trick I want to try out.
dialog.name: CH01_G14_L01

dialog.message: Agent, send Iron Man off to Train.
dialog.name: CH01_G14_L02

dialog.message: Managing your team and keeping them up with the latest techniques and abilities will make a huge difference in combat.
dialog.name: CH01_G14_L03

dialog.message: Go Manage your Team and we'll walk you through it.
dialog.name: CH01_G14_L04

dialog.message: You don't have enough Gold.
dialog.name: ALERT_G11_L01
dialog.title: Gold

dialog.message: You don't have enough Silver.
dialog.name: ALERT_G12_L01
dialog.title: Silver

dialog.message: Last time you'll see this training room, Agent. For this final test, all safeties are off.
dialog.name: CH00_G01_L01

dialog.message: You'll face a salvaged Sentinel that has been set up to kill you. You'd do well to avoid that. Begin.
dialog.name: CH00_G01_L02

dialog.message: You've recruited Iron Man, your first team member. You'll need to continue recruiting heroes to build the strongest Team.
dialog.name: CH00_G04_L01
dialog.title: Collect Heroes

dialog.message: We've marked where Black Widow is, Agent. Get down there and help her.
dialog.name: CH00_G04_L02

dialog.message: Starting a Battle costs Energy. Energy refills over time.
dialog.name: CH00_G04_L03

dialog.message: You're not finished yet. S.H.I.E.L.D. provides Supplies that can give you an edge over the toughest enemy.
dialog.name: CH00_G02_L01

dialog.message: Use one of the grenades in your Inventory.
dialog.name: CH00_G02_L02

dialog.message: Widow's been hurt! Check your inventory for a Health Kit. She needs it.
dialog.name: CH00_G05_L01

dialog.message: Without you, we don't have access to S.H.I.E.L.D.'s Supplies. So try not to get blown up, okay?
dialog.name: CH00_G05_L02

dialog.message: Remote Ops will generate the Silver needed for Training, Research, Supplies, and Gear.
dialog.name: CH01_G05_L02

dialog.message: A Hero needs to accompany the Remote Op, and will be unavailable until it is complete or you abort it.
dialog.name: CH01_G05_L03

dialog.message: You can abort a Remote Operation at any time.
dialog.name: CH01_G05_L04

dialog.message: Unlock more flight bays to run more simultaneous Remote Ops. Upgrade the Jets to earn even larger payouts.
dialog.name: CH01_G05_L05

dialog.message: You just sent Black Widow off on a Remote Operation.
dialog.name: CH01_G05_L01

dialog.message: While Widow's on the Remote Op in Newark, check your Missions and get back to the scene ASAP.
dialog.name: CH01_G05_L06

dialog.message: Looks like someone's run out of stamina. Let them Recharge so you can hit them with all you got.
dialog.name: CH01_G24_L01

dialog.message: He's down but not out. We could use some help.
dialog.name: CH00_G09_L01

dialog.message: It looks like you have a Distress Call available. Activate it.
dialog.name: CH00_G09_L02

dialog.message: Ok, now would be a good time to use that EMP Grenade.
dialog.name: CH00_G08_L01

dialog.message: It should fry his circuits, stun him, and slow him down.
dialog.name: CH00_G08_L02

dialog.message: Good work down there, Agent.
dialog.name: CH01_G71_L01

dialog.message: Your work has freed up the resources needed to add another Hero to your team. Choose wisely.
dialog.name: CH01_G71_L02

dialog.message: You can also gain an edge by placing powerful items into your PVP Bonus armory.
dialog.name: CH01_G72_L04
dialog.title: Battle Chamber Bonus

dialog.message: Expand your PVP Bonus armory to store more items by completing Research Assignments.
dialog.name: CH01_G72_L05
dialog.title: Battle Chamber Bonus

dialog.message: Experiment, have fun, and rise through the ranks to dominate the leaderboards!
dialog.name: CH01_G72_L06
dialog.title: Go for it!

dialog.message: Tactical competitions are now online.
dialog.name: CH01_G72_L01

dialog.message: Form your strike team and test your heroes against others by visiting Player versus Player.
dialog.name: CH01_G72_L02
dialog.title: Battle Chamber Competition

dialog.message: The heroes you have recruited and their level contribute to your team's strength, even when not in combat.
dialog.name: CH01_G72_L03
dialog.title: Strike team and the Armory

dialog.message: You can add a PvP Bonus to your strike team by permanently socketing items (gear, supplies, and resources) to the PvP Bonus area.
dialog.name: CH01_G73_L01

dialog.message: Different items provide either an Offensive or Defensive bonus for your team.
dialog.name: CH01_G73_L02

dialog.message: You can increase the storage capacity for your PvP Bonus by unlocking and completing an appropriate Research assignment.
dialog.name: CH01_G73_L03

dialog.message: Having assigned your strike team and increased your PvP Bonus with items, you're now ready to challenge other Agents!
dialog.name: CH01_G74_L01

dialog.message: Good luck!
dialog.name: CH01_G74_L02

dialog.message: The game has been updated. Please refresh your browser to see the new improvements.
dialog.name: ALERT_G17_L01
dialog.title: ATTENTION AGENT!

dialog.message: Group Bosses are powerful enemies that cannot be defeated in one combat.
dialog.name: ALERT_G27_L01
dialog.title: Group Boss

dialog.message: To defeat a Group Boss, enlist the help of your friends. You can also help your friends by visiting their map.
dialog.name: ALERT_G27_L02
dialog.title: Group Boss

dialog.message: You'll earn silver for each combat, and Lockboxes when the Group Boss is defeated.
dialog.name: ALERT_G27_L03
dialog.title: Group Boss

dialog.message: Lockboxes contain a random prize, including a chance at winning a unique playable hero!
dialog.name: ALERT_G27_L04
dialog.title: Group Boss

dialog.message: Lockboxes can be opened in the Collections menu on the Flight Deck.
dialog.name: ALERT_G27_L05
dialog.title: Group Boss

dialog.message: Be sure you and your friends defeat the Group Boss before its timer expires, or it will escape and return later at full health!
dialog.name: ALERT_G27_L06
dialog.title: Group Boss

dialog.message: By placing items in your PVP Bonus armory, you can gain an edge in PVP. Improve your PVP bonus and get back in the fight!
dialog.name: CH01_G60_L01

dialog.message: Such flattery, Commander Hill. How unlike you. So, where do you need me?
dialog.name: CH01_G04_L07

dialog.message: Good to see you again, Agent. No trace of the signature when I arrived. Someone got there first.
dialog.name: CH01_G04_L01

dialog.message: Just glad to see you back in one piece. Agent, I'm pulling up the S.H.I.E.L.D. entry on Remote Ops for you now...
dialog.name: CH01_G04_L02

dialog.message: This Flight Deck allows S.H.I.E.L.D. to run Remote Operations around the globe.
dialog.name: CH01_G04_L03

dialog.message: Remote Ops take time, but the resources they create are invaluable.
dialog.name: CH01_G04_L04

dialog.message: As shorthand, we refer to all standard resources as Silver.
dialog.name: CH01_G04_L05

dialog.message: Black Widow is one of S.H.I.E.L.D.'s finest and should prove more than up to any job you need her for.
dialog.name: CH01_G04_L06

dialog.message: They're having issues linking the Research grid. A critical node in Newark is still out.
dialog.name: CH01_G04_L08

dialog.message: I bet that's the first time "critical" and "Newark" have been used in the same sentence. Let me check that status...
dialog.name: CH01_G04_L09

dialog.message: Unusual readings there. Likely just after-effects of the Pulse.
dialog.name: CH01_G04_L10

dialog.message: They need someone to check it out and crack the whip on those repairs.
dialog.name: CH01_G04_L11

dialog.message: Crack the whip and you think of me?
dialog.name: CH01_G04_L12

dialog.message: Sounds about right.
dialog.name: CH01_G04_L13

dialog.message: Fine.
dialog.name: CH01_G04_L14

dialog.message: Agent, when I get back I hope to join you on your next mission.
dialog.name: CH01_G04_L15

dialog.message: Right after I have a little talk with Mr. Stark.
dialog.name: CH01_G04_L16

dialog.message: Assign Black Widow to a Remote Operation from the Flight Deck. We need more Silver to fuel this war.
dialog.name: CH01_G04_L17

dialog.message: To enter full-screen mode, or change other settings, click the small gear on the bottom right.
dialog.name: CH01_G18_L01

dialog.message: A Combat Validation Error has occurred. Please refresh the browser to continue playing Avengers Alliance.
dialog.name: ALERT_G21_L01
dialog.title: ATTENTION AGENT!

dialog.message: • Wait for your energy to refill • Ask your friends for energy • Buy energy from the Store
dialog.name: ALERT_G01_L01
dialog.title: NEED MORE ENERGY?

dialog.message: • Wait for your energy to refill • Buy energy from the Store • Ask your friends for energy
dialog.name: ALERT_G02_L01
dialog.title: ENERGY - To Get More:

dialog.message: You do not have sufficient funds to purchase this yet.
dialog.name: ALERT_G04_L01
dialog.title: HOLD ON, AGENT

dialog.message: You do not meet the requirements to access this yet.
dialog.name: ALERT_G05_L01
dialog.title: LOCKED

dialog.message: Need S.H.I.E.L.D. Points?
dialog.name: ALERT_G06_L01
dialog.title: S.H.I.E.L.D. Points

dialog.message: Anomaly in user data detected. A negative impact on PVP maybe occuring. If you are using a 3rd party program that effects Marvel: Avengers Alliance user data, please turn it off now. Further data manipulation will lead to a ban from PVP.
dialog.name: S2_ALERT_G07_L01
dialog.title: SIMULATION COMPROMISED

dialog.message: Your current session has expired. Please refresh the browser to continue playing Avengers Alliance.
dialog.name: ALERT_G18_L01
dialog.title: ATTENTION AGENT!

dialog.message: You can now access an In-Combat store where Gold can be spent on lifesaving and tide-turning power-ups!
dialog.name: CH01_G10_L01

dialog.message: AnyCoisa worth having is worth the wait, but we may be able to grease the wheels and speed up this process.
dialog.name: CH01_G25_L01

dialog.message: We could put your Gold reserves to work. Gold usually has a way of getting what you want faster.
dialog.name: CH01_G25_L02

dialog.message: If it's less than five minutes, we could work the right channels and push it through for free.
dialog.name: CH01_G25_L03

dialog.message: The more agents we recruit, the more backup we'll get in a fight!
dialog.name: CH01_G26_L01

dialog.message: This alliance can never have too many Avengers.
dialog.name: CH01_G26_L02

dialog.message: Let's pay a visit to Tony Stark at the Avengers Tower and receive another Distress Call.
dialog.name: CH01_G26_L03

dialog.message: We can always visit other agents on location and lend a hand.
dialog.name: CH01_G27_L01

dialog.message: They receive help on their mission, and you receive a Distress Call to use in a fight.
dialog.name: CH01_G27_L02

dialog.message: I've marked where Tony Stark is located and some supply caches we've recovered around town. Pick them up, Agent.
dialog.name: CH01_G27_L03

dialog.message: Now you know the benefits of an alliance: more people watching your back.
dialog.name: CH01_G28_L01

dialog.message: Let's check the candidate roster and see who else we should recruit into the Avengers Alliance.
dialog.name: CH01_G28_L02

dialog.message: Track your achievements, your friends, the community, and more.
dialog.name: CH02_G10_L02

dialog.message: Visit the Marvel XP to dive into the details of your favorite heroes and villains.
dialog.name: CH02_G10_L01

dialog.message: Get back to the Flight Deck, Agent. Keep those Remote Ops running, then get back to your missions.
dialog.name: CH01_G37_L01

dialog.message: You don't have enough Command Points to complete the recruitment
dialog.name: ALERT_G09_L01
dialog.title: Command Points

dialog.message: Get help from Allies with Distress Calls. Add Allies so you can call on more Heroes to help you win.
dialog.name: ALERT_G15_L01
dialog.title: ADD FRIENDS

dialog.message: All team members are busy, please free up a hero before continuing
dialog.name: ALERT_G28_L01
dialog.title: ALL TEAM MEMBERS ARE BUSY

dialog.message: Strike Teams allow you to create and send teams to different global locations at the same time to deal with simultaneous threats.
dialog.name: ALERT_G29_L01
dialog.title: Strike Teams

dialog.message: When creating a Strike Team, remember that only members of the Strike Team will be used in upcoming missions, so try and choose a balanced mix of heroes and abilities.
dialog.name: ALERT_G29_L02
dialog.title: Strike Teams

dialog.message: Heroes can only belong to one Strike Team at a time, so choose teams wisely. Strike Teams can even be sent without the Agent!
dialog.name: ALERT_G29_L03
dialog.title: Strike Teams

dialog.message: Strike Teams may come with Provided Heroes, able to handle the basic tasks needed to complete the mission, but you may want to add additional heroes to deal with all potential threats.
dialog.name: ALERT_G29_L04
dialog.title: Strike Teams

dialog.message: Once a Strike Team has been created, there may be few opportunities to add or remove heroes. Reconfiguring Strike Teams may require replaying previous missions.
dialog.name: ALERT_G29_L05
dialog.title: Strike Teams

dialog.message: • Allies can help you via "Distress Calls" • Visit Allies daily for supplies, energy, & more • Help each other during "special events"
dialog.name: ALERT_G14_L01
dialog.title: ADD ALLIES

dialog.message: Need Unstable Iso-8?
dialog.name: ALERT_G07_L01
dialog.title: Unstable Iso-8

dialog.message: This Special Operation has expired. All stored Unstable Iso-8 has decayed and the Hero is no longer available.
dialog.name: ALERT_G19_L01
dialog.title: ATTENTION AGENT!

dialog.message: Special Operations are Limited Time challenges where you can earn unique boss items through battle and even a new hero by completing all of the chapter's tasks.
dialog.name: SM04_G71_L01

dialog.message: Once the time for the mission has expired, you can no longer win the hero. So act fast, Agent!
dialog.name: SM04_G71_L02

dialog.message: Special Operations require the resource Unstable Iso-8 to access its mission events, including battles and deploys.
