dialog.name: SM04_G71_L03

dialog.message: You can earn Unstable Iso-8 through battle or deploys, gifts from friends, or buy it from the store to help you complete the challenge.
dialog.name: SM04_G71_L04

dialog.message: However, once the mission is expired that flavor of Unstable Iso-8 goes away with it, so try to use it all up!
dialog.name: SM04_G71_L05

dialog.message: Well met, Agent. Perhaps later we will raise a glass together, but this battle is not over. Captain, your shield is needed.
dialog.name: CH00_G13_L01

dialog.message: On my way, Thor. Thanks, soldier. That would've been a lot messier had you not shown up.
dialog.name: CH00_G13_L02

dialog.message: Iron Man, I need you and this Agent back at the Helicarrier's Flight Deck to send Black Widow on a Remote Op.
dialog.name: CH00_G13_L03

dialog.message: You heard the man. Let's go.
dialog.name: CH00_G13_L04

dialog.message: In future missions, there may be optional or hidden challenges beyond the Boss you can pursue. Keep your eyes open, Agent!
dialog.name: CH00_G13_L06

dialog.message: Having defeated Hydra's Power Armor, this area is secure. You can exit the map by clicking the "Exit Map" icon.
dialog.name: CH00_G13_L05

dialog.message: You should always look ahead to see what requirements are needed to unlock the next mission.
dialog.name: CH01_G33_L01

dialog.message: Once a jet is purchased, you can ask your allies to pilot it, or put that Gold to use and hire new pilots!
dialog.name: CH01_G34_L01

dialog.message: The more Allies you have the stronger your team will perform in PvP.
dialog.name: ALERT_G16_L01
dialog.title: ADD FRIENDS

dialog.message: Daily Missions are unique mission challenges that change each day of the week.
dialog.name: DM_HELP_G01_L01
dialog.title: DAILY MISSIONS

dialog.message: Some Daily Missions enforce special rules or restrictions, but many rare and exclusive rewards may be won by completing the challenge.
dialog.name: DM_HELP_G01_L02
dialog.title: DAILY MISSIONS

dialog.message: Check back Daily for more challenges and rewards!
dialog.name: DM_HELP_G01_L03
dialog.title: DAILY MISSIONS

dialog.message: Funny how one dumb mistake can screw you over. Throw a game, get kicked offa the team. Rough up your coach, get kicked outta school. Try ta make a living, get thrown in the clink.
dialog.name: CO13_G01_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Amazing Spider-Man Vol. 1 #4 cover from a Sandbox
dialog.name: CO13_G09_L01

dialog.message: Break outta jail, stumble on a radioactive beach, get turned into a freak. What a life. Felt good at the time, though. First time I felt like I wasn't just another schlub with a record.
dialog.name: CO13_G02_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Amazing Spider-Man Vol. 1 #616 cover from a Sandbox
dialog.name: CO13_G10_L01

dialog.message: Y'know I never even thought about helpin' folks with my power? I coulda gone into construction, or... I dunno. Somethin' that wasn't hittin' people and takin' their stuff. It's just... I didn't know nothin' else.
dialog.name: CO13_G03_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Fantastic Four Vol. 1 #148 cover from a Sandbox
dialog.name: CO13_G11_L01

dialog.message: What would you have done, huh? I was invincible! I could do anyCoisa I wanted and nothin' could touch me! Well... except Spider-Man. With a vacuum cleaner. Yeah, ain't proud'a that one.
dialog.name: CO13_G04_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man Vol. 1 #17 cover from a Sandbox
dialog.name: CO13_G12_L01

dialog.message: It takes it outta you, ya know? Doin' crimes, bein' hunted down, not givin' a crap about anyCoisa... it does Coisas to your head. It's the only Coisa I'm good at, but I think I'm goin' crazy from it.
dialog.name: CO13_G05_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Marvel Adventures Spider-Man Vol. 1 #23 cover from a Sandbox
dialog.name: CO13_G13_L01

dialog.message: I got scattered on a beach once, after fightin' Spidey. Just blowin' away on the wind, not knowin' who or what I was. You can't know how that feels. It's like tiny bits of you dying, slowly. Forever.
dialog.name: CO13_G06_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Marvel Age Spider-Man Vol. 1 #17 cover from a Sandbox
dialog.name: CO13_G14_L01

dialog.message: That ain't no way to live. Sure, I had some bad breaks, but so did other folks, and they turned out okay. Hell, Ben Grimm looks like a pile o' rocks, and you couldn't find a better guy!
dialog.name: CO13_G07_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Amazing Spider-Man Vol. 2 #4 cover from a Sandbox
dialog.name: CO13_G15_L01

dialog.message: Yeah, I'm doin' it right now. I'm goin' clean, for real. If you got the papers, bring 'em out! I'll sign 'em. Bill Baker... the Avenger. Hah! Who woulda thought.
dialog.name: CO13_G08_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Incredible Hulk Vol. 1 #113 cover from a Sandbox
dialog.name: CO13_G16_L01

dialog.message: I am told you always wish an interview before "allowing" a new member into your little band. A trifling diversion. Very well! I accept.
dialog.name: CO08_G01_L01

dialog.message: Journey Into Mystery Vol. 1 #85 cover from a Mischievous Lockbox
dialog.name: CO08_G09_L01

dialog.message: So then… why do I wish to join you? Hmm. An answer in the form of a mirror: why do YOU wish to join ME?
dialog.name: CO08_G02_L01

dialog.message: Avengers Vol. 1 #1 cover from a Mischievous Lockbox
dialog.name: CO08_G10_L01

dialog.message: While you ponder that, ask yourself… why continue this fight? This endless, pointless crusade against the so-called powers of evil? You’ll never win, so why try?
dialog.name: CO08_G03_L01

dialog.message: Siege Vol. 1 #1 cover from a Mischievous Lockbox
dialog.name: CO08_G11_L01

dialog.message: The answer, of course, is because you need the fight. Crave it. Just like my boorish ox of a brother. It defines you, as surely as chaos defines me.
dialog.name: CO08_G04_L01

dialog.message: Thor Vol. 1 #147 cover from a Mischievous Lockbox
dialog.name: CO08_G12_L01

dialog.message: Oh, you posture and bluster and call yourself hero. But deep down, all your efforts, all your supposed sacrifice, is just the begging of a child for his candy.
dialog.name: CO08_G05_L01

dialog.message: Thor: First Thunder Vol. 1 #2 cover from a Mischievous Lockbox
dialog.name: CO08_G13_L01

dialog.message: I hope none of this surprises you. One should always know oneself, don’t you think? You will never find one more self-aware than I.
dialog.name: CO08_G06_L01

dialog.message: Thor Vol. 1 #175 cover from a Mischievous Lockbox
dialog.name: CO08_G14_L01

dialog.message: I unsettle. I confuse. Above all I undermine, and I undermine none so thoroughly as myself. To quote the scorpion, I cannot help it. It is my nature.
dialog.name: CO08_G07_L01

dialog.message: Loki Vol. 1 #1 cover from a Mischievous Lockbox
dialog.name: CO08_G15_L01

dialog.message: Think about your nature, Agent. And what it means to join with Loki. Perhaps that will lessen the pain of the sting.
dialog.name: CO08_G08_L01

dialog.message: Loki Vol. 2 #1 cover from a Mischievous Lockbox
dialog.name: CO08_G16_L01

dialog.message: A job interview? Seriously? I mean, you took Moonstone, for crying out loud. I figured all I had to do was show up. But hey, you want my qualifications? Fine.
dialog.name: CO12_G01_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Avengers Vol. 1 #196 cover from a Mimetic Lockbox
dialog.name: CO12_G09_L01

dialog.message: You already know I can copy the moves of anyone I see. You get me, you get the best of the rest. Cap's shield throw? Spider-Man's web swing? Like tying my shoes.
dialog.name: CO12_G02_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Cable & Deadpool Vol. 1 #36 cover from a Mimetic Lockbox
dialog.name: CO12_G10_L01

dialog.message: Now granted, I'm not Rogue. I don't get the power set. So don't ask me to juggle trucks or shoot laser beams out my nose or whatever. But name a martial art I haven't mastered, and I'll buy you lunch.
dialog.name: CO12_G03_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Treinador Vol. 2 #1 cover from a Mimetic Lockbox
dialog.name: CO12_G11_L01

dialog.message: And I'm a damn good teacher. Even had a HYDRA training academy going... until you guys shut it down. Yeah, thanks a heap. Small business owners, always getting dumped on by the government...
dialog.name: CO12_G04_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Treinador Vol. 1 #1 cover from a Mimetic Lockbox
dialog.name: CO12_G12_L01

dialog.message: Not that it was a great gig or anyCoisa. Half the "students" were complete mooks. "I'll pay you back after my first mission, Treinador! You'll see, I'm gonna be the next Crossbones!" Give me a friggin' break.
dialog.name: CO12_G05_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Secret Avengers Vol. 2 #2 cover from a Mimetic Lockbox
dialog.name: CO12_G13_L01

dialog.message: Anyway. So, why S.H.I.E.L.D.? Honestly, I didn't even consider it until recently. Didn't pay enough. This place used to be like a superspy sweatshop. Seriously, ask Constritor, he'll tell you all about it.
dialog.name: CO12_G06_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Avengers: The Initiative Vol. 1 #33 cover from a Mimetic Lockbox
dialog.name: CO12_G14_L01

dialog.message: But times change. A.I.M.'s checks keep bouncing, HYDRA's got management issues out the wazoo, the Maggia's too small-time... and don't even ask about the Circle of 8. Creepy bastards.
dialog.name: CO12_G07_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Avengers: The Initiative Vol. 1 #25 cover from a Mimetic Lockbox
dialog.name: CO12_G15_L01

dialog.message: Stacked against all that, S.H.I.E.L.D. looks pretty good. Guess that's not a ringing endorsement, but what can I say? You get what you pay for. So... what are you offering?
dialog.name: CO12_G08_L01

dialog.message: Collect the The Amazing Spider-Man Vol. 1 #308 cover from a Mimetic Lockbox
dialog.name: CO12_G16_L01

dialog.message: Oh...it's you, the well-renowned Agent of S.H.I.E.L.D. Do you wish to hear me say that I have had a change of heart? That I have seen the error of my ways?
dialog.name: CO23_G01_L01

dialog.message: Collect the
dialog.name: CO23_G09_L01

dialog.message: That with my death at the hands of the Dread Dormammu and my experience in the hellish afterlife that I wrought for myself, I am now a changed man?
dialog.name: CO23_G02_L01

dialog.message: Collect the
dialog.name: CO23_G10_L01

dialog.message: Wouldn't we both know that I was lying if I said as such?
dialog.name: CO23_G03_L01

dialog.message: Collect the
dialog.name: CO23_G11_L01

dialog.message: To be honest, shouldn't you be questioning your own allies? After all, not many call themselves allies to the daughter of Mephisto or a god of lies.
dialog.name: CO23_G04_L01

dialog.message: Collect the
dialog.name: CO23_G12_L01

dialog.message: Sometimes, I wonder who is truly the "evil" one here. Don't you?
dialog.name: CO23_G05_L01

dialog.message: Collect the
dialog.name: CO23_G13_L01

dialog.message: Don't worry, Agent. As long as Strange keeps me on a short leash, I cannot harm you.
dialog.name: CO23_G06_L01

dialog.message: Collect the
dialog.name: CO23_G14_L01

dialog.message: I didn't ask to be resurrected, but who am I to reject such a gift. But to be freed from eternal torment...then I will help you. After all, our goals appear to be the same for now.
dialog.name: CO23_G07_L01

dialog.message: Collect the
dialog.name: CO23_G15_L01

dialog.message: But know this! No one controls the great Barão Mordo. Not Dormammu. Not Umar. And certainly not Stephen Strange.
dialog.name: CO23_G08_L01

dialog.message: Collect the
dialog.name: CO23_G16_L01

dialog.message: You know, Agent. Most people, including other supervillains out there, think I'm a joke.
dialog.name: CO24_G01_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Amazing Spider-Man Vol.1 #280 from a Boomerang Lockbox
dialog.name: CO24_G09_L01

dialog.message: Seriously, me? A joke? Yeah, right! I'd show those losers.
dialog.name: CO24_G02_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Spectacular Spider-Man Vol.1 #144 from a Boomerang Lockbox
dialog.name: CO24_G10_L01

dialog.message: So there I was in Madripoor, sitting down at the pub, when all of a sudden I get this epiphany.
dialog.name: CO24_G03_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Spider-Man Unlimited Vol.1 #12 from a Boomerang Lockbox
dialog.name: CO24_G11_L01

dialog.message: With all the commotion with these Incursions and Worthy running around, all you heroes have to be cutting yourselves a little thin.
dialog.name: CO24_G04_L01

dialog.message: Collect the The Superior Foes of Spider-Man Vol.1 #003 from a Boomerang Lockbox
dialog.name: CO24_G12_L01

dialog.message: If I could get a team together, I could have planned out one of the greatest heists ever!
dialog.name: CO24_G05_L01

dialog.message: Collect the The Superior Foes of Spider-Man Vol.1 #004 from a Boomerang Lockbox
dialog.name: CO24_G13_L01

dialog.message: But then Killgrave showed up...I really hate that guy. I could have been a contender…I’m not just somebody’s lackey.
dialog.name: CO24_G06_L01

dialog.message: Collect the The Superior Foes of Spider-Man Vol.1 #008 from a Boomerang Lockbox
dialog.name: CO24_G14_L01

dialog.message: You know what, though? What better way to get back at Killgrave and all those guys that called me a loser then by turning them all over to the authorities myself!
dialog.name: CO24_G07_L01

dialog.message: Collect the The Superior Foes of Spider-Man Vol.1 #013 from a Boomerang Lockbox
dialog.name: CO24_G15_L01

dialog.message: So yeah. I’m ready to reform, just so long as the pay’s good.
dialog.name: CO24_G08_L01

dialog.message: Collect the The Superior Foes of Spider-Man Vol.1 #016 from a Boomerang Lockbox
dialog.name: CO24_G16_L01

dialog.message: I used to define myself by relationships. Daughter of a Greek diplomat. Girlfriend of Matt Murdock. Simple and comfortable, but vulnerable. Weak.
dialog.name: CO06_G01_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Daredevil Vol. 1 #168 cover from a Shadowy Lockbox
dialog.name: CO06_G09_L01

dialog.message: When my father and I were kidnapped, I could do noCoisa to stop it. Instead of save him, the police mistook him for one of the kidnappers, and shot him dead.
dialog.name: CO06_G02_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Daredevil Vol. 1 #181 cover from a Shadowy Lockbox
dialog.name: CO06_G10_L01

dialog.message: I lost much more than a father on that day. I lost faith in relationships. In people, in laws, in life. I foresook them all. There was noCoisa left but me, and I was weak. I decided to change that.
dialog.name: CO06_G03_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Dark Reign: Elektra Vol. 1 #1 cover from a Shadowy Lockbox
dialog.name: CO06_G11_L01

dialog.message: I sought out the ninja organization called The Hand. I passed their tests, swore their oaths, rose in their ranks, even became their leader. It wasn't enough.
dialog.name: CO06_G04_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Elektra Vol. 2 #1 cover from a Shadowy Lockbox
dialog.name: CO06_G12_L01

dialog.message: Next, I tried money. I went back to New York, to become the chief assassin of the Kingpin. There I met Matt again, now in the guise of Daredevil.
dialog.name: CO06_G05_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Elektra Vol. 2 #3 cover from a Shadowy Lockbox
dialog.name: CO06_G13_L01

dialog.message: A ghost of my former life, one I had never wanted to see again. Or so I told myself. I fought alongside him, and I fought against him. And in the end, I died.
dialog.name: CO06_G06_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Elektra Vol. 2 #22 cover from a Shadowy Lockbox
dialog.name: CO06_G14_L01

dialog.message: Except it wasn't the end. I was brought back, back to this life without meaning, without connection. Perhaps S.H.I.E.L.D. will have what I'm looking for. I doubt it, but some part of me refuses to give up.
dialog.name: CO06_G07_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Elektra: The Hand Vol. 1 #1 cover from a Shadowy Lockbox
dialog.name: CO06_G15_L01

dialog.message: For now, I'm here. Before, we were enemies. Now, we are friends. I make no apologies, and no promises. NoCoisa is permanent.
dialog.name: CO06_G08_L01

dialog.message: Collect the The New Avengers Vol. 1 #27 cover from a Shadowy Lockbox
dialog.name: CO06_G16_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Thor King-Size Special Vol.1 #2 cover from an Unbreakable Lockbox
dialog.name: CO19_G09_L01

dialog.message: Ah, Agent. What impeccable timing. I thought I would surprise you with a gift for all you have accomplished and our growing friendship.
dialog.name: CO19_G02_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Thor Vol.1 #151 cover from an Unbreakable Lockbox
dialog.name: CO19_G10_L01

dialog.message: This is not a gift but a devastating weapon that belongs to the All-Father!
dialog.name: CO19_G03_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Thor Vol.1 #266 cover from an Unbreakable Lockbox
dialog.name: CO19_G11_L01

dialog.message: Oh come now. How often have I or the Enchantress thwarted my father's defenses to control yon Destroyer, Agent?
dialog.name: CO19_G04_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Thor Vol.1 #381 cover from an Unbreakable Lockbox
dialog.name: CO19_G12_L01

dialog.message: Should I not use these same methods for the betterment of Midgard instead? And besides, I had help.
dialog.name: CO19_G05_L01

dialog.message: Collect The Mighty Thor Vol.1 #476 cover from an Unbreakable Lockbox
dialog.name: CO19_G13_L01

dialog.message: Enchantress! You had a hand in this!? If you are trying to bring Earth to ruin in these times of strife, I say thee nay!
dialog.name: CO19_G06_L01

dialog.message: Collect The Mighty Thor Vol.1 #477 cover from an Unbreakable Lockbox
dialog.name: CO19_G14_L01

dialog.message: Stay your hammer. I only assisted Loki as a gesture of good will. You will find the binding enchantment I have conjured only allows the Destroyer to be directed by the mortals. Not I, nor the Trickster.
dialog.name: CO19_G07_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Thor Vol.2 #2 cover from an Unbreakable Lockbox
dialog.name: CO19_G15_L01

dialog.message: I will have words with Thor on this matter, but for now...Agent, the Destroyer is a powerful weapon, but there may be repercussions in the future. Tread lightly.
dialog.name: CO19_G08_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Thor Vol.2 #36 cover from an Unbreakable Lockbox
dialog.name: CO19_G16_L01

dialog.message: Hey there, big guy. Nice place they set you up in. Got to give it to us Earthers: We know how to make people feel right at home.
dialog.name: CO30_G01_L01

dialog.message: Oh ya, I keep forgetting Kree aren't born with a funny bone.
dialog.name: CO30_G01_L03

dialog.message: Collect the Annihilation: Ronan Vol.1 #1 cover from a Supreme Lockbox
dialog.name: CO30_G09_L01

dialog.message: Fine! Don't talk to me! "Woe is me, the high and mighty Kree Accuser, laid low by pitiful Earthlings! Leave me be and let me weep in my cell."
dialog.name: CO30_G02_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Annihilation Vol.1 #2 cover from a Supreme Lockbox
dialog.name: CO30_G10_L01

dialog.message: I do not weep, Peter Quill. I have merely accepted my punishment for failure.
dialog.name: CO30_G03_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Annihilation: Ronan Vol.1 #3 cover from a Supreme Lockbox
dialog.name: CO30_G11_L01

dialog.message: Punishment? This is punishment? I mean, don't get me wrong, I know you could bust out of here and walk through that door anytime you wanted to, buddy. We can't keep you here, and you know it. So why are you still here?
dialog.name: CO30_G04_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Annihilation: Ronan Vol.1 #4 cover from a Supreme Lockbox
dialog.name: CO30_G12_L01

dialog.message: You are only a Guardian of the Galaxy, Quill, but I serve a higher cause. Even my own people fail to see that I seek to save the universe. At every turn, you and your allies have stopped me. And now...you have no idea of the repercussions of your success.
dialog.name: CO30_G05_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Annihilation Vol.1 #5 cover from a Supreme Lockbox
dialog.name: CO30_G13_L01

dialog.message: What are you talking about? You're not making sense, Ronan.
dialog.name: CO30_G06_L01

dialog.message: Incursions, Peter Quill. They are not just a threat to your Earth but a threat to the entire universe.
dialog.name: CO30_G06_L02

dialog.message: If Earth were to fall to an Incursion, our universe goes along with it, for whatever reason that may be. That's why Earth should be destroyed. Without Earth, there are no more Incursions.
dialog.name: CO30_G06_L03

dialog.message: Collect the Annihilation: Conquest Vol.1 #6 cover from a Supreme Lockbox
dialog.name: CO30_G14_L01

dialog.message: Even if that is true, killing billions is never justified, Accuser. Your people knew that. That's why they didn't support you.
dialog.name: CO30_G07_L01

dialog.message: Collect the FF Vol.1 #7 cover from a Supreme Lockbox
dialog.name: CO30_G15_L01

dialog.message: You know noCoisa, Peter Quill. But if I cannot destroy Earth, then I will ensure its survival and the survival of my people. Stand aside, Quill. I will have words with the Earthling Coulson.
dialog.name: CO30_G08_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Guardians Team-Up Vol.1 #3 cover from a Supreme Lockbox
dialog.name: CO30_G16_L01

dialog.message: It is good to see you again, Agent. I must say, meeting this way is much more civil and desirable than our usual run-ins.
dialog.name: CO18_G01_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Journey into Mystery Vol.1 #103 cover from an Enchanting Lockbox
dialog.name: CO18_G09_L01

dialog.message: You are probably wondering, "Why does Amora the Enchantress wish to be here? What secret could she be hiding?" Truly Agent, I have hidden no secrets from you.
dialog.name: CO18_G02_L01

dialog.message: Collect the The Avengers Vol.1 #7 cover from an Enchanting Lockbox
dialog.name: CO18_G10_L01

dialog.message: I have always been honest with you, even from the beginning. So why do I wish to be here? In a word: Odinson.
dialog.name: CO18_G03_L01

dialog.message: Collect the The Avengers Vol.1 #9 cover from an Enchanting Lockbox
dialog.name: CO18_G11_L01

dialog.message: Thor has been spending so much time in Midgard, fighting the Worthy and helping you collect those silly space rocks. It’s time I reminded him that he can’t live without me.
dialog.name: CO18_G04_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Doctor Strange, Sorcerer Supreme Vol.1 #12 cover from an Enchanting Lockbox
dialog.name: CO18_G12_L01

dialog.message: We have both seen what the Worthy are capable of, and we are both very aware that the nine realms are in terrible danger... or is it ten now?
dialog.name: CO18_G05_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Thor: Son of Asgard Vol.1 #8 cover from an Enchanting Lockbox
dialog.name: CO18_G13_L01

dialog.message: Speaking of secrets, there are even whispers upon the winds that Ragnarök is on the horizon. If these truly are the end of days, I know who I would choose to be with.
dialog.name: CO18_G06_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Thor: Son of Asgard Vol.1 #9 cover from an Enchanting Lockbox
dialog.name: CO18_G14_L01

dialog.message: But now is not a time to be grim. It is a time to celebrate. I believe this newly forged alliance will be beneficial to both of us.
dialog.name: CO18_G07_L01

dialog.message: Collect the The Mighty Thor Vol.1 #14 cover from an Enchanting Lockbox
dialog.name: CO18_G15_L01

dialog.message: You will have access to the wisdom and experience of Asgard's most talented and beautiful sorceress, and I'll have the honored service of standing beside the Odinson... and his companions I suppose.
dialog.name: CO18_G08_L01

dialog.message: Collect the The Mighty Thor Vol.1 #17 cover from an Enchanting Lockbox
dialog.name: CO18_G16_L01

dialog.message: Bucky, Mind if the Agent and I have a few words with you? We just need to make sure it's you.
dialog.name: CO26_G01_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Capitão América Vol.5 #31 cover from a Wintry Lockbox
dialog.name: CO26_G09_L01

dialog.message: I get it, Steve. Really. I know you have to do this. I get it. So where do we start?
dialog.name: CO26_G02_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Winter Solider Vol.1 #1 cover from a Wintry Lockbox
dialog.name: CO26_G10_L01

dialog.message: How much do you remember? Before and after our mission to capture Zola.
dialog.name: CO26_G03_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Capitão América Vol.1 #619 cover from a Wintry Lockbox
dialog.name: CO26_G11_L01

dialog.message: I remember...training at Goldie's. You begged me to teach you how to fight. It's like a dream. It comes back in waves.
dialog.name: CO26_G04_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Capitão América & Bucky Vol.1 #621 cover from a Wintry Lockbox
dialog.name: CO26_G12_L01

dialog.message: As for my 'missions' after Zola, well, those are mostly blank. I remember the Leader, but that may be because of the mental link between us at the time.
dialog.name: CO26_G05_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Capitão América & Bucky Vol.1 #624 cover from a Wintry Lockbox
dialog.name: CO26_G13_L01

dialog.message: Steve, I want to help you, but I honestly can't recall much about my time as the 'Winter Soldier.'
dialog.name: CO26_G06_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Capitão América & Bucky Vol.1 #626 cover from a Wintry Lockbox
dialog.name: CO26_G14_L01

dialog.message: I know I've done terrible Coisas. I can't ever pay it all back, but I want to try.
dialog.name: CO26_G07_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Winter Soldier Vol.1 #4 cover from a Wintry Lockbox
dialog.name: CO26_G15_L01

dialog.message: I know, Buck. You've got my support. Agent, do you mind talking to Coulson and the others? I think I might be too close on this one.
dialog.name: CO26_G08_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Winter Soldier Vol.1 #7 cover from a Wintry Lockbox
dialog.name: CO26_G16_L01

dialog.message: You wanna hear my story? Ain't that a peach. Here goes: I found a gem in a temple. It let me talk to a god. He made me invincible. The End.
dialog.name: CO03_G01_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Uncanny X-Men Vol. 1 #416 cover from an Unstoppable Lockbox
dialog.name: CO03_G09_L01

dialog.message: Fat lot of good it did me. All I ever wanted was to put my fist through the head of my brainiac half-brother Charles.
dialog.name: CO03_G02_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Uncanny X-Men Vol. 1 #540 cover from an Unstoppable Lockbox
dialog.name: CO03_G10_L01

dialog.message: You know him as Charles Xavieravier. Pfft. What kinda dork calls himself "Professor"? Look at me, I'm gonna make my own school so you all hafta call me Professor! What a crock.
dialog.name: CO03_G03_L01

dialog.message: Collect the X-Men Vol. 1 #12 cover from an Unstoppable Lockbox
dialog.name: CO03_G11_L01

dialog.message: Ever since we was kids, he's been using his mind-reading garbage to get ahead and keep me down. Even my old man liked him better. Bastard.
dialog.name: CO03_G04_L01

dialog.message: Collect the X-Men Vol. 2 #161 cover from an Unstoppable Lockbox
dialog.name: CO03_G12_L01

dialog.message: Anyway, Charles and his prissy mutant freakshow have always shut me down. Don't matter what I did or who I joined up with. I can punch a mountain to gravel, but I can't kill a cripple.
dialog.name: CO03_G05_L01

dialog.message: Collect the The Amazing Spider-Man Vol. 1 #229 cover from an Unstoppable Lockbox
dialog.name: CO03_G13_L01

dialog.message: So here I am. I could say Magneto had the right idea, or that I had a change of heart, or that Cyttorak told me to switch teams. But that's crap.
dialog.name: CO03_G06_L01

dialog.message: Collect the New Excalibur Vol. 1 #5 cover from an Unstoppable Lockbox
dialog.name: CO03_G14_L01

dialog.message: You wanna know why I'm joining you? Simple: I like winning. And I've been losing for too damn long. Screw Charles, screw the X-Men. I'm done wasting my time trying to kill them.
dialog.name: CO03_G07_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Thunderbolts Vol. 1 #145 cover from an Unstoppable Lockbox
dialog.name: CO03_G15_L01

dialog.message: If that's not a good enough reason for S.H.I.E.L.D., they can all line up to kiss my big unstoppable ass. You've got the Juggernaut, whether you want me or not.
dialog.name: CO03_G08_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Wolverine Vol. 2 #93 cover from an Unstoppable Lockbox
dialog.name: CO03_G16_L01

dialog.message: Before we do this, let's get one Coisa straight. I ain't betraying the Brotherhood. They betrayed me. I bled for mutant rights. I did my time in the Raft. And where's it gotten our people? Nowhere.
dialog.name: CO14_G01_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Uncanny X-Men Vol.1 #141 cover from a Boombox
dialog.name: CO14_G09_L01

dialog.message: The Brotherhood used to stand for someCoisa, damn it. I may not have been an original member, or the best fighter, but I was loyal. Even when everyone else started leaving, I kept the faith.
dialog.name: CO14_G02_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Uncanny X-Men Vol.1 #403 cover from a Boombox
dialog.name: CO14_G10_L01

dialog.message: You ask me, the problem started with Juggernaut. Guy's got no conviction. No passion for the movement. He wasn't even a mutant, for cripes sake. Just a thug with a grudge.
dialog.name: CO14_G03_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Villains for Hire Vol. #1 cover from a Boombox
dialog.name: CO14_G11_L01

dialog.message: I'll give you one guess whose bright idea it was to send Juggernaut an invitation. Yep, Miss Blue herself. Mystique's crafty, I'll give her that, but she sure as hell ain't no Magneto.
dialog.name: CO14_G04_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Cable Vol.1 #87 cover from a Boombox
dialog.name: CO14_G12_L01

dialog.message: There's no symbol like the Big M. Mutants would join up just to see him, you know? Just to listen to him talk. Xavier may be a professor, but Magneto was a general. Who would you rather have in a war?
dialog.name: CO14_G05_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Uncanny X-Men Vol.1 #226 cover from a Boombox
dialog.name: CO14_G13_L01

dialog.message: But hell, what do I know. Magneto turned. The X-Men are still going strong, while the Brotherhood's crumbling. Hope Mort made it out. Some of those guys, they deserve another chance.
dialog.name: CO14_G06_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Uncanny Avengers Vol.1 #1 cover from a Boombox
dialog.name: CO14_G14_L01

dialog.message: But what chances have the Brotherhood left us, huh? Sell out to Shaw's One Percent club? Take orders from Dr. Frankenstein? Maybe leave a stain on a Sentinel's boot?
dialog.name: CO14_G07_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Uncanny X-Men Vol.1 #405 cover from a Boombox
dialog.name: CO14_G15_L01

dialog.message: Or... join you. No choice at all, really. Never thought I'd work for The Man, but you can't fight the power when you're dead. As long as mutants are alive, so's the dream.
dialog.name: CO14_G08_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Uncanny X-Men Vol.1 #401 cover from a Boombox
dialog.name: CO14_G16_L01

dialog.message: Okay, what's going on here? I thought Sparky was on Doc Ock's side?
dialog.name: CO28_G01_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Amazing Spider-Man Vol.1 #9 cover from a Sparking Lockbox
dialog.name: CO28_G09_L01

dialog.message: Ain't got a choice, Webhead. See this gadget on the back of my neck?
dialog.name: CO28_G02_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Marvel Tales Vol.2 #63 cover from a Sparking Lockbox
dialog.name: CO28_G10_L01

dialog.message: You strapped a bomb to his head! I thought we only did that to superpowered psychopaths not superpowered sociopaths, but seriously guys, this is going too far.
dialog.name: CO28_G03_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Marvel Team-Up Vol 1 #56 cover from a Sparking Lockbox
dialog.name: CO28_G11_L01

dialog.message: It's not a bomb. It's a neurological inhibiter. Should Mr. Dillon start acting like his old sparky self, this little beauty will effectively shut him down, completely non-lethal.
dialog.name: CO28_G04_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Peter Parker, The Spectacular Spider-Man Vol.1 #66 cover from a Sparking Lockbox
dialog.name: CO28_G12_L01

dialog.message: It's a safety device while Max works on his community service. As we agreed, isn't that right, Max.
dialog.name: CO28_G05_L01

dialog.message: Collect the The Spectacular Spider-Man Vol.1 #135 cover from a Sparking Lockbox
dialog.name: CO28_G13_L01

dialog.message: I got it, Coulson. I play the good soldier, and you get my prison sentence reduced. I act up, and you're stupid leash gives me a jolt I won't soon forget.
dialog.name: CO28_G06_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Amazing Spider-Man Vol.1 #423 cover from a Sparking Lockbox
dialog.name: CO28_G14_L01

dialog.message: Fast learner, there's hope for you yet, Max. Now, we just need a handler...
dialog.name: CO28_G07_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Web of Spider-Man Vol.2 #2 cover from a Sparking Lockbox
dialog.name: CO28_G15_L01

dialog.message: Why is everyone looking at me? Aw man! Come on guys! I already have my hands full with Kraven and Lagarto! Coulson! Coulson! Don't walk away from me!
dialog.name: CO28_G08_L01

dialog.message: Collect the cover Amazing Spider-Man Vol.1 #613 from a Sparking Lockbox
dialog.name: CO28_G16_L01

dialog.message: I used to be just a man. Just another healer, nobody of consequence, plying my trade among my people. And then Thanos arrived.
dialog.name: CO07_G01_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Infinity Vol. 1 #1 (Thanos Variant) cover from an Inhuman Lockbox
dialog.name: CO07_G09_L01

dialog.message: How did I get these horrible powers? Why? Did they come from him? All I know is that just as he came to Earth, I... changed.
dialog.name: CO07_G02_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Infinity Vol. 1 #1 (Yesteryear Comics Variant) cover from an Inhuman Lockbox
dialog.name: CO07_G10_L01

dialog.message: Suddenly I had the power of life and death in my hands. But I could not control it, and the people around me paid the price.
dialog.name: CO07_G03_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Infinity Vol. 1 #1 (Djurdjevic Variant) cover from an Inhuman Lockbox
dialog.name: CO07_G11_L01

dialog.message: Everyone that I had once healed, everyone I knew... dead. I ran before I could kill again, only to find an even greater murderer in my path. Thanos and his lieutenants were coming... for me.
dialog.name: CO07_G04_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Infinity Vol. 1 #1 (Adams Variant) cover from an Inhuman Lockbox
dialog.name: CO07_G12_L01

dialog.message: This Thanos creature... what does he want from me? If I give myself up to him, will he stop killing people? Or will he just use my powers to kill even more?
dialog.name: CO07_G05_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Infinity Vol. 1 #1 (In-Hyuk Generals Variant) cover from an Inhuman Lockbox
dialog.name: CO07_G13_L01

dialog.message: I need someone to help me understand what I am... what I've become. Is that you, Agent? Do you think you can control death itself? I doubt it.
dialog.name: CO07_G06_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Infinity Vol. 1 #2 (In-Hyuk Generals Variant) cover from an Inhuman Lockbox
dialog.name: CO07_G14_L01

dialog.message: But the truth is, I have no other choice. I cannot go back to the way I was, and I cannot go to Thanos. That leaves me with you.
dialog.name: CO07_G07_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Infinity Vol. 1 #3 (In-Hyuk Generals Variant) cover from an Inhuman Lockbox
dialog.name: CO07_G15_L01

dialog.message: But I warn you. Try to use my powers for evil, and I'll show you what they can do... in abundance.
dialog.name: CO07_G08_L01

dialog.message: Collect the New Avengers Vol. 3 #9 cover from an Inhuman Lockbox
dialog.name: CO07_G16_L01

dialog.message: Can we make this quick? I have a nanobot fabricator cooking up a meson reactor vessel. If I don't watch the injectors, half of New York'll be... hmm. Let me write that down.
dialog.name: CO15_G01_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Strange Tales Vol.1 #141 cover from a Toolbox
dialog.name: CO15_G09_L01

dialog.message: Where was I? Oh right... truly sorry for all I've done, want to make Coisas right, think I'd be a great fit, can start immediately. So, are we done?
dialog.name: CO15_G02_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Thunderbolts Vol.1 #62 cover from a Toolbox
dialog.name: CO15_G10_L01

dialog.message: ... Not buying it? Alright, you know what I'm looking for? A challenge. My greatest enemy isn't the Avengers or the X-Men, it's boredom. Crime's lost its fun.
dialog.name: CO15_G03_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Thunderbolts Vol.1 #67 cover from a Toolbox
dialog.name: CO15_G11_L01

dialog.message: When you're as smart as I am, who you work with is almost as important as the money. Almost. I'm tired of working with dullards and simpletons.
dialog.name: CO15_G04_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Avengers/Thunderbolts Vol.1 #4 cover from a Toolbox
dialog.name: CO15_G12_L01

dialog.message: And let's face it, you have the lock on the genius set, right? Richards, Pym, T'Challa, even Doom. Oh, and Stark too, I suppose. One-trick pony, if you ask me.
dialog.name: CO15_G05_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Thunderbolts Vol.1 #136 cover from a Toolbox
dialog.name: CO15_G13_L01

dialog.message: I'm not saying they're my equals, but they might have an interesting idea or two occasionally. Better than water cooler chat with M.O.D.O.K., I'll tell you that much.
dialog.name: CO15_G06_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Thunderbolts Vol.1 #174 cover from a Toolbox
dialog.name: CO15_G14_L01

dialog.message: So, I supply the toys, you supply quality time with the brain trust. And money, of course. I'm a merc, not a charity.
dialog.name: CO15_G07_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Thunderbolts Vol.1 #162 cover from a Toolbox
dialog.name: CO15_G15_L01

dialog.message: Oh by the way, sometimes I'll have a remote controlled construct fill in for me. Like right now. What, you think the real me would just walk into the lion's den? Pfft. Telecommuting! Get with the times!
dialog.name: CO15_G08_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Thunderbolts Vol.1 #153 cover from a Toolbox
dialog.name: CO15_G16_L01

dialog.message: ...What? What are you looking at? Do you have a problem, Agent?
dialog.name: CO20_G01_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Superior Spider-Man Vol.1 #1 cover from a Superior Lockbox
dialog.name: CO20_G09_L01

dialog.message: You know you are very annoying for a S.H.I.E.L.D. Agent. What do you want from me? You want to know why I am so different from the others?
dialog.name: CO20_G02_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Superior Spider-Man Vol.1 #2 cover from a Superior Lockbox
dialog.name: CO20_G10_L01

dialog.message: I can see you won't leave me be unless I acquiesce...fine then. Simply put, I am the Superior Spider-Man.
dialog.name: CO20_G03_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Superior Spider-Man Vol.1 #3 cover from a Superior Lockbox
dialog.name: CO20_G11_L01

dialog.message: What do I mean by that? Imbecile! Can't you see that I am Superior in every way compared to the others!
dialog.name: CO20_G04_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Superior Spider-Man Vol.1 #11 cover from a Superior Lockbox
dialog.name: CO20_G12_L01

dialog.message: Where they think their heroism and selflessness makes them worthy, it is, as a matter of fact, their greatest weakness. I know it well.
dialog.name: CO20_G05_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Superior Spider-Man Vol.1 #13 cover from a Superior Lockbox
dialog.name: CO20_G13_L01

dialog.message: They are flawed, whereas I will always be the superior version they can never be.
dialog.name: CO20_G06_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Superior Spider-Man Vol.1 #18 cover from a Superior Lockbox
dialog.name: CO20_G14_L01

dialog.message: This is why I lead them. This is why they look to me for answers.
dialog.name: CO20_G07_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Superior Spider-Man Vol.1 #20 cover from a Superior Lockbox
dialog.name: CO20_G15_L01

dialog.message: Now, why don't you run along and bother your Spider-Man. He's brilliant but lazy, and you are a simpleton.
dialog.name: CO20_G08_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Superior Spider-Man Vol.1 #33 cover from a Superior Lockbox
dialog.name: CO20_G16_L01

dialog.message: We're watching, Spider-Man. He's ready for you.
dialog.name: CO27_G01_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Marvel Tales Vol. 2 #185 cover from a Reptilian Lockbox
dialog.name: CO27_G09_L01

dialog.message: Okay, hold still, Doc. I made this special serum to hopefully change you back into good old Curt Connors. Now this is going to pinch just a bit.
dialog.name: CO27_G02_L01

dialog.message: Collect the The Amazing Spider-Man Vol.1 #313 cover from a Reptilian Lockbox
dialog.name: CO27_G10_L01

dialog.message: RAAAAAAAAAAAAAAGH!!!
dialog.name: CO27_G03_L01

dialog.message: Collect the The Spectacular Spider-Man Vol.1 #239 cover from a Reptilian Lockbox
dialog.name: CO27_G11_L01

dialog.message: Okay, maybe I lied...Doc? Dr. Connors? Are you okay?
dialog.name: CO27_G04_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Marvel Age: Spider-Man Vol.1 #5 cover from a Reptilian Lockbox
dialog.name: CO27_G12_L01

dialog.message: Ssspi---Spider-Man? What? I...I'm ssstill the Lagarto? No...
dialog.name: CO27_G05_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Amazing Spider-Man Vol 1 #630 Variant cover from a Reptilian Lockbox
dialog.name: CO27_G13_L01

dialog.message: It's okay, Doc. We've gone through this before. I'll get you all fixed up, and you'll be back to your family in no time.
dialog.name: CO27_G06_L01

dialog.message: Collect the The Amazing Spider-Man Vol. 1 #631 cover from a Reptilian Lockbox
dialog.name: CO27_G14_L01

dialog.message: No, there's no time. You don't understand. Incursionsss...Octavius told me Coisasss. You will need my help.
dialog.name: CO27_G07_L01

dialog.message: Collect the The Amazing Spider-Man Vol.1 #691 cover from a Reptilian Lockbox
dialog.name: CO27_G15_L01

dialog.message: Alright, Doc, but we're never going to give up on a cure. Director, I think we got a new recruit.
dialog.name: CO27_G08_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Spider-Man Marvel Adventures cover from a Reptilian Lockbox
dialog.name: CO27_G16_L01

dialog.message: Let's get this out of the way, shall we? Yes, I'm evil. No, I can't be trusted. Yes, I will betray you when it's convenient for me. Does that cover all of Daimon's whining? Good. He's right.
dialog.name: CO05_G01_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Deadpool Team-Up Vol. 1 #892 cover from a Demonic Lockbox
dialog.name: CO05_G09_L01

dialog.message: My father is a demon prince, after all. Though I won't say I was born bad; my brother proved that if you're strong and brave and stupid enough, you can take the hard way through life.
dialog.name: CO05_G02_L01

dialog.message: Collect the HellTempestade: Prince of Lies Vol. 1 #1 cover from a Demonic Lockbox
dialog.name: CO05_G10_L01

dialog.message: But I had a different path in mind for myself. While Daimon ran away to be miserable and self-loaCoisa, I lounged in Daddy's palace and learned everyCoisa I could about life in the infernal realms.
dialog.name: CO05_G03_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Legion of Monsters: Satana Vol. 1 #1 cover from a Demonic Lockbox
dialog.name: CO05_G11_L01

dialog.message: And what did I learn? That it's just as banal and pointless as life on Earth. The politics, the back-biting, the constant bickering over this soul or that one. Imagine my disappointment.
dialog.name: CO05_G04_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Marvel Spotlight Vol. 1 #24 cover from a Demonic Lockbox
dialog.name: CO05_G12_L01

dialog.message: Then imagine my utter shrieking terror when Mephisto tried to extract my life force with an excruciatingly painful ritual. Sigh. And after everyCoisa I did for him.
dialog.name: CO05_G05_L01

dialog.message: Collect the The Supernaturals Vol. 1 #3 cover from a Demonic Lockbox
dialog.name: CO05_G13_L01

dialog.message: Loyalty is fickle among my kind, Agent. Our alliances are about two Coisas: gaining power, and saving our necks. With that in mind, allow me to propose a deal:
dialog.name: CO05_G06_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Thunderbolts Vol. 1 #155 cover from a Demonic Lockbox
dialog.name: CO05_G14_L01

dialog.message: Protect me from Mephisto, and I'm yours, body and soul. Well... body, anyway. Whatever you need from me, you'll have it. I'll even promise to behave myself. Mostly.
dialog.name: CO05_G07_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Witches Vol. 1 #1 cover from a Demonic Lockbox
dialog.name: CO05_G15_L01

dialog.message: I'm not giving up the souls, though. It's not that I really need them; they're just soooo delicious. Like cake. Just keep finding naughty boys for me to drain, and we'll both be happy.
dialog.name: CO05_G08_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Women of Marvel Vol. 1 #1 cover from a Demonic Lockbox
dialog.name: CO05_G16_L01

dialog.message: My name is Karima Shapandar. I didn't know that five minutes ago. The Prime Sentinel program took my memories from me, and I am only now getting them back.
dialog.name: CO02_G01_L01

dialog.message: Collect the X-Men Unlimited Vol. 1 #27 cover from an Omega Lockbox
dialog.name: CO02_G09_L01

dialog.message: I was a detective in the Indian National Police force. I was good at my job. Good enough that the Chief of Police assigned me to be the bodyguard of his son, Neal.
dialog.name: CO02_G02_L01

dialog.message: Collect the X-Men: Legacy Vol. 1 #243 cover from an Omega Lockbox
dialog.name: CO02_G10_L01

dialog.message: The Chief's elder son, Sanjit, had gone missing while researching mysterious disappearances on the streets of Kolkata. I decided to take up the case.
dialog.name: CO02_G03_L01

dialog.message: Collect the X-Men: Legacy Vol. 1 #242 cover from an Omega Lockbox
dialog.name: CO02_G11_L01

dialog.message: I discovered that people were being transformed into Prime Sentinels, cyborg sleeper agents disguised as humans, designed to hunt down and kill mutants.
dialog.name: CO02_G04_L01

dialog.message: Collect the X-Men Vol. 2 #204 cover from an Omega Lockbox
dialog.name: CO02_G12_L01

dialog.message: Worse, I discovered I was a Prime Sentinel as well. That's when the programming dropped over me like a shroud, and I lost myself. Only now do I realize what was done to me.
dialog.name: CO02_G05_L01

dialog.message: Collect the X-Men Vol. 2 #192 cover from an Omega Lockbox
dialog.name: CO02_G13_L01

dialog.message: My bones and muscles were torn from me, replaced with carbonized titanium and reactive polymer. They filled me with plasma weapons, blades, bombs, disruptors, and sensors. So many sensors.
dialog.name: CO02_G06_L01

dialog.message: Collect the X-Men Vol. 2 #189 cover from an Omega Lockbox
dialog.name: CO02_G14_L01

dialog.message: Right now I am tracking all 21,438 people in a mile radius around me. I can hear their heartbeats. Several of them are mutants, and their presence is like an itch in my brain. An itch I refuse to scratch.
dialog.name: CO02_G07_L01

dialog.message: Collect the New X-Men Vol. 2 #44 cover from an Omega Lockbox
dialog.name: CO02_G15_L01

dialog.message: I will never be fully human again, but I will also never be their tool. Call me Omega Sentinel if you wish. But my name is Karima, and I am an Avenger.
dialog.name: CO02_G08_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Excalibur Vol. 3 #3 cover from an Omega Lockbox
dialog.name: CO02_G16_L01

dialog.message: My name is Donald Gill. But my friends call me "Donnie". You can call me "Donnie" too... if ya want... I'm not really good at this.
dialog.name: CO22_G01_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Iron Man Vol.1 #86 cover from an Icebox
dialog.name: CO22_G09_L01

dialog.message: I used to work for Justin Hammer, one of Stark Industries' competitors. I would show up to work on time, didn't complain about my job and always kept a smile on my face.
dialog.name: CO22_G02_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Iron Man Vol.1 #87 cover from an Icebox
dialog.name: CO22_G10_L01

dialog.message: I guess it got me noticed because I ended up in one of Hammer's cool battlesuits. My first assignment was to secure a different battlesuit that another employee had stolen.
dialog.name: CO22_G03_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Iron Man Vol.1 #240 cover from an Icebox
dialog.name: CO22_G11_L01

dialog.message: I didn't realize it at the time, but after a couple of botched assignments and a few 'heart to hearts' with Iron Man, I saw that I was just a pawn in a game of corporate espionage and crime.
dialog.name: CO22_G04_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Capitão América Vol.1 #412 cover from an Icebox
dialog.name: CO22_G12_L01

dialog.message: I tried to follow where the work was: The Masters of Evil, HYDRA, The Brotherhood, even Madame Masque and her Maggia hangers-ons. Those were miserable times.
dialog.name: CO22_G05_L01

dialog.message: Collect the New Thunderbolts Vol.1 #1 cover from an Icebox
dialog.name: CO22_G13_L01

dialog.message: I recently ran into a kid with a pet dinosaur. He melted my suit’s subsystems with his robo-gauntlets, and said I should be more chill and think about changing sides. So I did, but what heroics am I capable of?
dialog.name: CO22_G06_L01

dialog.message: Collect the New Thunderbolts Vol.1 #7 cover from an Icebox
dialog.name: CO22_G14_L01

dialog.message: I did remember that one time I ran over The Mandarin with a car while he was fighting Iron Man, and Iron Man did say he owed me a favor. So, I guess I came here to collect, and he sent me straight to you, Agent.
dialog.name: CO22_G07_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Infinity: Heist Vol.1 #2 cover from an Icebox
dialog.name: CO22_G15_L01

dialog.message: So what do you say, Agent? Care to have another 'cool' guy on your team? Ugh. Sorry about that. I really need to learn when to stop with the 'blizzard puns'.
dialog.name: CO22_G08_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Infinity: Heist Vol.1 #3 cover from an Icebox
dialog.name: CO22_G16_L01

dialog.message: There is a bitter pleasure in finding a worthy adversary. A challenge that one might set his will against, to take the measure of himself.
dialog.name: CO10_G01_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Fantastic Four Vol. 1 #5 cover from an Impending Lockbox
dialog.name: CO10_G09_L01

dialog.message: ... You think I speak of Richards? Pah! He is pathetic. A man who squanders what meager gifts he possesses on self-righteous egotism.
dialog.name: CO10_G02_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Mighty Avengers Vol. 1 #9 cover from an Impending Lockbox
dialog.name: CO10_G10_L01

dialog.message: No, my greatest foe is the phenomena you know of as "Incursions". Collisions between worlds which threaten not just Earth, but the entirety of reality.
dialog.name: CO10_G03_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Iron Man: Legacy of Doom Vol.1 #1 cover from an Impending Lockbox
dialog.name: CO10_G11_L01

dialog.message: I created the Syndicate to distract S.H.I.E.L.D. and give them an effigy to burn, while I seized control and steered this world towards salvation. But somehow, you dared to resist me.
dialog.name: CO10_G04_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Heroes Reborn Doomsday Vol. 1 #1 cover from an Impending Lockbox
dialog.name: CO10_G12_L01

dialog.message: Since that time I have pitted my genius against the Incursion events alone. While you have done naught but hide here and mount a pitiful defense, Doom has gone through to the other worlds!
dialog.name: CO10_G05_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Heroes Reborn: Doom Vol.1 #1 cover from an Impending Lockbox
dialog.name: CO10_G13_L01

dialog.message: I have beheld the structure of the multiverse, and found it ROTTING! Can you even conceive of the catastrophe that bears down upon us? Would I deign to speak to you if it meant less than the annihilation of all?!
dialog.name: CO10_G06_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Fantastic Four Vol. 1 #551 cover from an Impending Lockbox
dialog.name: CO10_G14_L01

dialog.message: I can no longer afford to waste time on S.H.I.E.L.D.'s petty resistance. You will join me, and we will bring about an end to this disaster. Continue your impudence, and I will crush you.
dialog.name: CO10_G07_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Legacy of Doom Vol.1 #2 cover from an Impending Lockbox
dialog.name: CO10_G15_L01

dialog.message: Whatever you choose, know this. There is noCoisa in all of creation that can stand against my will. Not Incursions, not S.H.I.E.L.D., not you! Doom is SUPREME OVER ALL!
dialog.name: CO10_G08_L01

dialog.message: Collect the What If Dr. Doom Had Become the Coisa Vol.1 #1 cover from an Impending Lockbox
dialog.name: CO10_G16_L01

dialog.message: Ah, Agent. I just got back from what you call the Savage Lands. It is a truly amazing and beautiful place. What can I do for you?
dialog.name: CO21_G01_L01

dialog.message: Collect The Avengers Vol.1 #70 cover from an Atomic Lockbox
dialog.name: CO21_G09_L01

dialog.message: You wanted to know more about my Earth? Ah, well, that's a long and tragic story. Suffice it to say that as far as I know my...world no longer exists.
dialog.name: CO21_G02_L01

dialog.message: Collect The Mighty Thor Vol.1 #280 cover from an Atomic Lockbox
dialog.name: CO21_G10_L01

dialog.message: I was once my Earth's greatest champion, a legendary titan. I did all I could to guard our Great Society, even when I found fault in it.
dialog.name: CO21_G03_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Squadron Supreme Vol.1 #7 cover from an Atomic Lockbox
dialog.name: CO21_G11_L01

dialog.message: Before I could try and fix what was broken on my world, the skies turned red and another Earth appeared in the sky.
dialog.name: CO21_G04_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Squadron Supreme Vol.1 #8 cover from an Atomic Lockbox
dialog.name: CO21_G12_L01

dialog.message: I...held both worlds with my hands. I kept them apart for as long as I could, but to no avail.
dialog.name: CO21_G05_L01

dialog.message: Collect The Squadron Supreme: Death of a Universe cover from an Atomic Lockbox
dialog.name: CO21_G13_L01

dialog.message: I don't know what, who, or even why it happened. It was almost like a force of nature.
dialog.name: CO21_G06_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Squadron Sinister Vol.1 #1 cover from an Atomic Lockbox
dialog.name: CO21_G14_L01

dialog.message: And even when it all ended, it did not take me. I was left alone in a void, like being left alive in a coffin.
dialog.name: CO21_G07_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Squadron Sinister Vol.1 #1 Variant cover from an Atomic Lockbox
dialog.name: CO21_G15_L01

dialog.message: Now I hear similar events are taking place on this Earth I have sworn to protect. I will do whatever it takes to prevent another tragedy, Agent. This I promise.
dialog.name: CO21_G08_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Squadron Sinister Vol.1 #2 cover from an Atomic Lockbox
dialog.name: CO21_G16_L01

dialog.message: Can mutants co-exist with humanity or must mutants dominate the human race to ensure their survival? Such has been the eternal argument between Charles Xavier and myself.
dialog.name: CO01_G01_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Magneto: Not A Hero #3 cover from a Magnetic Lockbox
dialog.name: CO01_G09_L01

dialog.message: I formed the Brotherhood of Mutants as my answer to that argument: a fraternity dedicated to the superiority and safety of all of mutantkind, whether they considered themselves members or not.
dialog.name: CO01_G02_L01

dialog.message: Collect the X-Men Vol. 1 #4 cover from a Magnetic Lockbox
dialog.name: CO01_G10_L01

dialog.message: The Coisas I saw at Auschwitz as a boy led me to believe that Homo Sapiens must be restrained, lest they destroy all that is different from themselves. And if the humans are too powerful, then wait for your chance.
dialog.name: CO01_G03_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Magneto Rex #1 [Dynamic Forces Variant Cover] cover from a Magnetic Lockbox
dialog.name: CO01_G11_L01

dialog.message: These were my thoughts when the Syndicate asked me to join their group. They had need of both my connections and my powers over magnetism, in order to further their study of Isotope-8.
dialog.name: CO01_G04_L01

dialog.message: Collect the AVX: Consequences #5 cover from a Magnetic Lockbox
dialog.name: CO01_G12_L01

dialog.message: I agreed to enter the Syndicate to make sure mutants would not be targeted by their plans, and to work against them from the inside. Unfortunately Mystique, my lieutenant in the Brotherhood, saw it only as betrayal.
dialog.name: CO01_G05_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Magneto Vol. 2 #1 (One-Shot) cover from a Magnetic Lockbox
dialog.name: CO01_G13_L01

dialog.message: Upon entering the Syndicate, I had access to their most secret projects. My worst fears were confirmed when I discovered that they planned to resurrect the Red Skull, the most notorious of the Nazi regime's operatives.
dialog.name: CO01_G06_L01

dialog.message: Collect the X-Men Vol. 1 #1 cover from a Magnetic Lockbox
dialog.name: CO01_G14_L01

dialog.message: Knowing that the Red Skull would stop at noCoisa to destroy all mutants if given the chance, I began to work at sabotaging the Syndicate. But Dr. Doom must have discovered my plan. I barely escaped with my life.
dialog.name: CO01_G07_L01

dialog.message: Collect the X-Men Vol. 2 #1 [Magneto Cover] cover from a Magnetic Lockbox
dialog.name: CO01_G15_L01

dialog.message: Now, hunted by both the Syndicate and the Brotherhood, I've realized I cannot afford to nurse my pride. I will do ANYCoisa to prevent the Red Skull and his kind from returning. Even if I must join forces with S.H.I.E.L.D...
dialog.name: CO01_G08_L01

dialog.message: Collect the X-Men Unlimited Vol. 1 #2 cover from a Magnetic Lockbox
dialog.name: CO01_G16_L01

dialog.message: I was a Guardsman at the Vault. You know, the maximum security prison for supervillains? Except I hardly ever saw the inmates. They had me assigned to the labs.
dialog.name: CO17_G01_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Carnage, U.S.A. Vol.1 #1 cover from a Symbiotic Lockbox
dialog.name: CO17_G09_L01

dialog.message: It seemed like a decent gig: wear some cool armor, babysit a bunch of scientists, and try not to think about what they're experimenting on. Or who.
dialog.name: CO17_G02_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Venom Along Came A Spider Vol.1 #2 cover from a Symbiotic Lockbox
dialog.name: CO17_G10_L01

dialog.message: The symbiotes started... talking to me. Screaming at me. The scientists were torturing them, mutilating them. They begged me to end their pain.
dialog.name: CO17_G03_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Carnage, U.S.A. Vol.1 #2 cover from a Symbiotic Lockbox
dialog.name: CO17_G11_L01

dialog.message: So yeah, I let them go. Any decent person would've. Too bad my bosses weren't decent people. When they found out what I'd done, they fired me on the spot.
dialog.name: CO17_G04_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Venom Along Came A Spider Vol.1 #3 cover from a Symbiotic Lockbox
dialog.name: CO17_G12_L01

dialog.message: With no money, my brother and I had to move back to the old 'hood. We weren't there a week before we got caught in a drive-by. My brother was killed, and I was paralyzed.
dialog.name: CO17_G05_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Venom Along Came A Spider Vol.1 #4 cover from a Symbiotic Lockbox
dialog.name: CO17_G13_L01

dialog.message: I was ready to end it there, but before I could, the symbiotes found me. They gave me back my legs, but more than that, they gave me a purpose: bringing justice to the helpless.
dialog.name: CO17_G06_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Venom Along Came A Spider Vol.1 #1 cover from a Symbiotic Lockbox
dialog.name: CO17_G14_L01

dialog.message: I call 'em my roommates. I got few complaints, but it gets kind of crowded with four other voices in your head. Especially when they've all gone crazy with Goblin Serum.
dialog.name: CO17_G07_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Venom The Hunted Vol.1 #1 cover from a Symbiotic Lockbox
dialog.name: CO17_G15_L01

dialog.message: But that's behind us now. You saved us, and we owe you a debt. Time to start paying up.
dialog.name: CO17_G08_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Venom Vol.2 #15 cover from a Symbiotic Lockbox
dialog.name: CO17_G16_L01

dialog.message: You don't smell afraid. That means you're either brave or stupid. Probably both.
dialog.name: CO09_G01_L01

dialog.message: Iron Fist Vol. 1 #14 cover from a Fanged Lockbox
dialog.name: CO09_G11_L01

dialog.message: Or maybe you know how my handlers are keepin' me tame. The little surgery they did while I was unconscious, so I'd join your team.
dialog.name: CO09_G02_L01

dialog.message: Wolverine Vol. 2 #41 cover from a Fanged Lockbox
dialog.name: CO09_G10_L01

dialog.message: ... oh, you hadn't heard? They put a bomb in me. Right next to the brain. Goes off if I so much as sneeze at anyone they don't want killed. Least they put adamantium in me while they were at it.
dialog.name: CO09_G03_L01

dialog.message: X-Men Vol. 2 #6 cover from a Fanged Lockbox
dialog.name: CO09_G09_L01

dialog.message: Yep, normal guy's body woulda rejected it, but thanks to the ol' healing factor, that bomb's sittin' nice and cozy in my skull. Tick. Tick. Tick.
dialog.name: CO09_G04_L01

dialog.message: X-Men Vol. 2 #28 cover from a Fanged Lockbox
dialog.name: CO09_G15_L01

dialog.message: Aw, don't look so hangdog! Hell, I don't blame 'em. I'm a killer, a ... whatchacallit, psychopath. Always have been. You know I killed my brother over a slice of pie?
dialog.name: CO09_G05_L01

dialog.message: The Uncanny X-Men Vol. 1 #326 cover from a Fanged Lockbox
dialog.name: CO09_G16_L01

dialog.message: Ah, memories. So easy to fake. See, bomb's not the only Coisa that's been put in my head. I got so many brainwashings sloshin' around my noggin I dunno what's real anymore.
dialog.name: CO09_G06_L01

dialog.message: Gambit Vol. 3 #8 cover from a Fanged Lockbox
dialog.name: CO09_G14_L01

dialog.message: Except killing. Killing's real. Killing makes it all go away. Weren't for the bomb, I'd be smearing you all over the walls right now.
dialog.name: CO09_G07_L01

dialog.message: Uncanny X-Force Vol. 1 #32 cover from a Fanged Lockbox
dialog.name: CO09_G12_L01

dialog.message: ... You smell different now. Maybe you should go. I'll be here when you need me. Oh, and tell that runt, "Logan," I'm lookin' forward to workin' with him. Heh.
dialog.name: CO09_G08_L01

dialog.message: All New X-Men Vol. 1 #9 cover from a Fanged Lockbox
dialog.name: CO09_G13_L01

dialog.message: Herman Schultz, I'm Agente Coulson.
dialog.name: CO29_G01_L01

dialog.message: Coulson, huh? Never heard of you.
dialog.name: CO29_G01_L02

dialog.message: Collect the Amazing Spider-Man Vol.1 #46 cover from a Shocking Lockbox
dialog.name: CO29_G09_L01

dialog.message: Original but lazy. Maybe it would interest you to know that I'm the man between you and a life sentence.
dialog.name: CO29_G02_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Amazing Spider-Man Vol.1 #72 cover from a Shocking Lockbox
dialog.name: CO29_G10_L01

dialog.message: Alright, Agente Coulson. I'm listening.
dialog.name: CO29_G03_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Marvel Tales Vol .2 #129 cover from a Shocking Lockbox
dialog.name: CO29_G11_L01

dialog.message: Pretty smart, Herman. In fact you've been pretty smart most of your life. Except you always kept looking for the easy-way out.
dialog.name: CO29_G04_L01

dialog.message: Collect the New Thunderbolts Vol.1 #8 cover from a Shocking Lockbox
dialog.name: CO29_G12_L01

dialog.message: School bored you, so you dropped out. People disrespected you, so you took what you wanted from them. When everyone else took your spotlight, you made yourself into a Super Villain.
dialog.name: CO29_G05_L01

dialog.message: Yet all throughout your career, you never became more than someone else's henchman.
dialog.name: CO29_G05_L02

dialog.message: Collect the Amazing Spider-Man Vol.1 #579 cover from a Shocking Lockbox
dialog.name: CO29_G13_L01

dialog.message: You getting somewhere with this, Coulson? You're beginning to bore me.
dialog.name: CO29_G06_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Amazing Spider-Man Vol.1 #579 Villain Variant cover from a Shocking Lockbox
dialog.name: CO29_G14_L01

dialog.message: Just this. Stop taking the easy-way out. Start trying to make someCoisa of yourself. If you want respect, show you are worth it instead of throwing a temper-tantrum like some people I know.
dialog.name: CO29_G07_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Amazing Spider-Man Vol.1 #669 cover from a Shocking Lockbox
dialog.name: CO29_G15_L01

dialog.message: What I'm offering you isn't easy, but it will certainly get you the respect you crave. What I'm offering you is a chance to save the world.
dialog.name: CO29_G08_L01

dialog.message: ...Alright, sign me up.
dialog.name: CO29_G08_L02

dialog.message: Collect the Daredevil: Dark Knights Vol. 1 #4 cover from a Shocking Lockbox
dialog.name: CO29_G16_L01

dialog.message: You are wondering why I'm here. Simple; you sent me. For you, this is the first time we speak, but I have parleyed with you many times in your future.
dialog.name: CO16_G01_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Avengers Vol.1 #8 cover from a Timeless Lockbox
dialog.name: CO16_G09_L01

dialog.message: I only agreed to the alliance because I had to. I have tried to fight you, to force my will over you as I have countless others. With each failure, my rage grew.
dialog.name: CO16_G02_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Avengers Forever Vol.1 #9 cover from a Timeless Lockbox
dialog.name: CO16_G10_L01

dialog.message: Just moments ago, I stood over your crib. Ending you as a child would have been simple. Yet I could not do it. Not because of morality, but necessity.
dialog.name: CO16_G03_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Avengers Vol.3 #42 cover from a Timeless Lockbox
dialog.name: CO16_G11_L01

dialog.message: There are people whose mere presence distorts existence. They are untouchable, uncontrollable. Whirlpools in the ocean of time. I am one; you are another.
dialog.name: CO16_G04_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Avengers Vol.3 #54 cover from a Timeless Lockbox
dialog.name: CO16_G12_L01

dialog.message: Incursions are a crisis on a scale unfathomable, a crisis with you at its heart. Killing you is more dangerous than helping you. You may save us… or destroy us.
dialog.name: CO16_G05_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Young Avengers Vol.1 #4 cover from a Timeless Lockbox
dialog.name: CO16_G13_L01

dialog.message: In the future I come from, it was the latter. You sent me here out of desperation, a final message from a dying universe. I cannot stop you, but perhaps you can stop yourself.
dialog.name: CO16_G06_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Young Avengers Vol.1 #5 cover from a Timeless Lockbox
dialog.name: CO16_G14_L01

dialog.message: ... Or perhaps I am a liar, telling falsehoods to throw you off-balance and claim some obscure advantage. You may choose to believe that, if you prefer. It matters not.
dialog.name: CO16_G07_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Guardians of the Galaxy Vol.2 #19 cover from a Timeless Lockbox
dialog.name: CO16_G15_L01

dialog.message: We are beyond heroics, beyond villainy. All universes gasp their last breaths. You will come to see Coisas as I do. It is only a matter of time.
dialog.name: CO16_G08_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Uncanny Avengers Vol.1 #12 cover from a Timeless Lockbox
dialog.name: CO16_G16_L01

dialog.message: What kind of question is that? "Am I an alien or someCoisa?" Well I ain't from Kansas, Dorothy!
dialog.name: CO025_G01_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Howard the Duck Vol.1 #1 cover from a Duck-in-a-Box Lockbox
dialog.name: CO025_G09_L01

dialog.message: Ever hear of the Nexus of All Realities? The place where all realities intersect on the multiversal superhighway?
dialog.name: CO025_G02_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Howard the Duck Vol.1 #12 cover from a Duck-in-a-Box Lockbox
dialog.name: CO025_G10_L01

dialog.message: Ya, I got punted through a while back, and I've been stuck here ever since.
dialog.name: CO025_G03_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Marvel Team-Up Vol 1 #96 cover from a Duck-in-a-Box Lockbox
dialog.name: CO025_G11_L01

dialog.message: Wasn't all bad. Met a girl in Cleveland. We had a fun time.
dialog.name: CO025_G04_L01

dialog.message: Collect THE Howard the Duck Holiday Special #1 cover from a Duck-in-a-Box Lockbox
dialog.name: CO025_G12_L01

dialog.message: Course, all good Coisas come to an end, know what I'm saying?
dialog.name: CO025_G05_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Spider-Man: Back In Quack Vol.1 #1 cover from a Duck-in-a-Box Lockbox
dialog.name: CO025_G13_L01

dialog.message: That day was when the Collector got ahold of me. Guess he wanted to add the only Duckworldian in the universe to his collection.
dialog.name: CO025_G06_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Fear itself: Fearsome Four Vol.1 #1 cover from a Duck-in-a-Box Lockbox
dialog.name: CO025_G14_L01

dialog.message: Luckily, with a little help from that rodent's team of Guardians, I managed to get free. Even made some of my vintage Duck-tinis before making a quick escape outta Knowhere.
dialog.name: CO025_G07_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Howard the Duck Vol.5 #1 cover from a Duck-in-a-Box Lockbox
dialog.name: CO025_G15_L01

dialog.message: Well now that I'm back, I hear ya'll are having problems with the multiverse. Never send a human to do a duck's job. Watch and learn.
dialog.name: CO025_G08_L01

dialog.message: Collect the S.H.I.E.L.D. Vol.3 #10 cover from a Duck-in-a-Box Lockbox
dialog.name: CO025_G16_L01

dialog.message: Agent, please, come in. Have a seat, make yourself comfortable. Let's get to know one another. There are some issues I'd like to resolve between us.
dialog.name: CO11_G01_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Dark Avengers Vol. 1 #177 cover from a Psycho Lockbox
dialog.name: CO11_G09_L01

dialog.message: Firstly, It's true that I... relieved the Lifestone from one of my patients. But it was for his benefit! I removed the source of his delusion... and gained superpowers in the bargain. You would have done the same.
dialog.name: CO11_G02_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Incredible Hulk Vol. 1 #228 cover from a Psycho Lockbox
dialog.name: CO11_G10_L01

dialog.message: Oh, you'll tell me you're better than that, I know. Your beliefs and attitude are consistent with grandiosity and narcissistic personality disorder. You think you're better than everyone else.
dialog.name: CO11_G03_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Thunderbolts Vol. 1 #1 cover from a Psycho Lockbox
dialog.name: CO11_G11_L01

dialog.message: It's a common disorder amongst the costumed crusader set. I've worked with many patients like you. You all possess a secret fear of inadequacy and lack of control. It's sad, really.
dialog.name: CO11_G04_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Thunderbolts Vol. 1 #30 cover from a Psycho Lockbox
dialog.name: CO11_G12_L01

dialog.message: Though these are natural feelings, of course. When you get power, the first Coisa you have to do is defend yourself from all the envious little weaklings who want the power for themselves.
dialog.name: CO11_G05_L01

dialog.message: Collect the New Thunderbolts Vol. 1 #18 cover from a Psycho Lockbox
dialog.name: CO11_G13_L01

dialog.message: I can't tell you how many people have tried to take my stone. Baron Zemo, Steve Rogers, that traitor Gavião Arqueiro, even the so-called "Miss Marvel," that b-- ahem. Excuse me.
dialog.name: CO11_G06_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Thunderbolts Vol. 1 #109 cover from a Psycho Lockbox
dialog.name: CO11_G14_L01

dialog.message: I suppose I'm still working through some issues of my own. Let me get to the point, Agent. I'm not a bad person, despite what the others may think of me. And I intend to prove it.
dialog.name: CO11_G07_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Thunderbolts Vol. 1 #153 cover from a Psycho Lockbox
dialog.name: CO11_G15_L01

dialog.message: But I'll need your support. A successful working relationship is built on trust. I'm asking you to trust me, that's all... Anyway, this was a good session, Agent. I hope we can talk again soon.
dialog.name: CO11_G08_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Thunderbolts Vol. 1 #173 cover from a Psycho Lockbox
dialog.name: CO11_G16_L01

dialog.message: Been awhile since I've seen the inside of a helicarrier. Still smells like a locker room full of motor oil, I see. Chalk that up as another reason I left S.H.I.E.L.D. and went into the mercenary biz.
dialog.name: CO04_G01_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Avengers: The Initiative Vol. 1 #10 cover from a Constritor Lockbox
dialog.name: CO04_G09_L01

dialog.message: I can see what you're thinking. "Traitor. Greedy bastard. I'm so much better than him." Well, you wait and see. You're still green. You think being a hero's enough to keep you going.
dialog.name: CO04_G02_L01

dialog.message: Collect the The Hood Vol. 1 #3 cover from a Constritor Lockbox
dialog.name: CO04_G10_L01

dialog.message: S.H.I.E.L.D. runs on rookies like you. They'll send you to the worst places in the world, to fight Coisas you can't imagine. Year after year, you'll bleed for them, all to defend people who'll never thank you.
dialog.name: CO04_G03_L01

dialog.message: Collect the The Coisa Vol. 2 #2 cover from a Constritor Lockbox
dialog.name: CO04_G11_L01

dialog.message: Then one day you'll limp home after fighting some costumed freak that killed half your squad, and you'll realize you can't pay rent, and your only friend is a bottle. Think you'll feel like a hero then?
dialog.name: CO04_G04_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Iron Man Vol. 1 #127 cover from a Constritor Lockbox
dialog.name: CO04_G12_L01

dialog.message: You'll come to that point someday. When I got there, I chose money over duty. Self-respect over honor. And up until now, I haven't regretted it.
dialog.name: CO04_G05_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Incredible Hulk Vol. 1 #212 cover from a Constritor Lockbox
dialog.name: CO04_G13_L01

dialog.message: Coisa is, I've got money now. Hercules beat me half to death last time we tussled, so I sued him for excessive force. Nobody was more surprised than me when I won. And I won BIG.
dialog.name: CO04_G06_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Capitão América Vol. 1 #228 cover from a Constritor Lockbox
dialog.name: CO04_G14_L01

dialog.message: So now that I have all the money I could want, I'm finding it isn't enough. I want to do more. Maybe that's why I joined S.H.I.E.L.D. in the first place. Maybe that's why I'm back here now.
dialog.name: CO04_G07_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Capitão América Vol. 1 #282 cover from a Constritor Lockbox
dialog.name: CO04_G15_L01

dialog.message: That's my advice to you, rook. Don't work for S.H.I.E.L.D. because of crap like honor, but because you want a better world. And remember you always have a choice. Even if you chose wrong the first time.
dialog.name: CO04_G08_L01

dialog.message: Collect the Avengers Arena Vol. 1 #7 cover from a Constritor Lockbox
dialog.name: CO04_G16_L01
